GSP29nysvbh1u:6: pramāṇena khalv ayaṃ jñātārtham abhīpsati jihāsati vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:9: samīhamānas tam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā tam artham āpnoti jahāti vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:14: arthavati ca pramāṇe pramātā prameyaṃ pramitir ity arthavanti bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:23: sat sad iti gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtam aviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:25: asac cāsad iti gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtam aviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:28: yathā darśakena dīpena dṛśye gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate, tan nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:31: evaṃ pramāṇena sati gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:32: tan nāsti/ yady abhaviṣyad idam iva vyajñāsyata,
GSP29nysvbh1u:34: tad evaṃ sataḥ prakāśakaṃ pramāṇam asad api prakāśayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:35: sac ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:41: tattvasya jñānaṃ niḥśreyasasyādhigama iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhau/
GSP29nysvbh1u:49: tasyopāyo 'dhigantavya ity etāni catvāry arthapadāni samyag buddhvā niḥśreyasam adhigacchati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:50: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanam anarthakam --- saṃśayādayo yathāsambhavaṃ pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu cāntarbhavanto na vyatiricyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:52: imās tu catasro vidyāḥ pṛthakprasthānāḥ prāṇabhṛtām anugrahāyopadiśyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:59: tatra nānupalabdhe na nirṇīte 'rthe nyāyaḥ pravartate, kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:65: sa ca ``ayaṃ kiṃsvid'' iti vastuvimarśamātram anavadhāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:69: yam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā karmārabhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:71: tenānena sarve prāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś ca vidyā vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:77: tayā pravarttata ity ānvīkṣikī --- nyāyavidyā --- nyāyaśāstram/
GSP29nysvbh1u:78: yat punar anumānaṃ pratyakṣāgamaviruddhaṃ nyāyābhāsaḥ sa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:82: sa prayojanam anuyukto yadi pratipadyate so 'sya pakṣaḥ so 'sya siddhānta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:84: atha na pratipadyate nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ity āpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:87: yo jñāpayati yo jānāti yena jñāpyate yac ca jñāpyate etac ca pratipadyate yadi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:90: parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanam ity etad asya vākyam anarthakaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:101: tasmin sati syātām anumānāgamau asati ca na syātām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:105: nāstikaś ca dṛṣṭāntam abhyupagacchann āstikatvaṃ jahāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:107: niruktena ca dṛṣṭāntena śakyam abhidhātuṃ ``sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam'' ``tadviparyayād viparītam'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:110: tasya pṛthagvacanaṃ satsu siddhāntabhedeṣu vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:112: sādhanīyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tasya pañcāvayavāḥ pratijñādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:123: te caite 'vayavāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ santaḥ prameye 'ntarbhūtā evamarthaṃ pṛthag ucyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:127: tasyodāharaṇam --- kim idaṃ janma kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:131: evam avijñāte 'rthe kāraṇopapattyā ūhaḥ pravarttate --- yadi kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:136: ato 'kasmān nirvartyamānaṃ na punar nivartsyatīti nivṛttikāraṇaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:138: etasmiṃs tarkaviṣaye karmanimittaṃ janmeti pramāṇāni pravarttamānāni tarkeṇānugṛhante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:139: tattvajñānaviṣayasya vibhāgāt tattvajñānāya kalpate tarka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:140: so 'yam itthambhūtas tarkaḥ pramāṇasahito vāde sādhanāyopālambhāya cārthasya bhavatīty evam arthaṃ pṛghag ucyate prameyāntarbhūto 'pīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:144: tāv etau tarkanirṇayau lokayātrāṃ vahata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:145: so 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ prameyāntarbhūta evamarthaṃ pṛthag uddīṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:151: nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthag uddhiṣṭā hetvābhāsā vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:156: jāteś ca pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ sulabhaḥ samādhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:161: tad idaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamārthaṃ yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:164: tat khalu niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tattvajñānāntaram eva bhavati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:170: anātmani ātmeti duḥkhe sukham iti anitye nityam ity atrāṇe trāṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:178: pretyabhāve nāsti jantur jīvo vā sattva ātmā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:187: sarvaviprayoge 'pavarge bahu ca bhadrakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvasukhocchedam acaitanyam amum apavargaṃ rocayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:191: doṣaiḥ prayuktaḥ śarīreṇa pravarttamāno hiṃsāsteyapratiṣiddhamaithunāny ācarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:195: atha śubhā --- śarīreṇa dānaṃ paritrāṇaṃ paricaraṇaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:196: vācā satyaṃ hitaṃ priyaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:201: seyaṃ pravṛttiḥ kutsitasyābhipūjitasya ca janmanaḥ kāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:204: tat punaḥ pratikūlavedanīyaṃ bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:205: ta ime mithyājñānādayo duḥkhāntā dharmā avicchedenaiva pravartamānāḥ saṃsāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:216: evaṃ duḥkhe 'nitye 'trāṇe sabhaye jugupsite hātavye ca yathāviṣayaṃ veditavyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:220: pretyabhāve khalu --- asti jantur jīvaḥ sattva ātmā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:223: nimittavān janmoparama ity anādiḥ pretyabhāvo 'pavargānta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:226: apavarge śāntaḥ khalv ayaṃ sarvaviprayogaḥ sarvoparamo 'pavargaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:227: bahu ca kṛcchaṃ ghoraṃ pāpakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvaduḥkhocchedaṃ sarvaduḥkhāsaṃvidam apavargaṃ na rocayed iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:236: lakṣitasya yathālakṣaṇam upapadyate na veti pramāṇair avadhāraṇaṃ parīkṣā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:250: anumānaṃ --- mitena liṅgena liṅgino 'rthasya paścān mānam anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:251: upamānaṃ --- sāmīpyajñānaṃ --- yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:262: pratyakṣaṃ --- yuñjānasya yogasamādhijam ``ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣād ātmā pratyakṣa'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:271: pāṇau pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne nānumānam, nāgama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:273: jijñāsitam artham āptopadeśāt pratipadyamāno liṅgadarśanenāpi bubhutsate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:282: NyS_1,1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣottpannaṃ jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakaṃ pratyakṣam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:283: indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād utpadyate yaj jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:288: nedaṃ kāraṇāvadhāraṇam --- etāvat pratyakṣe kāraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:294: bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvān nokta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:295: yāvad arthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdās tair arthasampratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:297: tatredam indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannam arthajñānaṃ ``rūpam'' iti vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:300: tena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ --- rūpam iti jānīte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:306: gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasambandhe 'syārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:309: tadā tat pūrvasmād arthajñānān na viśiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:314: tasmāj jñeyasyārthasya saṃjñāśabdenetikaraṇayuktena nirdiśyate --- rūpam iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:316: tad evam arthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:319: grīṣme marīcayo bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānā dūrasthasya cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:321: tac ca pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata ity ata āha --- avyabhicārīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:322: yad atasmiṃs tad iti tad vyabhicāri pratyakṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:323: dūrāc cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati dhūma iti vā reṇur iti vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:324: tad etad indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata ity ata āha --- vyavasāyātmakam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:325: na caitan mantavyam --- ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajam evānavadhāraṇajñānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:326: cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:327: % hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,] p.122
GSP29nysvbh1u:330: yac ca tadindriyānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tad viśeṣāpekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:338: indriyasya vai sato manasa indriyebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśo dharmabhedāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:344: sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe sannidhim asannidhiṃ cāsya yugapajjñānānutpattikāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:346: manasaś cendriyabhāvān na vācyaṃ lakṣaṇāntaram iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:348: paramatam apratiṣiddham anumatam iti hi tantrayuktiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:350: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:351: tatpūrvakam ity anena liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhadarśanaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ cābhisambadhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:354: pūrvavad iti --- yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:356: śeṣavat tad --- yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:357: pūrvodakaviparītam udakaṃ nadyāḥ pūrṇatvaṃ śīghratvañ ca dṛṣṭvā srotaso 'numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:358: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam --- vrajyāpūrvakam anyatra dṛṣṭasya ṇyatra darśanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:362: atha vā pūrvavad iti --- yatra yathāpūrvaṃ pratyakṣabhūtayor anyataradarśanenānyatarasyānumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:366: sa ca prasaktapratiṣedhe ṇyatrāprasaṅgāc chiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:367: yathā sad anityam evamādinā dravyaguṇakarmaṇām aviśeṣeṇa sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:373: yas tu śiṣyate so .yam iti śabdasya guṇatvapratipattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:375: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma --- yatrāpratyakṣe liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacid arthena liṅgasya sāmānyād apratyakṣo liṅgī gamyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:380: tad tad eṣāṃ sthānaṃ sa ātmeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:381: vibhāgavacanād eva trividham iti siddhe trividhavacanaṃ mahato mahāviṣayasya nyāyasya laghīyasā sūtreṇopadeśāt paraṃ vākyalāghavaṃ manyamānasyānyasmin vākyalāghave 'nādaraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:382: tathā cāyam itthaṃbhūtena vākyavikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabdādiṣu ca bahulaṃ samācāraḥ śāstra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:390: asac ca khalv attam anāgataṃ ceti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:393: prajñātena sāmānyāt prajñāpanīyasya prajñāpanam upamānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:396: yadā khalv ayaṃ gavā samānadharmaṃ pratipadyate tadā pratyakṣatas tam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:398: yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya ity upamāne prayukte gavā samānadharmam artham indriyārthasannikarṣād upalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdaḥ saṃjñeti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:399: % gaur evaṃ gavaya ... pratipadyata iti] p.170
GSP29nysvbh1u:402: yathā māṣas tathā māṣaparṇīty upamāne prayukte upamānāt saṃjñāsaṃjñisanbandhaṃ pratipadyamānas tām oṣadhīṃ bhaiṣajyāyāharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:403: evam anyo 'py upamānasya loke viṣayo bubhutsitavya iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:406: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayukta upadeṣṭā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:411: tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vyavahārāḥ pravarttanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:412: evam ebhiḥ pramāṇair devamanuṣyatiraścāṃ vyavahārāḥ prakalpante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:419: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭārtha evāptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:422: kiṃ punar anena pramāṇenārthajātaṃ pramātavyam iti? ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:424: tatrātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarvānubhāvī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:429: sarvārthopalabdhau nendriyāṇi prabhavantīti sarvaviṣayam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:435: duḥkham iti nedam anukūlavedanīyasya sukhasya pratīteḥ pratyākhyānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:436: kiṃ tarhi? janmana evedaṃ sasukhasādhanasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgāt duḥkhenāviprayogād vividhabādhanāyogād duḥkham iti samādhibhāvanam upadiśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:445: asya tu tattvajñānād apavargo mithyājñānāt saṃsāra ity ata etad upadiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇeti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:447: sa kim āptopadeśamātrād eva pratipadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:453: seyam ādātum icchā ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānād bhavati liṅgam ātmanaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:458: yajjātīyo 'syārthaḥ sukhahetuḥ prasiddhas tajjātīyam arthaṃ paśyann ādātuṃ prayatate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:459: ekam anekārthadarśinaṃ darśanapratisandhātāram antareṇa na syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:463: sukhaduḥkhasmṛtyā cāyaṃ tatsādhanam ādadānaḥ sukham upalabhate duḥkham upalabhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:466: bubhutsamānaḥ khalv ayaṃ vimṛśati kiṃsvid iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:468: tad idaṃ jñānaṃ bubhutsāvimarśābhyām abhinnakartṛkaṃ gṛhyamāṇam ātmaliṅgam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:470: tatra dehāntaravad iti vibhajyate yathānātmavādino dehāntareṣu niyataviṣayā buddhibhedā na pratisandhīyante tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran,
GSP29nysvbh1u:471: % tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran, aviśeṣāt/] p.188
GSP29nysvbh1u:475: evaṃ khalu nānāsattvānāṃ samācāro 'nyadṛṣṭam anyo na smaratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:476: tad etad ubyayam aśakyam anātmavādinā vyavasthāpayitum ity evam upapannam asty ātmeti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:480: īpsitaṃ jihāsitaṃ vārtham adhikṛtyepsājihāsāprayuktasya tadupāyānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇā samīhā ceṣṭā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:484: yasyānugraheṇānugṛhītāni upaghāte copahatāni svaviṣayeṣu sādhvasādhuṣu vartante sa eṣām āśrayaḥ tac charīram/
GSP29nysvbh1u:488: yasminn āyatane indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:489: % sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,] p.196
GSP29nysvbh1u:506: NyS_1,1.13: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam iti bhūtāni //
GSP29nysvbh1u:507: saṃjñāśabdaiḥ pṛthagupadeśo bhūtānāṃ vibhaktānāṃ suvacaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatīti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:510: pṛthivyādīnāṃ yathāviniyogaṃ guṇā indriyāṇāṃ yathākramam arthā viṣayā iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:511: acetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ cetanasyākartur upalabdhir iti yuktiviruddham arthaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka ivedam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:512: NyS_1,1.15: buddhir upalabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntaram //
GSP29nysvbh1u:513: nācetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:522: yugapac ca khalu ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapaj jñānāni notpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:525: asti tat tad indriyasaṃyogi sahakāri nimittāntaram avyāpi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:526: yasyāsannidher notpadyate jñānaṃ sannidheś cotpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:528: manaḥsaṃyogānapekṣasya hīndriyārthasannikarṣasya jñānahetutve yugapad uptadyeran jñānānīti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:533: so 'yam ārambhaḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaś ca daśavidhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:537: jñātāraṃ hi rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:539: pratyātmavedanīyā hīme doṣāḥ kasmāl lakṣaṇato nirdiśyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:541: rakto hi tat karma kurute yena karmaṇā sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā labhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:543: rāgadveṣamohā ity ucyamāne bahu noktaṃ bhavatīti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:545: utpannasya kvacit sattvanikāye mṛtvā yā punarutpattiḥ sa pretyabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:550: yatra kvacit prāṇabhṛnnikāye vartamānaḥ pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:551: % pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti/] p.222
GSP29nysvbh1u:552: yat tatrānyatra vā dehādīn anyān upādatte tad bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:554: so 'yaṃ janmamaraṇaprabandhābhyāso 'nādir apavargāntaḥ pretyabhāvo veditavya iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:558: tat punar dehendriyaviṣayabuddhiṣu satīṣu bhavatīti saha dehādibhiḥ phalam abhipretam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:559: tathā hi pravṛttidoṣajanito 'rthaḥ phalam etat sarvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:560: % pravṛttidoṣajanito 'rthaḥ phalam etat sarvaṃ bhavati/] p.223
GSP29nysvbh1u:561: tad etat phalam upātam upātaṃ heyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:562: tyaktaṃ tyaktam upādeyam iti nāsya hānopādānayor niṣṭhā paryavasānaṃ vāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:563: sa khalv ayaṃ phalasya hānopādānasrotasohyate loka iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:567: tayānuviddham anuṣaktam avinirbhāgena vartamānaṃ duḥkhayogād duḥkham iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:568: so 'yaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhenānuviddham iti paśyan duḥkhaṃ jihāsur janmani duḥkhadarśī nirvidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:571: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānaṃ so .yam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:573: tena --- duḥkhena janmanā atyantaṃ vimuktir apavargaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:577: tad abhayam ajaram amṛtyupadaṃ brahma kṣemaprāptir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:578: nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan mokṣe vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:579: yenābhivyaktenātyantaṃ vimuktaḥ sukhī bhātīti kecin manyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:581: na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ nāgamo vā vidyate nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan mokṣe 'bhivyajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:585: tasya hetur vācyo yatas tad utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:588: yathā muktaḥ sukhena tatsaṃvedanena ca sannityenopapannas tathā saṃsārastho 'pi prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:590: abhyanujñāne ca dharmādharmaphalena sāhacaryaṃ yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:591: yad idam utpattisthāneṣu dharmādharmaphalaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā saṃvedyate paryāyeṇa,
GSP29nysvbh1u:592: tasya ca nityasaṃvedanasya ca sahabhāvo yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:596: atha mokṣe nityasya sukhasya saṃvedanam anityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:600: evam api tasya sahakāri nimittāntaraṃ vacanīyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:603: tasya hetur vācyo yataḥ utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:607: tasya kāryāvasāyavirodhāt prakṣaye saṃvedanam atyantaṃ nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:609: yadi dharmakṣayāt saṃvedanoparamo nityaṃ sukhaṃ na saṃvedyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:613: yogasamādhijo dharmo na kṣīyata iti nāsty anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:614: utpattidharmakam anityam iti viparyayasya tv anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:615: yasya tu saṃvedanoparamo nāsti tena saṃvedanahetur nitya ity anumeyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:616: nitye ca muktasaṃsārasthayor aviśeṣa ity uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:617: yathā muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ tatsaṃvedanahetuś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:621: evaṃ ca sati dharmādharmaphalena sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanena sāhacaryaṃ gṛhyeteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:625: syān matam --- saṃsārāvasthasya śarīrādisambandho nityasukhasaṃvedanahetoḥ pratibandhakaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:628: śarīrādayaḥ upabhogārthās te bhogapratibandhaṃ kariṣyantīty anupapannam;
GSP29nysvbh1u:629: na cāsty anumānam aśarīrasyātmano bhogaḥ kaścid astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:632: idam anumānam --- iṣṭādhigamārtho mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:635: aniṣṭoparamārtho mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:636: neṣṭam aniṣṭenānanuviddhaṃ sambhavatīti iṣṭam apy aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:640: yathā dṛṣṭam anityaṃ sukhaṃ parityajya nityaṃ sukhaṃ kāmayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:641: evaṃ dehendriyabuddhīr anityā dṛṣṭā atikramya muktasya nityā dehendriyabuddhayaḥ kalpayitavyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:642: sādhīyaś caivaṃ muktasya caikātmyaṃ kalpitaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:644: dehādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ kalpayitum aśakyam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:645: samānaṃ sukhasyāpi nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ kalpayitum aśakyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:646: ātyantike ca saṃsāraduḥkhābhāve sukhavacanād āgame 'pi saty avirodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:647: yady api kaścid āgamaḥ syāt muktasyātyantikaṃ sukham iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:648: % kaścid āgamaḥ syāt muktasyātyantikaṃ sukham iti?] p.232
GSP29nysvbh1u:649: sukhaśabda ātyantike duḥkhābhāve prayukta ity evam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:650: dṛṣṭo hi duḥkhābhāve sukhaśabdaprayogo bahulaṃ loka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:653: yady ayaṃ mokṣo nityaṃ sukham abhivyajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:654: nityasukharāgeṇa mokṣāya ghaṭamāno na mokṣam adhigacchet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:657: na ca bandhane saty api kaścin mukta ity upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:660: tasmin prahīṇe nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:661: yady evam, muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:664: sthānavata eva tarhi saṃśayasya lakṣaṇaṃ vācyam iti tad ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:665: NyS_1,1.23: samānānekadharmopapatter vipratipatter upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:667: sthāṇupuruṣayoḥ samānaṃ dharmam ārohapariṇāhau paśyan pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca tayor viśeṣam bubhutsamānaḥ kiṃsvid ity anyataraṃ nāvadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:669: samānam anayor dharmam upalabhe viśeṣam anyatarasya nopalabha ity eṣā buddhir apekṣā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:670: % nopalabha ity eṣā buddhir apekṣā ---] p.240
GSP29nysvbh1u:679: gandhavattvāt pṛthivy abādhibyo viśiṣyate guṇakarmabhyaś ca /
GSP29nysvbh1u:681: tasmin dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti sandehaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:687: viśeṣāpekṣā --- anyatamasya vyavasthāpakaṃ dharma nopalaba iti buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:696: upalabdhyavayavasthātaḥ khalv api sac codakam upalabhyate taḍāgādiṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:698: ataḥ kvacid upalabhyamāne tattvavyavasthāpakasya pramāṇasyānupalabdheḥ kiṃ sad upalabhyate 'thāsad iti saṃśayo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:704: kiṃ san nopalabyate utāsad iti saṃśayo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:712: NyS_1,1.24: yam arhtam adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:713: yam artham āptavyaṃ hātavyaṃ vā vyavasāya tadāptihānopāyam anutiṣṭhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:716: imam artham āpsyāmi hāsyāmi veti vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:718: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānataḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:719: lokasāmānyam anatītā laukikā naisargikaṃ vainayikaṃ buddhyatiśayam aprāptāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:722: yathā yam arthaṃ laukikā budhyante tathā parīkṣakā api,
GSP29nysvbh1u:729: idam itthambhūtañ cety abhyanujñāyamānam arthajātaṃ siddham,
GSP29nysvbh1u:744: yathā ghrāṇādīnīnindriyāṇi gandhādaya indriyārhāḥ pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni pramāṇair arthasya grahaṇam iti//28//
GSP29nysvbh1u:748: niratiśayāś cetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsu viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhyānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:752: asad utpadyate utpannaṃ nirudhyata iti yogānām//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:755: na tair vinā so 'rthaḥ sidhyati te 'rthā yadadhiṣṭhānāḥ so 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:757: yathā dehendriyavyatirikto jñātā ``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād'' iti atrānuṣaṅgiṇo
GSP29nysvbh1u:759: gandhādiguṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ guṇādhikaraṇam aniyataviṣayāś cetanā iti pūrvārthasiddhāv ete 'rhāḥ sidhyanti na tair vinā so 'rthaḥ sambhavatīti//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:762: astu dravyaṃ śabdaḥ sa tu nityo 'thānitya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:763: dravyasya sato nityatānityatā vā tadviśeṣaḥ parīkṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:764: so 'bhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñānāc ca pravartata iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:768: jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanaṃ saṃśayavyudāsa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:772: taṃ tattvato jñātaṃ hāsyāmi vopādāsya upekṣiṣye veti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:777: jijñāsādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃśayaś ca vyāhatadharmopasaṅghātāt tattvajñāne pratyāsannaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:778: vyāhatayor hi dharmayor anyataratattvaṃ bhavitum arhatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:781: sā śakyaprāptir na sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñādivad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:782: prayojanaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇam arthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:787: tattvārthasādhakabhāvāt tu pratijñādayaḥ sādhakavākyasya bhāgā ekadeśā avayavā iti// 32 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:790: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ anityaḥ śabda iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:792: udāharaṇena sāmānyāt sādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:793: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmam udāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ utpattidharmakatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:809: sādhyaṃ ca dvividhaṃ dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:810: dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmy anityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:813: tasya dharmas taddharmas tasya bhāvas taddharmabhāvaḥ sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyasādharmyād utpattidharmakatvat taddharmabhāvī
GSP29nysvbh1u:816: tac ca bhūtvā na bhavati ātmānaṃ jahāti nirudhyata ity anityam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:818: so 'yam ekasmin dvayor dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sādharmyād vyavasthita upalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:819: taṃ dṛṣṭānta upalabhamānaḥ śabde 'py anuminoti --- śabdo 'py utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ sthālyādivad iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:824: anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam ātmādi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:825: so 'yam ātmādir dṛṭṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavaidharmyād anutpattidharmakatvād ataddharmabhāvī --- yo 'sau sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:827: atrātmādau dṛṣṭānta utpattidharmakatvasyābhāvād anityatvaṃ na bhavatīty upalabhamānaḥ śabde viparyayam anuminoty utpattidharmakatvasya bhāvād anityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:828: sādharmyoktasya hetoḥ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:829: vaidharmyoktasya hetoḥ sādhyavaidharmyād ataddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:830: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmau sādhyasādhanabhūtau paśyati sādhye 'pi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvam anuminoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:831: uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte tayor dharmayor ekasyābhāvād itarasyābhāvaṃ paśyati tayor ekasya bhāvād itarasya bhāvaṃ sādhye 'numinotīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:832: tad etad dhetuvābhāseṣu na sambhavatīty ahetavo hetvābhāsāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:834: tad idaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:835: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣas tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:838: sādhyasādharmyayukte udāharaṇe sthālyādi dravyam utpattidharmakam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:839: tathā śabda utpattidharmaka iti sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvam upasaṃhriyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:841: sādhyavaidharmyayukte punar udāharaṇa ātmādi dravyam anutpattidharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:846: dvividhasya punar hetor dvividhasya codāharaṇasyopasaṃhāradvaite ca samānam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:848: sādharmyokte vā vaidharmyokte vā yathodāharaṇam upasaṃhriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:849: tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam --- nigamyante 'neneti pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayā ekatreti nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:851: tatra sādharmokte tāvad dhetau vākyam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:853: utpattidharmakaṃ sthālyādi dravyam anityam ity udāharaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:855: tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:859: na ca tathānutpattidharmakaḥ śabdaḥ tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:860: avayavasamudāye ca vākye sambhūyetaretarābhisambandhāt pramāṇāny arthān sādhayantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:862: āptopadeśasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pratisandhānād anṛṣeś ca svātantryānupapatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:870: itaretarābhisambandho 'pi --- asatyāṃ pratijñāyām anāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteran/
GSP29nysvbh1u:872: udāharaṇe sādhye ca kasyopasaṃhāraḥ syāt kasya cāpadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:873: asaty udāharaṇe kena sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanam upādīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:875: upanayaṃ cāntareṇa sādhye 'nupasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhako dharmo nārthaṃ sādhayet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:876: nigamanābhāve cānabhiyuktasambandhānāṃ pratijñādīnām ekārthena pravartanaṃ tatheti pratipādanaṃ kasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:877: athāvayavārthaḥ --- sādhyasya dharmasya dharmiṇā sambandhopādānaṃ pratijñārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:878: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhakabhāvavacanaṃ hetvarthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:880: sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya sādhyena dharmeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyopapādanam upanayārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:881: udāharaṇasthayor dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvopapattau sādhye viparītaprasaṅgapratiṣedhārthaṃ nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:882: nacaitasyāṃ hetūdāharaṇapariśuddhau satyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalyāj jātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ prakramate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:883: avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvam udāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:884: vyavasthite tu khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya hetutvenopādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya na vaidharmyamātrasya veti// 39 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:886: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya ity athedam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:887: NyS_1,1.40: avijñātatattve 'rthe kāraṇopapattitas tattvajñānārtham ūhas tarkaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:888: avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe jijñāsā tāvaj jāyate jānīyemam artham iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:889: atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmau vibhāgena vimṛśati ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:893: sambhavaty asmin kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ hetur iti kāraṇopapattyā syād evam etan netarad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:894: tatra nidarśanam --- yo 'yaṃ jñātā jñātavyam arthaṃ jānīte taṃ tattvato jānīyeti jijñāsā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:896: vimṛśyamāne 'vijñātatatte 'rthe yasya dharmasyābhyanujñākāraṇam upapadyate tam anujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:898: tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati jñātā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:899: duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttaram uttaraṃ pūrvasya pūrvasya kāraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:900: uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyād apavarga iti syātāṃ saṃsārāpavargau/
GSP29nysvbh1u:903: utpannaḥ khalu jñātā dehendriyabuddhivedanābhiḥ sambadhyata iti nāsyedaṃ svakṛtasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:904: karmaṇaḥ phalam utpannaś ca bhūtvā na bhavatīti tasyāvidyamānasya niruddhasya vā
GSP29nysvbh1u:906: tad evam ekasyānekaśarīrayogaḥ śarīraviyogaś cātyantaṃ na syād iti yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati tan nānujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:907: so 'yam evaṃlakṣaṇa ūhas tarka ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:908: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tattvajñānam eveti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:911: na tv avadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evam evedam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:913: tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇānugrahabhāvitāt prasannād anatarapramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ity evaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:914: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa ity avijñātatattvam anujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:916: yathā so 'rho bhavati tasya tathābhāvaḥ tattvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:922: tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāv anubandhena pravartamānau pakṣapratipakṣāv ity ucyete/
GSP29nysvbh1u:925: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti --- eko hi pratijñātam arthaṃ hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati dvitīyasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:926: dvitīyena sthāpanāhetuḥ pratiṣidhyate tasyaiva pratiṣedhahetuś coddhriyate sa nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:932: tāv etau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayataḥ --- ubhayasambhave ubhayāsambhave vānivṛtto vimarśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:934: so 'yaṃ vimarśaḥ pakṣapratipakṣāv avadyotya nyāyaṃ pravartayatīty upādīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:936: yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau dharmau hetutaḥ sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:938: yathā --- kriyāvad dravyam iti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ sambhavati tat kriyāvat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:939: yasya na sambhavati tad akriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:940: ekadharmisthayoś ca viruddhayor dharmayor ayugapadbhāvinoḥ kālavikalpaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:941: yathā --- tad eva dravyaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ kriyāvat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:943: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamo vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:945: parīkṣāviṣaye tu vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:949: tisraḥ kathā bhavanti --- vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti/ tāsām ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:950: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:955: yathā --- nitya ātmā anityā buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:959: pramāṇais tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:962: tau sādhanopālambhāv ubhayor api pakṣayor vyatiṣaktāv anubaddhau ca yāvad eko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti nivṛttasyopālambho vyavasthitasya sādhanam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:965: pratiṣedhe kasyacid abhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:967: ``siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha'' iti hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā vāde/
GSP29nysvbh1u:969: ``hīnam anyatamenāpy avayavena nyūnam'' ``hetūdāharaṇādhikam adhikam'' iti caitayor abhyanujñānārtham iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:971: anyathobhāv api pakṣau sthāpanāpravṛttau vāda iti syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:973: antareṇāpi cāvayavasambandhaṃ pramāṇāny arthaṃ sādhayantīti dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:974: tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:975: ``chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambho jalpa'' iti vacanād vinigraho jalpa iti mā vijñāyi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:976: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha eva jalpaḥ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vād eveti mā vijñāyīty evamarthaṃ pṛthak pramānatarkagrahaṇam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:981: chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:982: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacid arthasya sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:989: chalajātinigrahasthānopālambho jalpa ity evam apy ucyamāne vijñāyata etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:991: na svatantrāṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ --- yat tat pramāṇair arthasya sādhanaṃ tatra chalajātinigrahasthānānām aṅgabhāvo rakṣaṇārthatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:992: tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighātena svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:994: tathā coktaṃ ``tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇāthaṃ jalpavitaṇḍe bījaprarohasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:995: yaś cāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhas tasya caitāni prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhavighātāt sahakārīṇi bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:996: tad evam aṅgībhūtanāṃ chalādīnām upādānaṃ jalpe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1003: yau tau samānādhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmau pakṣāv ity uktaṃ tayor ekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti prapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva pravartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1005: yad vai khalu tat parapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1006: na tv asau sādhyaṃ kañcid arthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1008: hetulakṣaṇābhāvād ahetavo hetusāmānyād dhetuvad ābhāsamānāḥ/ ta ime ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1016: sparśavān kumbho 'nityo dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tathā sparśavān śabdas tasmād asparśatvān nityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1018: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvam anityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete sparśavāṃś cāṇur nityaś ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1021: ``udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ'' ity asparśatvād iti hetur nityatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1023: evaṃ dvividhe 'pi dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvād ahetur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1024: nityatvam apy eko 'nto 'nityatvam apy eko ṇta ekasminn ante vidyata iti aikāntikaḥ viparyayād anaikāntika ubhayāntavyāpakatvād iti// 5 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1026: taṃ viruṇaddhīti tadvirodhy abhyupetaṃ siddhāntaṃ vyāhantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1027: yathā so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakter apaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1029: na nityo vikāra upapadyata apeto 'pi vikāro 'sti vināśapratiṣedhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1031: hetur vyakter apeto 'pi vikāro 'stīty anena svasiddhāntena virudhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1034: yady ātmalābhāt pracyuto vikāro 'sti nityatvapratiṣedho nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1035: yad vyakter apetasyāpi vikārasyāstitvaṃ tat khalu nityatvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1038: yad ātmalābhāt pracyavate tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1039: yad asti na tad ātmalābhāt pracyavate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1040: astitvaṃ cātmalābhāt pracyutir iti ca viruddhāv etau dharmau na saha sambhavata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1041: so 'yaṃ hetur yaṃ siddhāntam āśritya pravartate tam eva vyāhantīti// 6 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1042: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā sa nirṇayārtham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1044: tasya cintā vimarśāt prabhṛti prāṅ nirṇayād yat samīkṣaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1046: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1047: prajñāpanaṃ tv anityaḥ śabdo nityadharmānupalabdher iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1048: anupalabhyamānan ity adharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam sthālyādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1049: nityaḥ śabdo vānityadharmānupalabdheḥ anupalabhyamānānityadharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam ākāśādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1050: yatra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1051: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiś ca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1052: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyata evam anityadharmo 'pi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1055: katham? viparyaye hi prakaraṇanivṛtteḥ --- yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta na syāt prakaraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1057: yadi vānityadharmo gṛhyeta evam api nivarteta prakaraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1058: so 'yaṃ hetur ubhau pakṣau pravartayann anyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate// 7 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1061: gatimattvād iti hetuḥ sādhyenāviśiṣṭaḥ sādhanīyatvāt sādhyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1064: sādhyaṃ tāvad etat kiṃ puruṣavac chāyāpi gacchaty āhosvid āvarakadravye saṃsarpaty āvaraṇasantānād asannidhisantāno 'yaṃ tejaso gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1066: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yas tejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhir evāvicchinno gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1069: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1071: prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca vyakter avasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1072: tathā ca śabdo 'py avasthito bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena vyajyate dāruparaśusaṃyogena vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1075: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktir atyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1078: nivṛtte dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1079: seyaṃ śabdasya vyaktiḥ saṃyogakālam atyetīti na saṃyoganirmitā bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1081: evam udāharaṇasādharmyasyābhāvād asādhanam ayaṃ hetur hetvābhāsa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1085: ity etadvacanād viparyāsenokto hetur udāharaṇasādharmyāt tathā vaidharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na jahāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1095: NyS_1,2.11 : tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ceti //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1097: NyS_1,2.12 : aviśeṣābhihite 'rthe vaktur abhiprāyād arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1101: tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktur abhiprāyād avivakṣitam anyam arthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvad abhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1103: kalpayitvā cāsambhavena pratiṣedhati eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1104: tad idaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci chalaṃ vākchalam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1108: etasmin prayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā nava kambalā asyety etadbhavatābhihitaṃ tac ca na sambhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1116: prayuktapūrvāś ceme śabdā arthe prayujyante nāprayuktapūrvāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1120: tatraivam arthagatyarthe śabdaprayoge sāmarthyāt sāmānyaśabdasya prayoganiyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1121: ajāṃ grāmaṃ naya sarpir āhāra brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayeti sāmānyaśabdāḥ santo 'rthāvayaveṣu prayujyante sāmārthyat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1124: evam ayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ kambalo 'syeti tatra pravartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1125: yas tu na sambhavait nava kambalā asyeti tatra na pravartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126: so 'yam anupapadyamānārthakalpanayā paravākyopālambho na kalpata iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1128: aho khalv asau brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasampanna ity ukte kaścid āha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1130: asya vacanasya vighāto 'rthavikalpopapattyāsambhūtārthakalpanayā kriyate --- yadi brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṃasampat sambhavati vrātye 'pi sambhavet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1133: yad vivakṣitam artham āpnoti cātyeti ca tad atisāmānyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1134: yathā brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidyācaraṇasampadaṃ kvacid āpnoti kvacid atyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1136: asya ca pratyavasthānam --- avivakṣitahetukasya viṣayānuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1138: yathā sambhavanty asmin kṣetre śālaya iti anirākṛtam avivakṣitaṃ ca bījajanma,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1140: so 'yaṃ kṣetrānuvādaḥ nāsmin śālayo vidhīyanta iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1141: bījāt tu śālinirvṛttiḥ satī na vivakṣitā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1142: evaṃ sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad iti sampadviṣayo brāhmaṇatvaṃ na sampaddhetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1146: vis'yaṃ ca praśaṃsatā vākyena yathāhetutaḥ phalanirvṛttir na pratyākhyāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1147: tad evaṃ sati vacanavighāto 'sambhūtārthakalpanayā nopapadyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1153: mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti na tu mañcāḥ krośanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1156: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāraviṣayaṃ chalam upacāracchalam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1159: atra samādhiḥ --- prasiddhe prayoge vaktur yathābhiprāyaṃ śabdārthayor abhyanujñā pratiṣedhā vā na cchandataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1160: pradhānabhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇabhūtasya prayoga ubhayor lokasiddhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1161: siddhe prayoge yathā vaktur abhiprāyas tathā śabdārthāv anujñeyau pratiṣedhyau vā na cchandataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1162: yadi vaktā pradhānaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte yathābhūtasyābhyanujñā pratiṣedho vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1166: yatra tu vaktā guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte pradhānabhūtam abhipretya paraḥ pratiṣedhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1167: svamanīṣayā pratiṣedho 'sau bhavati na paropālambha iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1169: na vākchalād upacāracchalaṃ bhidyate tasyāpy arthāntarakalpanāyā aviśeṣāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1170: ihāpi sthānyartho guṇaśabdaḥ pradhānaśabdaḥ sthānārtha iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1177: NyS_1,2.17 : aviṣeṣe vā kiñcit sādharmyād ekacchalaprasaṅaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1178: chalasya dvitvam abhyanujñāya tritvaṃ pratiṣidhyate kiñcit sādharmyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1179: yathā cāyaṃ hetus tritvaṃ pratiṣedhati tathā dvitvam apy abhyanujñātaṃ pratiṣedhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1180: vidyate hi kiñcit sādharmyaṃ dvayor apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1185: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sa jātiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1186: sa ca prasaṅgaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānam upālambhaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1193: viparītā vā kutsitā vā pratipattir vipratipattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1197: pareṇa sthāpitaṃ vā na pratiṣedhati pratiṣedhaṃ vā noddharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1198: asamāsāc ca naite eva nigrahasthāne iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1199: kiṃ punar dṛṣṭāntavaj jātinigrahasthānayor abhedo 'tha siddhāntavad bheda ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1205: tatra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam ity apratipattir nigrasthānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1209: yathālakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyanta iti trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttir veditavyeti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1210: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1213: sā ca ``vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ'' ity agre vimarṣa eva parīkṣyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1214: NyS_2,1.1 : samānānekadharmādhyavasāyād anyataradharmādhyavasāyād vā na saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1216: atha vā samānam anayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1218: atha vā samānadharmādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1219: na jātu rūpasyārthāntarabhūtasyādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte sparśe saṃśaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1220: atha vā na adhyavasāyād arthāvadhāraṇād anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya upapadyate kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1228: atha vāsty ātmety eke nāsty ātmety apare manyanta ity upalabdheḥ kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1229: tathopalabdhir avyavasthitā anupalabdhiś cāvyavasthiteti vibhāgenādhyavasite saṃśayo nopapadyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1231: yāṃ ca vipratipattiṃ bhavān saṃśayahetuḥ manyate sā sampratipattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1237: yadi tāvad iyam avyavasthā ātmani eva vyavasthitā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1238: vyavasthānād avyavasthā na bhavatīty anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1240: evam atādātmyād avyavasthā na bhavatīti saṃśayābhāva iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1242: yena kalpena bhavān samānadharmopapatteḥ saṃśaya iti manyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1245: na hy ayam ataddharmā dharmī vimṛśyamāṇo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1248: NyS_2,1.6 : yathoktādhyavasāyād eva tadaviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1250: katham? yat tāvat samānadharmādhyavasāyaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ na samānadharmamātram iti, evam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1252: viśeṣāpekṣa iti vacanāt tatsiddheḥ --- viśeṣasyāpekṣā ākaṅkṣā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1255: samāne ca dharme katham ākaṅkṣā na bhaved yady ayaṃ pratyakṣaḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1257: upapattivacanād vā --- samānadharmopapatter ity ucyate na cānyā sadbhāvasaṃvedanād ṛte samānadharmopapattir asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1259: viṣayaśabdena vā viṣayiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānam --- yathā loke dhūmenāgnir anumīyate ity ukte dhūmadarśanenāgnir anumīyata iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1260: katham? dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmam athāgnim anuminoti nādṛṣṭveti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1263: tena manyāmahe viṣayaśabdena viṣayiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānaṃ boddhānujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1265: yathohitvā samānamanayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1267: yāv aham arthau pūrvam adrākṣaṃ tayoḥ samānaṃ dharmam upalabhe viśeṣaṃ nopalabha iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1268: kathaṃ nu viśeṣaṃ paśyeyaṃ yenānyataram avadhārayeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1269: na caitat samānadharmopalabdhau dharmadharmigrahaṇamātreṇa nivartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1270: yac coktaṃ nārthāntarādhyavasāyād anyatra saṃśaya iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1271: yo hy arthāntarādhyavasāyamātraṃ saṃśayahetum upādadīta sa evaṃ vācya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1272: yat punar etat kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhāvād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1273: kāraṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvau kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1275: yasyotpādād yad utpadyate yasya cānutpādād yan notpadyate tat kāraṇaṃ kāryam itarad ity etat sārūpyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1276: asti ca saṃśayakāraṇe saṃśaye caitad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1278: yat punar etad uktaṃ ``vipratipattyavyavasthādhyavasāyāc ca na saṃśaya'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1279: pṛthakpravādayor vyāhatam artham upalabhe viśeṣaṃ ca na jānāmi nopalabhe yenānyataram avadhārayeyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1281: tat ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ syād yenaikataram avadhārayeyam iti saṃśayo vipratipattijanito 'yaṃ na śakyo vipratipattisampratipattimātreṇa nivartayitum
GSP29nysvbh1u:1283: yat punar etat vipratipattau ca sampratipatter iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1284: vipratipattiśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ tadadhyavasāyo viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetus tasya ca samākhyāntareṇa na nivṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1285: samāne 'dhikaraṇe vyāhatārthau pravādau vipratipattiśabdasyārthaḥ tadadhyavasāyaś ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1286: na cāsya sampratipattiśabde samākhyāntare yojyamāne saṃśayahetutuvaṃ nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1289: saṃśayahetor arthasyāpratiṣedhād avyavasthābhyanujñānāc ca nimittāntareṇa śabdāntarakalpanā vyarthā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1290: śabdāntarakalpanāvyavasthā khalv avyavasthā na bhavaty avyavasthātmani vyavasthitatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1292: nānayor upalabdhyanupalabdhyoḥ sadasadviṣayatvaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ saṃśayahetur na bhvatīti pratiṣidhyate yāvatā cāvyavasthātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1294: evam iyaṃ kriyamāṇāpi śabdāntarakalpanā nārthāntaraṃ sādhayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1297: kiṃ tarhi? tadviṣayādhyavasāyād viśeṣasmṛtisahitād ity ato nātyantasaṃśaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1301: viśeṣaś cānyataradharmo na tasminn adhyvasīyamāne viśeṣāpekṣā sambhavatīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1303: yatra yatra saṃśayapūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyāṃ vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1304: tatra tatraivaṃ saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhir vācya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1305: ataḥ sarvaparīkṣāvyāpitvāt prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ parīkṣita iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1308: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ nāsti traikālyāsiddheḥ pūrvāparasahabhāvānupapatter ity arthaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1310: NyS_2,1.9 : pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1315: NyS_2,1.10 : paścāt siddhau na pramāṇebhyaḥ prameyasiddhiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1316: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam ity etat sidhyati//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1319: evam api gandhādiṣv indriyārtheṣu jñānāni pratyarthaniyatāni yugapatsambhavantīti jñānānāṃ pratyakṣaniyatatvāt kramavṛttitvābhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1320: yā imā buddhayaḥ krameṇārtheṣu varttante tāsāṃ kramavṛttitvaṃ na sambhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1321: vyāghātaś ca ``yugapaj jñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1322: etāvāṃś ca pramāṇaprameyayoḥ sadbhāvaviṣayaḥ sa cānupapanna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1324: asya samādhiḥ --- upalabdhihetor upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1331: kvacid upalabdhihetur upalabdhiviṣayaś ca saha bhvataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1334: evaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoḥ pūrvāparasahabhāve 'niyate yathārtho dṛśyate tathā vibhajya vacanīya iti tatraikāntena pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1335: sāmānyena khalu vibhajya pratiṣedha ukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1337: yat punar idaṃ paścāt siddhāv asati pramāṇe prameyaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1338: pramāṇena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam iti vijñāyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1339: pramāṇam ity etasyāḥ samākhyāyā upalabdhihetutvaṃ nimittam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1344: upalabdhiṃ kariṣyatīti samākhyāhetos traikālyayogāt samākhyā tathābhūtā pramito 'nenārthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyata iti pramāṇam; pramitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1347: evaṃ sati bhaviṣyaty asmin hetuta upalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1348: pramāsyate 'yam arthaḥ prameyam idam ity etat sarvaṃ bhvatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1350: yaś caivaṃ nābhyanujānīyāt tasya pācakam ānaya pakṣyati lāvakam ānaya laviṣyatīti vyavahāro nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1351: ``pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyaṃ traikālyāsiddher'' ity evamādi vākyaṃ pramāṇapratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1353: athānena pratiṣedhena bhavatā kiṃ kriyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1354: kiṃ sambhavo nivartyate athāsambhavo jñāpyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1356: tad yadi sambhavo nivartyate sati sambhave pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1358: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāptas tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ pramāṇāsambhavasyopalabdhihetutvād iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1362: pūrvaṃ hi pratiṣedhasiddhāv asati pratiṣedhye kim anena pratiṣidhyate paścāt siddhau pratiṣedhyāsiddhiḥ pratiṣedhābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1365: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe ca vākye 'nupapadyamāne siddhaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1368: traikālyāsiddher ity asya hetor yady udāharaṇam upādīyate hetvarthasya sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1372: upādīyamānam apy udāharaṇaṃ nārthaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti so 'yaṃ sarvapramāṇavyāhato hetur ahetuḥ;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1375: sa ca vākyārthaḥ pratyakṣādīni nārthaṃ sādhayantītīdaṃ cāvayavānām upādānam arthasya sādhanāyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1376: atha nopādīyate apradarśitaṃ hetvarthasya dṛṣṭāntena sādhakatvam iti niṣedho nopapadyate hetutvāsiddher iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1378: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe svavākye teṣām avayavāśritānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇye 'bhyanujñāyamāne paravākye 'py avayavāśritānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate 'viśeṣād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1379: evaṃ ca na sarvāṇi pramāṇāni pratiṣidhyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1380: vipratiṣedha iti vīty ayam upasargaḥ sampratipattyarthe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1382: NyS_2,1.15 : traikālyāpratiṣedhaś ca śabdād ātodyasiddhivat tatsiddheḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1385: yat tāvat pūrvoktam upalabdhihetor upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1387: anityam adarśī khalv ayam ṛṣir niyamena pratiṣedhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe --- traikālyasya cāyuktaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1388: tatraikāṃ vidhām udāharati śabdād ātodyasiddhivad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1390: yathā paścāt siddhena śabdena pūrvasiddham ātodyam anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1392: antarhite hy ātodye svanato 'numānaṃ bhavatīti vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate iti svanaviśeṣeṇa ātodyaviśeṣaṃ pratipadyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1393: tathā pūrvasiddham upalabdhiviṣayaṃ paścāt siddhenopalabdhihetunā pratipadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1394: nidarśanārthatvāc cāsya śeṣayor vidhayor yathoktam udāharaṇaṃ veditavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1398: sa iha vā prakāśyeta tatra vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1400: pramāṇaṃ prameyam iti ca samākhyā samāveśena varttate samākhyānimittavaśāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1401: samākhyānimittaṃ tūpalabdhisādhanaṃ pramāṇam upalabdhiviṣayaś ca prameyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1402: yadā ca upalabdhiviṣayaḥ kvacid upalabdhisādhanaṃ bhavati tadā pramāṇaṃ prameyam iti caiko 'rtho 'bhidhīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1407: yathā suvarṇādinā tulāntaraṃ vyavasthāpyate tadā tulāntarapratipattau suvarṇādi pramāṇam tulāntaraṃ prameyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1415: tathā ca kārakaśabdā nimittavaśāt samāveśena varttanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1420: vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ jñāpayatīti jñāpakasya sādhakatamatvāt karaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1422: vṛkṣāyodakam āsiñcatīti āsicyamānenodakena vṛkṣam abhipraitīti sampradānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1423: vṛkṣāt parṇaṃ patatīti ``dhruvam apāye 'pādānam'' ity apādānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1425: evam ca sati na dravyamātraṃ kārakam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1434: evaṃ ca kārakānvākhyānaṃ yathaiva upapattita evaṃ lakṣaṇataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1435: kārakānvākhyānam api na dravyamātre na kriyāyām vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1438: sa ca kārakadharmaṃ na hātum arhati//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1444: pratyakṣaṃ me jñānam ānumānikaṃ me jñānam aupamānikaṃ me jñānam āgamikaṃ me jñānam iti viśeṣā gṛhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1445: lakṣaṇataś ca jñāpyamānāni jñāyante viśeṣeṇendriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānam ity evamādinā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1446: seyam upalabdhiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣayā kiṃ pramāṇāntarataḥ athāntareṇa pramāṇāntaram asādhaneti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1450: yena pramāṇenopalabhyante tat pramāṇāntaram astīti pramāṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ prasajyata iti anavasthām āha tasyāpy anyena tasyāpy anyeneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1455: yadi pratyakṣādyupalabdhau pramāṇāntaraṃ nivarttane ātmādyupalabdhāv api pramāṇāntaraṃ nivartsyaty aviśeṣāt//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1456: evaṃ ca sarvapramāṇavilopa ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1459: sa ca pratyakṣāntareṇa cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣeṇa gṛhyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1461: tamasi pradīpam upādadīthā ity āptopadeśenāpi pratipadyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1466: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānam ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣād ātmasamavayāc ca sukhādivad gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1468: yathā ca dṛśyaḥ san pradīpaprakāśo dṛśyāntarāṇāṃ darśanahetur iti dṛśyadarśanavyavasthāṃ labhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1469: evaṃ prameyaṃ sat kiñcid arthajātam upalabdhihetutvāt pramāṇaprameyavyvasthāṃ labhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1470: seyaṃ pratyakṣādibhir eva pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanam upalabdhir na pramāṇāntarataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1473: na; arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyāt --- pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratyakṣādibhir eva grahaṇam ity ayuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1474: anyena hy anyasya grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1475: na, arthabhedasya lakṣaṇasāmānyāt --- pratyakṣalakṣaṇenāneko 'rthaḥ saṃgṛhītas tatra kenacit kasyacid grahaṇam ity adoṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1478: jñātṛmanasoś ca darśanāt --- ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ duḥkhī ceti tenaiva jñātrā tasyaiva grahaṇaṃ dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1479: ``yugapajjñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam'' iti ca tenaiva manasā tasyaivānumānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1480: jñātur jñeyasya cābhedo grahaṇasya grāhyasya cābheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1481: nimittabhedo 'treti cet samānam --- na nimittāntareṇa vinā jñātā ātmānaṃ jānīte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1482: na ca nimittāntareṇa vinā manasā mano gṛhyata iti samānam etat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1483: pratyakṣādbhiḥ pratyakṣādīnāṃ grahaṃam ity atrāpy arthabhedo na gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1484: pratyakṣādīnāṃ cāviṣayasyānupapatteḥ --- yadi syāt kiṃcid arthajātaṃ pratyakṣādīnām aviṣayaḥ yat pratyakṣādibhir na śakyaṃ grahītum,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1486: tat tu na śakyaṃ kenacid upapādayitum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1487: pratyakṣādīnāṃ yathādarśanam evedaṃ sac cāsac ca sarvaṃ viṣaya iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1488: NyS_2,1.20 : kvacin nivṛttidarśanād anivṛttidarśanāc ca kvacid anekāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1489: kecit tu dṛṣṭāntam aparigṛhītaṃ hetunā viśeṣahetum antareṇa sādhyasādhanāyopādadate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1490: yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ pradīpāntaraprakāśam antareṇa gṛhyate tathā pramāṇāni pramāṇāntaram antareṇa gṛhyata iti/ sa cāyam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1492: evaṃ prameyasādhanāyāpy upādeyo 'viśeṣahetutvāt --- yathā ca sthālyādirūpagrahaṇe pradīpaprakāśaḥ prameyasādhanāyopādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1495: so 'yaṃ viśeṣahetuparigraham antareṇa dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upādeyo na pratipakṣa ity anekāntaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1496: ekasmiṃś ca pakṣe dṛṣṭānta ity anekānto viśeṣahetvabhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1497: viśeṣahetuparigrahe sati upasaṃhārābhyanujñānād apratiṣedhaḥ --- viśeṣahetuparigṛhītas tu dṛṣṭānta ekasmin pakṣe upasaṃhriyamāṇo na śakyo 'nujñātum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1498: evaṃ ca saty anekānta ity ayaṃ pratiṣedho na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1500: na saṃvidviṣayanimittānām upalabdhyā vyavahāropapatteḥ --- pratyakṣeṇārtham upalabhe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1507: āgamikaṃ me jñānam iti saṃvidviṣayaṃ saṃvinnimittaṃ copalabhamānasya dharmārthasukhāpavargaprayojanas tatpratyanīkaparivarjanaprayojanaś ca vyavahāra upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1510: na cāsti vyavahārāntaram anavasthāsādhanīyaṃ yena pratyuktānavasthām upādadīteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1511: sāmānyena pramāṇāni parīkṣya viśeṣeṇa parīkṣyante/ tatra ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1514: na cāsaṃyukte dravye saṃyogajanyasya guṇasyotpattir iti jñānotpattidarśanād ātmamanaḥsannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1516: manaḥsannikarṣānapekṣasya cendriyārthasannikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatve yugapad utpadyeran buddhaya iti manaḥsannikarṣo 'pi kāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1519: ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣābhāve notpadyate pratyakṣam indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvavad iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1522: digādiṣu satsu jñānabhāvāt tāny api kāraṇānīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1523: akāraṇabhāve 'pi jñānotpattir digādisannidher avarjanīyatvāt --- yadāpy akāraṇaṃ digādīni jñānotpattau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1526: na hi digādīnāṃ sannidhiḥ śakyaḥ parivarjayitum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1533: na cāsaṃyukte dravye saṃyogajasya guṇasyotpattir astīti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1536: yugapaj jñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam ity ucyamāne sidhyaty eva manaḥsannikarṣāpekṣa indriyārthasannikarṣo jñānakāraṇam iti//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1537: NyS_2,1.26: pratyakṣanimittatvāc cendriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1543: ekadā khalv ayaṃ prabodhakālaṃ praṇidhāya suptaḥ praṇidhānavaśāt prabudhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1544: yadā tu tīvrau dhvanisparśau prabodhakāraṇaṃ bhavatas tadā prasuptasyendriyasannikarṣanimittaṃ prabodhajñānam utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1545: tatra na jñātur manasaś ca sannikarṣasya prādhānyaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1547: na hy ātmā jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manas tadā prerayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1548: ekadā khalv ayaṃ viṣayāntarāsaktamanāḥ saṅkalpavaśād viṣayāntaraṃ jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnapreritena manasā indriyaṃ saṃyojya tad viṣayāntaraṃ jānīte/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1549: yadā tu khalv asya niḥsaṅkalpasya nirjijñāsasya ca vyāsaktamanaso bāhyaviṣayopanipātanāj jñānam utpadyate tadendriyārthasannikarṣasya prādhānyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1551: na hy atrāsau jijñāsamānaḥ prayatnena manaḥ prerayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1552: prādhānyāc cendriyārthasannikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ kāryaṃ guṇatvād nātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasyeti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1555: tair indriyair arthaiś ca vyapadiśyante jñānaviśeṣāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1559: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ rasanāvijñānaṃ gandhavijñānaṃ rūpavijñānaṃ rasavijñānam iti ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1564: suptavyāsaktamanasām indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya jñānanimittatvād iti/ so 'yam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1566: yadi tāvat kvacid ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasya jñānakāraṇatvaṃ neṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1571: atha mā bhūd vyāghāta iti sarvavijñānānām ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam iṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1573: jñānakāraṇatvād ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣasya grahaṇaṃ kāryam iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1578: arthaviśeṣaprābalyād dhi suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ jñānotpattir ekadā bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1583: asati praṇidhāne saṅkalpe cāsati suptavyāsaktamanasāṃ yad indriyārthasannikarṣād utpadyate jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1584: tatra manaḥsaṃyogo 'pi kāraṇam iti manasi kriyākāraṇaṃ vācyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1585: yathaiva jñātuḥ khalv ayam icchājanitaḥ prayatno manasaḥ preraka ātmaguṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1586: evam ātmani guṇāntaraṃ sarvasya sādhakaṃ pravṛttidoṣajanitam asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1588: tena hy apreryamāṇe manasi saṃyogābhāvāj jñānānutpattau sarvārthatāsya nivarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1590: anyathā hi caturvidhānām aṇūnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ manasāṃ ca tato 'nyasya kriyāhetor asambhavāt śarīrendriyaviṣayāṇām anutpattiprasaṅgaḥ//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1592: yad idam indriyārthasannikarṣād utpadyate jñānaṃ vṛkṣa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1598: tatra yathā dhūmaṃ gṛhītvā vahnim anuminoti tādṛg eva tad bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1599: kiṃ punar gṛhyamāṇād ekadeśād arthāntaram anumeyaṃ manyase?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1600: avayavasamūhapakṣe avayavāntarāṇi dravyāntarotpattipakṣe tāni cāvavavī ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1604: na tarhi vṛkṣabuddhir anumānam evaṃ sati bhavitum arhatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1605: % vṛkṣabuddhir anumānam evaṃ sati bhavitum arhatīti/] p.467
GSP29nysvbh1u:1609: ekadeśagrahaṇam āśritya pratyakṣasyānumānatvam upapādyate/ tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1610: NyS_2,1.32: na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvad apy upalambhāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1615: yāvac cārthajātaṃ tasya viṣayas tāvad abhyupajñāyamānaṃ pratyakṣavyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1618: na caikadeśagrahaṇam anumānaṃ bhāvayituṃ śakyaṃ hetvabhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1619: anyathāpi ca pratyakṣasya nānumānatvaprasaṅgas tatpūrvakatvāt --- pratyakṣapūrvakam anumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1620: sambaddhāv agnidhūmau pratyakṣato dṛṣṭavato dhūmapratyakṣadarśanād agnāv anumānaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1626: so 'ya. pratyakṣānumānayor lakṣaṇabhedo mahān āśrayitavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1631: asti hy ayam ekadeśavyatirikto 'vayavī tasyāvayavasthānasyopalabdhikāraṇaprāptasyaikadeśopalabdhāv anupalabdhir anupapanneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1633: na kāraṇato 'nyasyaikadeśasyābhāvāt --- na cāvayavāḥ kṛtsnā gṛhyante avayavair evāvayavāntaravyavadhānāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1638: kṛtsnam iti vai khalv aśeṣatāyāṃ satyāṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1640: tac caitad avayaveṣu bahuṣv asti avyavadhāne grahaṇād vyavadhāne cāgrahaṇād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1641: aṅga tu bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭāṃ gṛhyamāṇasyāvayavinaḥ kim agṛhītaṃ manyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1644: na hy asya kāraṇebhyo 'nye ekadeśā bhavantīti tatrāvayavavṛttaṃ nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1646: idaṃ tasya vṛttam --- yeṣām indriyasannikarṣād grahaṇam avayavānāṃ taiḥ saha gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1647: yeṣām avayavānāṃ vyavadhānād agrahaṇaṃ taiḥ saha na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1649: samudāyaśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣaḥ syāt tatprāptir vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1651: mūlaskandhaśākhāpalāśādīnām aśeṣatā vā samudāyo vṛkṣa iti syāt prāptir vā samudāyinām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1652: ubhayathā samudāyabhūtasya vṛkṣasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1653: avayavais tāvad avayavāntarasya vyavadhānād aśeṣagrahaṇaṃ nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1655: seyam ekadeśagrahaṇasahacaritā vṛkṣavuddhir dravyāntarotpattau kalpate na samudayamātre iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1659: sādhyaṃ tāvad etat kāraṇebhyo dravyāntaram utpadyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1661: evaṃ ca sati vipratipattimātraṃ bhavati vipratipatteś cāvayavini saṃśaya iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1663: yady avayavī nāsti sarvasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1667: paramāṇusamavasthānaṃ tāvad darśanaviṣayo na bhavaty atīndriyatvād aṇūnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1669: darśanaviṣayasthāś ceme dravyādayo gṛhante te niradhiṣṭhānā na gṛhyeran/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1670: gṛhyante tu kumbho 'yaṃ śyāma eko mahān saṃyuktaḥ spandate asti mṛnmayaś ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1679: yadi tv avayavikārite abhaviṣyatāṃ pāṃśurāśiprabhṛtiśv apy ajñāsyetām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1680: dravyāntarānutpattau ca tṛṇopalakāṣṭhādiṣu jatusaṃgṛhīteṣv api nābhāviṣyatām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1681: athāvayavinaṃ pratyācakṣāṇako mā bhūt pratyakṣalopa ity aṇusañcayaṃ darśanaviṣayaṃ pratijānānaḥ kim anuyoktavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1682: ekam idaṃ dravyam ity ekavuddher viṣayaṃ paryanuyojyaḥ --- kim ekabuddhir abhinnārthaviṣayeti āhosvit bhinnārthaviṣayeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1686: nānārthaviṣayeti cet --- bhinneṣv ekadarśanānupapattiḥ anekasminn eka iti vyāhatā buddhir na dṛśyata iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1687: NyS_2,1.36: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cen nātīndriyatvād aṇūnām //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1688: yathā senāṅgeṣu vanāṅgeṣu ca dūrād agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate buddhiḥ evam aṇuṣu sañciteṣv agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1689: yathā gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ senāvanāṅgānām ārāt kāraṇāntarataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1690: yathā gṛhyamāṇajātīnāṃ palāśa iti vā khadira iti vā nārāj jātigrahaṇaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1692: gṛhyamāṇe cārthajāte pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād ekam iti bhāktaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1693: na tv aṇūnāṃ gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ kāraṇataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād bhākta ekapratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1695: idam eva ca parīkṣyate kim ekapratyayo ṇusañcayaviṣaya āhosvit neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1697: na ca parīkṣyamāṇam udāharaṇam iti yuktaṃ sādhyatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1698: dṛṣṭam iti cen na tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1699: yad api manyeta dṛṣṭam idaṃ senāvanāṅgānāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1700: na ca dṛṣṭaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1702: tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ --- darśanaviṣaya evāyaṃ parīkṣyate yo 'yam ekam iti pratyayo dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1703: sa parīkṣyate kiṃ dravyāntaraviṣayo vā athāṇusañcayaviṣaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1704: atra darśanam anyatarasya sādhakaṃ na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1705: nānābhāve cāṇūnāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1706: yathā sthāṇau puruṣa iti/ tataḥ kim?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1708: atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1709: sthāṇau puruṣa iti pratyayasya kiṃ pradhānam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1711: tasmin sati puruṣasāmānyagrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣo .yam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1712: evaṃ nānābhūteṣv ekam iti sāmānyagrahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1714: tasmād abhinna evāyam abhedapratyaya ekam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1716: na viśeṣahetvabhāvād dṛṣṭāntāvyavasthā --- śrotrādiviṣayeṣu śabdādiṣv abhinneṣv ekapratyayaḥ pradhānam anekasminn ekapratyayasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1717: evaṃ ca sati dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ na vyavatiṣṭhate viśeṣahetvabhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1718: aṇuṣu saṃśiteṣv ekapratyayaḥ kim atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ sthāṇau puruṣapratyayavat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1719: athārthasya tathābhāvāt tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ yathā śabdasyaikatvād ekaḥ śabda iti viśeṣahetuparigrahaṇam antareṇa dṛṣṭāntau saṃśayam āpādayata
GSP29nysvbh1u:1724: ekatvabuddhis tasmiṃs tad iti pratyaya iti viśeṣahetur mahad iti pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:1725: --- ekam idaṃ mahac ceti ekaviṣayau pratyayau samānādhikaraṇau bhavataḥ tena vijñāyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1727: aṇusamūhātiśayagrahaṇaṃ mahatpratyaya iti cet so .yam amahatsu aṇuṣu mahatpratyayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayo bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1728: kiṃ cātaḥ? atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhir iti bhavitavyaṃ mahaty eva mahatpratyayeneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1729: aṇuḥ śabdo mahān iti ca vyavasāyāt pradhānasiddhir iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1730: na mandatīvratāgrahaṇam iyattānavadhāraṇāt --- yathā dravye aṇuḥ śabdo 'lpo manda ity etasya grahaṇaṃ mahan śabdaḥ paṭus tīvra ity etasya grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1732: na hy ayaṃ mahān śabda iti vyavasyann iyān ayam ity avadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1734: saṃyukte ime iti ca dvitvasamānāśrayaprāptigrahaṇam --- dvau samudāyāv āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti cet ko 'yaṃ samudāyaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1735: prāptir anekasyānekā vā prāptir ekasya samudāya iti cet prāpter agrahaṇaṃ prāptyāśritāyāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1736: saṃyukte ime vastunī iti nātra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1739: dvāv imau saṃyuktāv arthāv iti grahaṇe sati nānekasamūhāśrayaḥ saṃyogo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1740: na ca dvayor aṇvor grahaṇam asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1741: tasmān mahatī dvitvāśrayabhūte dravye saṃyogasya sthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1742: pratyāsattiḥ pratīghātāvasānā saṃyogo nārthāntaram iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1745: na ca dravyayor guṇāntaropajananam antareṇa śabde rūpādiṣu spande ca kāraṇatvaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1749: saṃyogabuddheś ca yady arthāntaraṃ na viṣayaḥ arthāntarapratiṣedhas tarhi viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1750: tatra pratiṣidhyamānavacanam --- saṃyukte dravye iti yad arthāntaram anyatra dṛṣṭam iha pratiṣidhyate tadvaktavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1751: dvayor mahator āśritasya grahaṇān nāṇvāśraya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1755: aṇusamavasthānaṃ viṣaya iti cet prāptāprāptasāmarthyavacanam --- kim aprāpte aṇusamavasthāne tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyate atha prāpte iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1756: aprāpte grahaṇam iti cet vyavahitasyāṇusamavasthānasyāpy upalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1761: yāvat prāptaṃ bhavati tāvaty abhivyaktir iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1763: yāvati prāpte jātiviśeṣe gṛhyate tāvad asyādhikaraṇam iti prāptaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1765: evaṃ ca sati yo 'yam aṇusamudāyo vṛkṣa iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣabahutvaṃ pratīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1766: yatra yatra hy aṇusamudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣatvaṃ gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1771: apramāṇam iti ekadāpy arthasya na pratipādakam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1773: tadā copariṣṭād vṛṣṭo deva iti mithyānumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1775: tadā ca bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti mithyānumānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1776: puruṣo 'pi mayūravāśitam anukaroti tadā 'pi śabdasādṛśyān mithyānumānaṃ bhavati//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1781: pūrvodakaviśiṣṭaṃ khalu varṣodakaṃ śīgrataratvaṃ srātaso bahutaraphenaphalaparṇakāṣṭhādivahanaṃ copalabhamānaḥ pūrṇatvena nadyā upari vṛṣṭo deva ity anuminoti nodakavṛddhimātreṇa/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1782: pipīlikāprāyasyāṇḍasañcāre bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir ity anumīyate na kāsāñcid iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1783: nedaṃ mayūravāśitaṃ tatsadṛśo 'yaṃ śabda iti viśeṣāparijñānān mithyānumānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1784: yas tu sadṛśād viśiṣṭāc chabdād viśisṭamayūravāśitaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya viśiṣṭo 'rtho gṛhyamāṇo liṅgam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1788: trikālaviṣayam anumānaṃ traikālyagrahaṇād ity uktam/ ata ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1790: vṛntāt pracyutasya phalasya bhūmau pratyāsīdato yadūrdhvaṃ sa patito 'dhvā tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitakālaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1793: nedānīṃ tṛtīyo 'dhvā vidyate yatra patatīti vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1794: tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo na vidyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1795: NyS_2,1.40: tayor apy abhāvo vartamānābhāve tadapekṣatvāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1798: yadā patanakriyā vyuparatā bhavati sa kālaḥ patitakālaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1800: yadā dravye vartamānā kriyā gṛhyate sa vartamānaḥ kālaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1801: yadi cāyaṃ dravye vartamānaṃ patanaṃ na gṛhṇāti kasyoparamam utpatsyamānatāṃ vā pratipadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1806: so 'yaṃ kriyādravyayoḥ sambandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1807: tadāśrayau cetarau kālau tadahāve na syātām iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1810: yady atītānāgatāv itaretarāpekṣau sidhyetāṃ pratipadyemahi vartamānavilopam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1814: kena ca kalpenānāgata iti naitac chakyaṃ nirvaktum avyākaraṇīyam etad vartamānalopa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1815: yac ca manyeta hrasvadīrghayoḥ sthalanimnayoś chāyātapayoś ca yathetaretarāpekṣayā siddhir evam atītānāgatayor iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1818: yathā rūpasparśau gandharasau netaretarāpekṣau siddhyataḥ evam atītānāgatāv iti netaretarāpekṣā kasyacit siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1820: yasmād ekābhāve ṇyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāvaḥ --- yady ekasyānyatarāpekṣā siddhir anyatarasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1821: yady anyatarasyaikāpekṣā siddhir ekasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1822: evam ekasyābhāve anyataran na sidhyatīty ubhayābhāvaḥ prasajyate//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1824: vidyate dravyaṃ vidyate guṇaḥ vidyate karmeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1833: ubhayathā ca vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyate kvacid arthasadbhāvavyaṅgyaḥ yathāsti dravyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1835: nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā kriyāsantānaḥ kriyābhyāsaś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1836: nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā pacatīti sthālyadhiśrayaṇam udakāsecanaṃ taṇḍulāvapanam edho'pasarpaṇam agnyabhijvālanaṃ darvīghaṭṭanaṃ maṇḍasrāvaṇam adho'vatāraṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1837: chinattīti kriyābhyāsa udyamyodyamya paraśuṃ dāruṇi nipātayan chinattīty ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1838: yac cedaṃ pacyamānaṃ chidyamānaṃ ca tat kriyamāṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1842: prayojanāvasānaḥ kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṣīd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1843: % kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṛīd iti/] p.526
GSP29nysvbh1u:1848: tad evaṃ kriyāsantānasthas traikālyasamāhāraḥ pacati pacyata iti vartamānagrahaṇena gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1849: kriyāsantānasya hy atrāvicchedo 'bhidhīyate nārambho noparama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1850: so 'yam ubhayathā vartamāno gṛhyate apavṛkto vyapavṛktaś cātītānāgatābhyām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1853: anyaś ca pratyāsattiprabhṛter arthasya vivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyī bahuprakāro lokeṣu utprekṣitavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1857: na caivaṃ bhavati yathā gaur evaṃ gaur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1860: na hi bhavati yathānaḍvān evaṃ mahiṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1862: na hi sarveṇa sarvam upamīyata iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1864: na sādharmyasya kṛtsnaprāyālpabhāvam āśrityopamānaṃ pravartate/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1866: yatra caitad asti na tatropamānaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1870: yathā dhūmena pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya vahner grahaṇam anumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1871: evaṃ gavā pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya gavayasya grahaṇam iti nedam anumānād viśiṣyate//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1874: NyS_2,1.47: nāpratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1875: yadā hy ayam upayuktopamāno godarśī gavayasamānam arthaṃ paśyati tadāyaṃ gavaya ity asya saṃjñāśabdasya vyavasthāṃ pratipadyate na caivam anumānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1876: parārthaṃ copamānam --- yasya hy upamānam aprasiddhaṃ tadarthaṃ prasiddhobhayena kriyata iti parārtham upamānam iti cet; na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1877: svayam adhyavasāyāt --- bhavati ca bhoḥ svayam adhyavasāyaḥ yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1878: nādhyavasāyaḥ pratiṣidhyate upamānaṃ tu tan na bhavati ``prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1879: na ca yasyobhayaṃ prasiddhaṃ taṃ prati sādhyasādhanabhāavo vidyata iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1890: yathānupalabhyamāno liṅgī mitena liṅgena paścān mīyata iti anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1891: evaṃ mitena śabdena paścān mīyate artho 'nupalabhyamāna ity anumānaṃ śabdaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1895: anyathā hy upalabdhir anumāne anyathopamāne tad vyākhyātam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1896: śabdānumānayos tūpalabdhir advipravṛttiḥ yathānumāne tathā śabde 'pi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1900: sambaddhayoś ca śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaprasiddhau śabdopalabdher arthagrahaṇaṃ yathā sambaddhayor liṅgaliṅinoḥ sambandhapratītau liṅgopalabdhau liṅgigrahaṇam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1901: yat tāvad arthasyānumeyatvād iti tan na---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1903: svargaḥ apsarasaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sapta dvīpāḥ samudro lokasanniveśa ity evamāder apratyakṣasyārthasya ca śabdamātrāt pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1904: āptair ayam uktāḥ śabda ity ataḥ sampratyayaḥ viparyayeṇa sampratyayābhāvāt;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1908: tatra viśeṣe saty ahetur viśeṣābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1914: kasmāt? pramāṇato 'nupalabdheḥ---pratyakṣatas tāvac chabdārthaprāpter nopalabdhir atīndriyatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1915: yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdas tasya viṣayabhāvam ativṛtto 'rtho na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1916: asti cātīndriyaviṣayabhūto 'py arthaḥ samānena cendriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇayoḥ prāptir gṛhyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1918: prāptilakṣaṇe ca gṛhyamāṇe sambandhe śabdārthayoḥ śabdāntike vārthaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1923: na cāyam anumānato 'py upalabhyate śabdāntike 'rtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1924: etasmin pakṣe 'py āsyasthānakaraṇoccāraṇīyaḥ śabdas tadantike 'rtha ity annāgnyasiśabdoccāraṇe pūraṇapāhapāṭanāni gṛhyeran,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1927: arthāntike śabda iti sthānakaraṇāsambhavād anuccāraṇam---sthānaṃ kaṇṭhādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1933: śabdād arthapratyayasya vyavasthādarśanād anumīyata asti śabdārthasambandho vyavasthākāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1940: yat tad avocāma asyedam iti ṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo 'nujñātaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti samayaṃ tam avocāma iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1942: asya śabdasyedam arthajātam abhidheyam ity abhidhānābhidheyaniyamaniyogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1947: samayaparipālanārthaṃ cedaṃ padalakṣaṇāyā vācānvākhyānaṃ vyākaraṇam vākyalakṣaṇāyā vāco 'rthalakṣaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1950: tad evaṃ prāptilakṣaṇasya śabdārthasambandhasyārthatuṣo 'pi anumānahetur na bhavatīti//55//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1954: svābhāvike hi śabdasyārthapratyāyakatve yathākāmaṃ na syād yathā taijasasya prakāśasya rūpapratyayahetutvaṃ na jātiviśeṣe vyabhicaratīti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1961: dṛṣṭārthasya vākyasyānṛtatvād adṛṣṭārtham api vākyam ``agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma'' ityādy anṛtam iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1963: havane ``udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samayādhyuṣite hotavyam'' iti vidhāya vihitaṃ vyāhanti---``śyāvo 'syāhutim abhyavaharati ya udite juhoti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1964: śabalo 'syāhutim abhyavaharati yo 'nudite juhoti śyāvaśabalau vāsyāhutim abhyavaharato yaḥ samayādhyuṣite juhoti''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1967: abhyāse deśyamāne ``triḥ prathamām anvāha trir uttamām'' iti punaruktadoṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1973: iṣṭyā pitarau saṃyujyamānau putraṃ janayata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1987: loke ca ``agnikāmo dāruṇī mathnīyāt'' iti vidhivākyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1991: tatra phalaṃ na niṣpadyata iti nānṛtadoṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1993: na cedaṃ laukikād bhidyate ``putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta'' iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1996: yo 'bhyupagataṃ havanakālaṃ bhinatti tato 'nyatra juhoti tatrāyam abhyupagatakālabhede doṣa ucyate ``śyāvo 'syāhutim abhyavaharati ya udite
GSP29nysvbh1u:2002: yo 'yam abhyāsaḥ ``triḥ prathamām anvāha trir uttamām'' ity anuvāda upapadyate arthavattvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2003: trirvacanena hi prathamottamayoḥ pañcadaśatvaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2005: tathā ca mantrābhivādaḥ ``idam ahaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ pañcadaśāvareṇa vāgvajreṇāvabodhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2006: yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma'' iti pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vajramantro 'bhivadati
GSP29nysvbh1u:2007: tad abhyāsam antareṇa na syād iti //60 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2012: tridhā khalu brāhmaṇavākyāni viniyuktāni---vidhivacanāny arthavādavacanāni anuvādavacanānīti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2015: yad vākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ codakaṃ sa vidhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2018: NyS_2,1.64: stutir nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpa ity arthavādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2019: vidheḥ phalavādalakṣaṇā yā praśaṃsā sā stutiḥ sampratyayārthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2022: phalaśravaṇāt pravartate---``sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāptenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati'' iti evamādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2023: aniṣṭaphalavādo nindā varjanārthā ninditaṃ na samācared iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2024: sa eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yaj jotiṣṭomo ya etenādiṣṭvānyana yajate garttapatyam eva taj jīyate vā pramīyate vā ity evamādiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2025: anyakartṛkasya vyāhatasya vidher vādaḥ parakṛtiḥ ``hutvā vapām evāgre 'bhighārayanti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2026: atha pṛṣad ājyaṃ taduha carakādhvaryavaḥ pṛṣadājyam evāgre 'bhidhārayanti agneḥ prāṇāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2027: pṛṣadājyastomam ity evam abhidadhati'' ity evamādi /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2029: ``tasmād vā etena brāhmaṇā bahiṣ pavamānaṃ sāmastomama stoṣan yone yajñaṃ pratanavāmahe ity evamādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2031: stutinindāvākyenābhisambandhād vidhyāśrayasya kasyacid arthasya dyotanād arthavāda iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2038: vihitam adhikṛtya stutir bodhyate nindā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2042: loke 'pi ca vidhir arthavādo 'nuvāda iti ca trividhaṃ vākyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2044: arthavādavākyam---āyurvarco balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānaṃ cānne pratiṣṭhitam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2049: yathā laukike vākye vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvam evam vedavākyānām api vibhāgenārthagrahaṇāt pramāṇatvaṃ bhavitum arhatīti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2051: punaruktam asādhu sādhur anuvāda iti ayaṃ viśeṣo nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2052: kasmāt? ubhayatra hi pratītārthaḥ śabdo 'bhyasyate caritārthasya śabdasyābhyāsād ubhayam asādhv iti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2061: evam anyo 'py abhyāsaḥ pacati pacatīti kriyānuparamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2063: pari pari trigartebhyo vṛṣṭo deva iti parivarjanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2064: adhy adhi kuḍyaṃ niṣaṇṇam iti sāmīpyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2066: evam anuvādasya stutinindāśeṣavidhiṣv adhikārārthatā vihitānantarārthatā ceti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2067: kiṃ punaḥ pratiṣedhahetūddhārād eva śabdasya pramāṇatvaṃ sidhyati? na, ataś ca---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2070: yat tad āyurvedenopadiśyate idaṃ kṛtveṣṭam adhigacchati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2073: mantrapadānāṃ ca viṣayabhūtāśanipratiṣedhārthānāṃ prayoge 'rthasya tathābhāva etatprāmāṇyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2079: āptāḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmāṇaḥ idaṃ hātavyam idam asya hānihetur idam asyādhigantavyam idam asyādhigamahetuḥ iti bhūtāny anukampante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2080: teṣāṃ khalu vai prāṇabhṛtāṃ svayam anavabudhyamānānāṃ nānyad upadeśād avabodhakāraṇam asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2081: %vai prāṇabhṛtāṃ svayam anavabudhyamānānāṃ nānyad upadeśād avabodhakāraṇam asti/] p.567
GSP29nysvbh1u:2085: hanta vayam ebhyo yathādarśanaṃ yathābhūtam upadiśyāmaḥ ta ime śrutvā pratipadyamānā heyaṃ hāsyanty adhigantavyam evādhigamiṣyantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2086: evam āptopadeśaḥ etena trividhenāptaprāmāṇyena parigṛhīto 'nuṣṭhīyamāno 'rthasya sādhako bhavati;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2089: dṛṣṭārthenāptopadeśenāyurvedenādṛṣṭārtho vedabhāgo 'numātavyaḥ pramāṇam ity āptaprāmāṇyasya hetoḥ samānatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2090: asyāpi caikadeśo ``grāmakāmo yajeta'' ity evamādir dṛṣṭārthaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2093: laukikasyāpy upadeṣṭur upadeṣṭavyārthajñānena parānujighṛkṣayā yathābhūtārthacikhyāpayiṣayā ca prāmāṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2094: % jñānena parānujighṛkṣayā yathābhūtārthacikhyāpayiṣayā ca prāmāṇyam,] p.568
GSP29nysvbh1u:2097: ya evāptā vedārthānāṃ draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraś ca ta evāyurvedaprabhṛtīnām ity āyurvedaprāmāṇyavad vedaprāmāṇyam anumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2098: nityatvād vedavākyānāṃ pramāṇatve tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyād ity ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2099: śabdasya vācakatvād arthapratipattau pramāṇatvaṃ na nityatvād/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2100: nityatve hi sarvasya sarveṇa vacanāc chabdārthavyavasthānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2109: anāptopadeśo laukiko na nitya iti kāraṇaṃ vācyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2110: yathāyogaṃ cārthasya pratyāyanād nāmadheyaśabdānāṃ loke prāmāṇyaṃ nityatvāt prāmāṇyānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2111: yatrārthe nāmadheyaśabdo niyujyate loke tasya niyogasāmarthyāt pratyāyako bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2122: kiṃ tarhi? aitihyam arthāpattiḥ sambhavo 'bhāva ity etāny api pramāṇāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2129: yathā megheṣv asatsu vṛṣṭir na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2138: vidhārake hi vāyvabhrasaṃyoge gurutvād apāṃ patanakarma na bhavatīti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2141: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca manyamānena pratiṣedha ucyate/ so 'yam---
