GSP29nysvbh1u:2150: vākyārthasampratyayenānabhihitasyārthasya pratyanīkabhāvād grahaṇam arthāpattir anumānam eva/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2151: avinābhāvavṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ sambhavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2152: % vṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ sambhavaḥ,] p.577
GSP29nysvbh1u:2154: asmin satīdaṃ nopapadyata iti virodhitve prasiddhe kāryānupapattyā kāraṇasya pratibandhakam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2156: satyam etāni pramāṇāni na tu pramāṇāntarāṇīty uktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2160: asatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭir na bhavatīti satsu bhavatīty etad arthād āpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2165: asati kāraṇe kāryaṃ notpadyata iti vākyāt pratyanīkabhūto 'rthaḥ sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata ity arthād āpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2167: so 'yaṃ kāryotpādaḥ sati kāraṇe 'rthād āpadyamāno na kāraṇasya sattāṃ vyabhicarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2168: na khalv asati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyate tasmān nānaikāntikī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2169: yat tu sati kāraṇe nimittapratibandāt kāryaṃ notpadyata iti kāraṇadharmo 'sau na tv arthāpatteḥ prameyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2171: sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata iti yo 'sau kāryotpādaḥ kāraṇasya sattāṃ na vyabhicatati tad asyāḥ prameyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2172: evaṃ tu saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2173: % saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyata iti/] p.580
GSP29nysvbh1u:2175: arthāpattir na pramāṇam anaikāntikatvād iti vākyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2178: anaikāntikatvād apramāṇenānena na kaścid arthaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2179: atha manyase niyataviṣayeṣv artheṣu svaviṣaye vyabhicāro bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2180: na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvo viṣayaḥ? evaṃ tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2182: arthāpatter api kāryotpādena kāraṇasattāyā avyabhicāro viṣayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2183: na ca kāraṇadharmo nimittapratibandhāt kāryānutpādakatvam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2184: abhāvasya tarhi pramāṇabhāvābhyanujñā nopapadyate/ katham iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2186: abhāvasya bhūyasi prameye lokasiddhe vaiyātyād ucyate nābhāvaprāmāṇyaṃ prameyāsiddher iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2190: katham? lakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu anupādeyeṣv upādeyānām alakṣitānām alakṣaṇalakṣitatvād lakṣaṇābhāvena lakṣitatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2191: ubhayasannidhāv alakṣitāni vāsāṃsy ānayeti prayukto yeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni na bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2194: NyS_2,2.9: asaty arthe nābhāva iti cen nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2195: yatra bhūtvā kiñcin na bhavati tatra tasyābhāva upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2196: na cālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣitāni bhūtvā na bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2199: nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ---yathāyam anyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānām upapattiṃ paśyati naivam alakṣiteṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2200: so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ paśyann abhāvenārthaṃ pratipadyata iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2202: teṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣiteṣu siddhir vidhyamānatā yeṣāṃ bhavati na teṣām abhāvo lakṣaṇānām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2203: yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣām alakṣiteṣv abhāva ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2204: yāni khalu bhavanti teṣām abhāvo vyāhata iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2206: na brūmo yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣām abhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2207: kin tu keṣucil lakṣaṇāny avasthitāni anavasthitāni keṣucit,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2208: apekṣamāṇo yeṣu lakṣaṇānāṃ bhāvaṃ na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyata iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2210: abhāvadvaitaṃ khalu bhavati prāk cotpatter avidyamānatā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2212: tatrālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāg utpatter avidyamānatālakṣaṇo lakṣaṇānām abhāvo netara iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2213: ``āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ'' iti pramāṇabhāve viśeṣaṇaṃ bruvatā nānāprakāraḥ śabda iti jñāpyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2216: ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdao vibhur nityo 'bhivyaktidharmaka ity eke/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2217: gandhādisahavṛttir dravyeṣu sanniviṣṭo gandhādivad avasthito 'bhivyaktidharmaka ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2218: ākāśaguṇaḥ śabda utpattinirodhadharmako buddhivad ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2219: mahābhūtasaṃkṣobhajaḥ śabdo 'nāśrita utpattidharmako nirodhadharmaka ity anye/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2220: ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kim atra tattvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2222: NyS_2,2.13: ādhimattvād aindriyakatvāt kṛtakavad upacārāc ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2223: ādir yoniḥ kāraṇam ādīyate asmād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2225: saṃyogavibhāgajaś ca śabdaḥ kāraṇavattvād anitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2226: kā punar iyam arthadeśanā kāraṇavattvād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2228: anityaḥ śabda iti---bhūtvā na bhavati vināśadharmaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2232: kim ayaṃ vyañjakena samānadeśo 'bhivyajyate rūpādivat atha saṃyogajāc chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsanno gṛhyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2233: saṃyoganivṛttau śabdagrahaṇāt na vyañjakena samānadeśasya grahaṇam---dāruvraścane dāruparaśusaṃyoganivṛttau dūrasthena śabdo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2237: utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyogajāc chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsannasya grahaṇam iti yuktaṃ saṃyoganivṛttau śabdasya grahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2238: itaś ca śabda utpadyate nābhivyajyate---kṛtakavad upacārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2240: tīvraṃ sukhaṃ mandaṃ sukhaṃ tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ mandaṃ duḥkham iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2241: upacaryate ca tīvraḥ śabdo mandaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2242: vyañjakasya tathābhāvād grahaṇasya tīvramandatā rūpavad iti ced na abhibhavopapatteḥ---saṃyogasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2243: vyañjakasya tīvramandatayā śabdagrahaṇasya tīvramandatā bhavati na tu śabdo bhidyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2246: evam abhibhavopapatteḥ---tīvro bherīśabdo mandaṃ tantrīśabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2251: abhibhavānupapattiś ca vyañjakasamānadeśasyābhivyaktau prāptyabhāvāt---vyañjakena samānadeśe 'bhivyajyate śabda ity etasmin pakṣe nopapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2252: na hi bherīśabdena tantrīsvanaḥ prāpta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2253: aprāpte 'bhibhava iti cet śabdamātrābhibhavaprasaṅgaḥ---atha manyeta asatyām prāptāv abhibhavo bhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2254: evaṃ sati yathā bherīśabdaḥ kañcit tantrīsvanam abhibhavati evam antikasthopādānam iva davīyaḥstho pādānān api tantrīsvanān abhibhaved aprāpter
GSP29nysvbh1u:2255: tatra kvacid eva bheryāṃ praṇāditāyāṃ sarvalokeṣu samānakālās tantrīsvanā na śrūyeran iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2256: nānābhūteṣu śabdasantāneṣu satsu śrotrapratyāsattibhāvena kasyacic chabdasya tīvreṇa mandasyābhibhavo yukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2261: NyS_2,2.14: na ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvān nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārāc ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2268: yo 'sau kāraṇavibhāgebhyo na bhavati na tasyābhāvo bhāvena kadācin nivartyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2274: nityeṣv anityavad upacāro dṛṣṭaḥ---tathā hi bhavati vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ evam ākāśasya pradeśaḥ ātmanaḥ pradeśa iti bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2276: nityam ity atra kiṃ tāvat tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2279: bhāktaṃ tu bhavati yat tatrātmānam ahāsīd yad bhūtvā na bhavati na jātu tat punar bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2280: tatra nitya iva nityo ghaṭābhāva ity ayaṃ padārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2281: tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdo na tathājātīyakaṃ kāryaṃ kiṃcin nityaṃ dṛśyata ity avyabhicāraḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2282: yad api sāmānyanityatvād itīndriyapratyāsattigrāhyam aindriyakam iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2286: kiṃ tarhi indriyapratyāsattigrāhyatvāt santānānumānaṃ tenānityatvam iti //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2287: yad api nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārād iti/ na---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2290: evam ākāśapradeśaḥ ātmapradeśa iti nātrākāśātmanoḥ kāraṇadravyam abhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2294: saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvam---paricchinnena dravyenākāśasya saṃyogo nākāśaṃ vyāpnoti avyāpya vartata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2296: na hy āmalakayoḥ saṃyoga āśrayaṃ vyāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2297: sāmānyakṛtā ca bhaktir ākāśasya pradeśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2300: parīkṣitā ca tīvramandatā śabdatattvaṃ na bhaktikṛteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2301: kasmāt punaḥ sūtrakārasyāsminn arthe sūtraṃ na śrūyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2302: śīlam idaṃ bhavgavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣv adhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na vyavasthāpayati tatra śāstrasiddhāntāt tattvāvadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum arhatīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:2303: śāstrasiddhāntas tu nyāyasamākhyātam anumataṃ bahuśākham anumānam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2304: athāpi khalv idam asti idaṃ nāstīti kuta etat pratipattavyam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2307: NyS_2,2.18: prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdher āvaraṇādyanupalabdheś ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2311: kasmāt? āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhikāraṇānām agrahaṇāt---anenāvṛtaḥ śabdo nopalabhyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2312: asannikṛṣṭaś cendriyavyavadhānād ity evamādi anupalabdhikāraṇaṃ na gṛhyata iti so
GSP29nysvbh1u:2314: uccāraṇam asya vyañjakaṃ tadabhāvād prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2316: vivakṣājanitena prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2317: % prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,] p.615
GSP29nysvbh1u:2323: so 'yam uccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaś cābhūtvā bhavatīti anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2324: ūrdhvaṃ coccāraṇān na śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati abhāvān na śrūyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2327: evaṃ ca sati tattvaṃ pāṃśubhir ivāvakirann idam āha---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2330: āvaraṇānupalabdhir api tarhy anupalambhāt nāstīti tasyā abhāvād apratiṣiddham āvaraṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2331: kathaṃ punar jānīte bhavān nāvaraṇānupalabdhir upalabhyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2333: kim atra jñeyaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt samānam---ayaṃ khalv āvaraṇam anupalambhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate nāvaraṇam upalabha iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2334: yathā kuḍyenāvṛtasyāvaraṇam upalabhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2336: evaṃ ca saty apahṛtaviṣayam uttaravākyam astīti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2338: NyS_2,2.20: anupalambhād apy anupalabdhisadbhāvān nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2339: yathānupalambhamānāpy āvaraṇānupalabdhir asti evam anupalabhyamānam apy āvaraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2340: astīti yady abhyanujānāti bhavān anupalabhyamānāvaraṇānupalabdhir astīti abhyanujñāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2341: ca vadati nāsty āvaraṇam anupalambhād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2342: etasminn apy abhyanujñāvāde pratipattiniyamo nopapadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2347: upalabdhyabhāvaś cānupalabdhir iti seyam abhāvatvān nopalabhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2348: sac ca khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2349: % khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān nāstīti/] p.619
GSP29nysvbh1u:2350: tatra yad uktaṃ nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhād ity ayuktam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2351: atha śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānānaḥ kasmād dhetoḥ pratijānīte---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2353: asparśam ākāśaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathā ca śabda iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2369: sampradīyamāno 'hy avasthitaḥ sampradātur apaiti sampradānaṃ ca prāpnotīty avarjanīyam etat//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2375: kim ācāryasthaḥ śabdo 'ntevāsinam āpadyate tad adhyāpanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2382: pañcakṛtvaḥ paśyatīti rūpam avasthitaṃ punaḥ punar dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2384: tasmād avasthitasya punaḥ punar uccāraṇam abhyāsa iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2386: anavasthāne 'py abhyāsasyābhidhānaṃ bhavati dvir nṛtyatu bhavān trir nṛtyatu bhavān iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2387: dvir anṛtyat trir anṛtyad dvir agnihotraṃ juhoti dvir bhuṅkte//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2388: evaṃ vyabhicārāt pratiṣiddhahetāv anyaśabdasya prayogaḥ pratiṣidhyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2389: NyS_2,2.31: anyad anyasmād ananyatvād ananyad ity anyatābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2390: yad idam anyad iti manyase tat svārthenānanyatvād anyan na bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2392: tatra yad uktam anyatve 'py abhyāsopacārād iti etad ayuktam iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2394: NyS_2,2.32: tadabhāve nāsty ananyatā tayor itaretarāpekṣasiddheḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2396: upapādya cānyat pratyācaṣṭe ananyad iti ca śabdam anujānāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2399: yadi cātrottaraṃ padaṃ nāsti kasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhena saha samāsaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2400: tasmāt tayor anyānanyaśabdayor itaro 'nanyaśabda itaram anyaśabdam apekṣamāṇaḥ sidhyatīti tatra yad uktam anyatāyā abhāva iti etad ayuktam iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2403: yad anityaṃ tasya vināśaḥ kāraṇād bhavati yathā loṣṭasya kāraṇadravyavibhāgāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2404: śabdaś ced anityas tasya vināśo yasmāt kāraṇād bhavati tad upalabhyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2407: yathā vināśakāraṇānupalabdher avināśaprasaṅga evam aśravaṇakāraṇānupalabdheḥ satataṃ śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2410: atha vidyamānasya nirnimittam aśravanam iti vidyamānasya nirnimitto vināśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2411: samānaś ca dṛṣṭavirodho nimittam antareṇa vināśe cāśravaṇe ceti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2413: anumānāc copalabhyamāne śabdasya vināśakāraṇe vināśakāraṇānupalabdher asattvād ity anapadeśaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2414: yathā yasmād viṣāṇī tasmād aśva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2417: upapāditaḥ śabdasantānaḥ saṃyogavibhāgajāc chabdāc chabdāntaraṃ tato 'ntat tato 'py anyad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2418: tatra kāryaḥ śabdaḥ kāraṇaśabdaṃ niruṇaddhi pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2419: % pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ/] p.629
GSP29nysvbh1u:2420: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tiraḥpratikuḍyam antikasthenāpy aśravaṇaṃ śabdasya śravaṇaṃ dūrasthenāpy asati vyavadhāne iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2421: ghaṇṭāyām abhihanyamānāyāṃ tāras tārataro mando mandatara iti śrutibhedān nānāśabdasantāno 'vicchedena śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2422: tatra nitye śabde ghaṇṭāstham anyagataṃ vāvasthitaṃ santānavṛtti vābhivyaktikāraṇaṃ vācyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2424: yena śrutisantāno bhavatīti śabdabhede vāsati śrutibheda upapādayitavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2425: anitye tu śabde ghaṇṭāsthaṃ santānavṛtti saṃyogasahakāri nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ paṭu mandam anuvartate tastānuvṛttyā śabdasantānānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2431: pāṇikarmaṇā pāṇighaṇṭāpraśleṣo bhavati tasmiṃś ca sati śabdasantāno notpadyate ataḥ śravaṇānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2433: tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhīty anumīyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2435: anutpattau śrutivicchedo yathā pratighātidravyasaṃyogād iṣoḥ kriyāhetau saṃskāre niruddhe gamanābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2440: yadi yasya vināśakāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate tad avatiṣṭhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2442: evaṃ yāni khalv imāni śabdaśravaṇāni śabdābhivyaktaya iti matam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2444: anupapādanād avasthānam avasthānāt teṣāṃ nityatvaṃ prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2446: na tarhi vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ śabdasyāvasthānān nityatvam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2448: vaiyadhikaraṇye hi pratighātidravyapraśleṣāt samānādhikaraṇasyaivoparamaḥ syād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2450: yad idaṃ nākāśaguṇaḥ śabda iti pratiṣidhyate ayam anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2452: rūpādisamānadeśasyāgrahaṇe śabdasantānopapatter asparśavyāpidravyāśrayaḥ śabda iti jñāyate na kampasamānāśraya iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2453: pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha sanniviṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ samānadeśo vyajyata iti nopapadyate/ katham?---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2457: yadi rūpādayaḥ śabdāś ca pratidravyaṃ samastāḥ samuditāḥ samuditās tasmin samāse
GSP29nysvbh1u:2458: samudāye yo yathājātīyakaḥ sanniviṣṭas tasya tathā jātīyasyaiva grahaṇena bhavitavyaṃ śabde rūpādivat /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2459: tatra yo 'yaṃ vibhāga ekadravye nānārūpā bhinnaśrutayo vidharmāṇaḥ śabdā abhivyajyamānāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:2460: śrūyante yac ca vibhāgāntaraṃ sarūpāḥ samānaśrutayaḥ sadharmāṇaḥ śabdās tīvramandadharmatayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2462: nānābhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2463: % bhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/] p.638
GSP29nysvbh1u:2465: tena vibhāgopapatter manyāmahe na pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha śabdaḥ sanniviṣṭo vyajyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2466: dvividhaś cāyaṃ śabdo varṇātmako dhvanimātraś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2469: dadhy atreti kecit ikāra itvaṃ hitvā yatvam āpadyata iti vikāraṃ manyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2470: kecid ikārasya prayoge viṣayakṛte yad ikāraḥ sthānaṃ jahāti tatra yakārasya prayogaṃ bruvate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2471: saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye ikāro na prayujyate tasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayujyate sa ādeśa iti ubhayam idam upadiśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2472: tatra na jñāyate kiṃ tattvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2474: vikāropadeśe hy anvayasyāgrahaṇād vikārānanumānam---saty anvaye kiñcin nivartate kiñcid upajāyata iti śakyeta vikāro 'numātum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2475: na cānvayo gṛhyate tasmād vikāro nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2476: bhinnakaraṇayoś ca varṇayor aprayoge prayogopapattiḥ---vivṛtakaraṇa ikāra īṣatspṛṣṭakaraṇo yakāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2484: yatra ca vikārabhūtau iṣṭyā dadhy āhareti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2485: ubhayatra prayoktur aviśeṣo yatnaḥ śrotuś ca śrutir ity ādeśopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2487: na khalv ikāraḥ prayujyamāno yakāratām āpadyamāno gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2488: kiṃ tarhi? ikārasya prayoge yakāraḥ prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2492: na caitasmin pakṣe śabdānvākhyānasyāsambhave yena varṇavikāraṃ pratipadyemahīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2494: na hi ikārād yakāra utpadyate yakārād vā ikāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2495: pṛthaksthānaprayatnotpādyā hīme varṇāḥ teṣām anyonyasya sthāne prayujyata iti yuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2496: etāvac caitat pariṇāmo vā vikāraḥ syāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2497: ubhayaṃ ca nāsti tasmāt na santi varṇavikārāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2499: vacir'' iti yathā varṇasamudāyasya dhātulakṣaṇasya kvacid viṣaye varṇāntarasamudāyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:2500: na pariṇāmo na kāryaṃ śabdāntarasya sthāne śabdāntaraṃ prayujyate tathā varṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2505: yakāre hrasvadīrghānuvidhānaṃ nāsti yena vikāratvam anumīyata iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2507: dravyavikārā nyūnāḥ samāḥ adhikāś ca gṛhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2508: tadvad ayaṃ vikāro nyūnaḥ syād iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2509: NyS_2,2.43: dvividhasyāpi hetor abhāvād asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2510: atra nodāharaṇasādharmyād dhetur asti na vaidharmyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2511: anupasaṃhṛtaś ca hetunā dṛṣṭānto na sādhaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2513: yathānuḍuhaḥ sthāne 'śvo voḍhuṃ niyukto na tadvikāro bhavati evam ivarṇasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayukto na vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2514: na cātra niyamahetur asti---dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na pratidṛṣṭānta iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2517: atulyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ prakṛtibhāvo vikalpate vikārāś ca prakṛtīr anuvidhīyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2522: evaṃ varṇābhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛter vikāravikalpa iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2525: yadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ mṛd vā suvarṇaṃ vā tasyātmano 'nvaye pūrvo vyūho nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2528: na varṇasāmānye kaścic chabdātmā 'nvayī ya itthaṃ jahāti yatvaṃ cāpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2529: tatra yathā sati dravyabhāve vikāravaiṣamye nānaḍuho 'śvo vikāro vikāradharmānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2530: evam ivarṇasya na yakāro vikāro vikāradharmānupapatter iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2535: ikāro yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2536: na punar ikārasya sthāne yakārasya prayogo 'prayogaś cety atrānumānaṃ nāsti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2540: suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalatvaṃ hitvā rucakatvam āpadyate rucakatvaṃ hitvā punaḥ kuṇḍalatvam āpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2541: evam ikāro 'pi yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro bhavatīti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2542: vyabhicārād ananumānam yathā payo dadhibhāvam āpannaṃ punaḥ na payo bhavati kim evaṃ varṇānāṃ na punarāpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2543: atha suvarṇavat punarāpattir iti suvarṇodāharaṇopapattiś ca---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2545: avasthitaṃ suvarṇaṃ hīyamānena dharmeṇa upajāyamānena ca dharmi bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2546: naivaṃ kaścic chabdātmā hīyamānena itvenopajāyamānena yatvena dharmī gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2549: varṇavikārā api varṇatvaṃ na vyabhicaranti yathā suvarṇavikāraḥ suvarṇatvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2553: varṇatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tasyemau dharmau bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2554: na ca nivartamāno dharma upajāyamānasya prakṛtis tatra nivartamāna ikāro na yakārasyopajāyamānasya prakṛtir iti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2557: nityā varṇā ity etasmin pakṣe ikārayakārau varṇau ity ubhayor nityatvād vikārānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2564: utpadya niruddhe ikāre yakāra utpadyate yakāre cotpadya niruddhe ikāra utpadyata iti kaḥ kasya vikāraḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2565: tad etad avagṛhya sandhāne sandhāya cāvagrahe veditavyam iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2567: NyS_2,2.51: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāc ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2568: nityā varṇā na vikalpanta iti vipratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2569: yathā nityatve sati kiñcid atīndriyaṃ kiñcid indriyagrāhyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2571: evaṃ nityatve sati kiñcin na vikriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2574: nityaṃ nopajāyate nāpaity anupajanāpāyadharmakaṃ nityam anityaṃ punar upajanāpāyayuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2583: yathānavasthāyināṃ varṇānāṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavaty evam eṣāṃ vikāro bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2584: asambandhād asamarthā arthapratipādikā varṇopalabdhiḥ na vikāreṇa sambandhād asamarthā yā gṛhyamāṇā varṇavikāram anumāpayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2585: tatra yādṛg idaṃ yathā gandhaguṇā pṛthivy evaṃ śabdasukhādiguṇāpīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2589: na ca varṇopalabdhir varṇanivṛttau varṇāntaraprayogasya nivartikā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2590: yo 'yam ivarṇanivṛttau yakārasya prayogo yady ayaṃ varṇopalabdhyā nivartate tadā tatropalabhyamānā ivarṇo yatvam āpadyate iti gṛhyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2592: NyS_2,2.53: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteś cāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2594: na khalv vikāradharmakaṃ kiñcin nityam upalabhyata iti varṇopalabdhivad iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2595: avagrahe hi dadhi atreti prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2596: % prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/] p.651
GSP29nysvbh1u:2597: ciranivṛtte cāyam ivarṇe yakāraḥ prayujyamānaḥ kasya vikāra iti pratīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2598: kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti anuyogaḥ prasajyata iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2601: ikārasthāne yakāraḥ śrūyate yakārasthāne khalv ikāro vidhīyate vidhyatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2606: yo 'yaṃ prakṛter aniyama uktaḥ sa niyato yathāviṣayaṃ vyavasthito niyatatvān niyama iti bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2613: anujñātaniṣiddhayoś ca vyāghātād anarthāntaratvaṃ na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2614: aniyamaś ca niyatatvāt niyamo na bhavatīti nātrārthasya tathābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2615: kiṃ tarhi? tathābhūtasyārthasya niyamaśabdenābhidhīyamānasya niyatatvān niyamaśabda evopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2616: so 'yaṃ niyamād aniyame pratiṣedho na bhavatīti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2617: na ceyaṃ varṇavikāropapattiḥ pariṇāmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2632: ete ced vikārā upapadyante tarhi varṇavikārā iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2634: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2638: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2641: upasarganipātās tarhi na padasaṃjñāḥ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ vācyam iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2642: śiṣyate ca khalu nāmikyā vibhakter avyayāl lopaḥ tayoḥ padasaṃjñārtham iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2645: gaur iti padaṃ khalv idam udāharaṇaṃ tadarthe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2648: avinābhāvena vartamānāsu vyaktyākṛtijātiṣu gaur iti prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2649: tatra na jñāyate kim anyatamaḥ padārthaḥ utaitat sarvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2655: yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2659: gavāṃ samūha iti bhedād dravyābhidhānaṃ na jāter abhedāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2660: vaidyāya gāṃ dadatīti dravyasya tyāgo na jāter amūrtatvāt pratikramānukramānupapatteeś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2665: saṅkhyā --- daśa gāvo viṃśatir gāva iti bhinnaṃ dravyaṃ saṅkhyāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2667: vṛddhiḥ kāraṇavato dravyasyāvayavopacayaḥ avardhata gaur iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2670: varṇaḥ --- śuklā gauḥ kapilā gaur iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2675: tadutpattidharmatvād dravye yuktaṃ na jātau viparyayād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2681: yāśabdaprabhṛtibhir yo viśeṣyate sa gośabdārtho yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2686: yadi na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ kathaṃ tarhi vyaktāv upacāra iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2690: atadbhāve 'pi tadupacāra iti atacchabdasya tena śabdenābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2693: sthānāt --- mañcāḥ krośantīti mañcasthāḥ puruṣā abhidhīyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2694: tādarthyāt --- kaṭārtheṣu vīraṇeṣu vyuhyamāneṣu kaṭaṃ karotīti bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2695: vṛtāt --- yamo rājā kubero rājeti tadvadvartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2696: mānāt --- āḍhakena mitāḥ saktavaḥ āḍhakasaktava iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2697: dhāraṇāt --- tulāyāṃ dhṛtaṃ candanaṃ tulācandanam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2698: sāmīpyāt --- gaṅgāyāṃ gāvaś carantīti deśo 'bhidhīyate sannikṛṣṭaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2699: yogāt --- kṛṣṇena rāgeṇa yuktaḥ śāṭakaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2701: ādhipatyāt --- ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kulam ayaṃ gotram iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2702: tatrāyaṃ sahacaraṇād yogād vā jātiśabdo vyaktau prayjyata iti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2703: yadi gaur ity asya padasya na vyaktir arthaḥ, astu tarhi ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2707: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyato vyūha ākṛtiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2708: tasyāṃ gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyaty ayam gaur ayaṃ aśva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2710: yasya grahaṇāt sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyati taṃ śabdo 'bhidhātum arhati so 'syārtha iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2711: tad upapadyate yasya jātyā yogas tad atra jātiviśiṣṭam abhidhīyate gaur iti/na
GSP29nysvbh1u:2717: NyS_2,2.64: vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'py aprasṅgāt prokṣādīnāṃ mṛdagavake jātiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2719: kasmāt? vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'pi mṛdgavake prokṣaṇādīnām aprasaṅgād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2720: gāṃ prokṣaya gām ānaya gāṃ dehīti naitāni mṛdgavake prayujyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2723: asti hi tatra vyaktiḥ asty ākṛtiḥ yadabhāvāt tatrāsampratyayaḥ sa padārtha iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2726: nāgṛhyamāṇāyām ākṛtau vyaktau ca jātimātraṃ śuddhaṃ gṛhyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2728: na vai padārthena na bhavituṃ śakyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2734: yadā hi bhedavivakṣā viśeṣagatiś ca tadā vyaktiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu jātyākṛtī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2736: tadā jātiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu vyaktyākṛtī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2739: kathaṃ punar jñāyate nānā vyaktyākṛtijātaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2743: vyajyata iti vyaktir indriyagrāhyeti na sarvaṃ dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2744: yo guṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ sparśāntānāṃ gurutvaghanatvadravatvasaṃskārāṇām avyāpinaḥ parimāṇasyāśrayo yathāsambhavaṃ tad dravyaṃ mūrtiḥ mūrcchitāvayavatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2746: yayā jātir jātiliṅgāni ca prakhyāyante tām ākṛtiṃ vidyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2747: sā ca nānyā sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyatād vyūhād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2751: niyate ca sattvāvayavānāṃ vyūhe sati gotvaṃ prakhyāyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2752: anākṛtivyaṅgyāyāṃ jātau mṛtsuvarṇaṃ rajatam ity evamādiṣv ākṛtir nivartate jahāti padārthatvam iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2754: yā samānaṃ buddhiṃ prasūte bhinneṣv adhikaraṇeṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2755: yayā bahūnīteretarato na vyāvartante yo 'rtho 'nekatra pratyayānuvṛttinimittaṃ tat sāmānyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2756: yac ca keṣāñcid abhedaṃ kutaścid bhedaṃ karoti tat sāmānyaviśeṣo jātir iti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2757: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2763: kiṃ dehendriyamanobuddhivedanāsaṅghātamātram ātmā āhosvit tadvayatirikta iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2772: asti cāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ cakṣuṣā paśyati manasā vijānāti buddhyā vicārayati śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkham anubhavatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2773: tatra nāvadhāryate kim avayavena samudāyasya dehādisaṅghātasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2777: darśanena kaścid artho gṛhītaḥ sparśanenāpi so 'rtho gṛhyate --- yam aham adrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā taṃ sparśanenāpi spṛśāmīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2778: yaṃ cāspārkṣaṃ sparśanena taṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2783: tad yo 'sau cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa caikārthasya grahītā bhinnanimittāv anyakartṛkau pratyayau samānaviṣayau pratisandadhāti so 'rthāntarabhūta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2786: indriyaṃ khalu svasvaviṣayagrahaṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisandhātum arhati nendriyāntarasya viṣayāntaragrahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2788: ekaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhinnanimittau svātmakartṛkau paryayau pratisaṃhitau vedayate na saṅghātaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2789: kasmāt? anivṛttaṃ hi saṅghāte pratyekaṃ viṣayāntaragrahaṇasyāpratisandhānam indriyāntareṇeveti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2794: cakṣuṣy asati rūpaṃ na gṛhyate sati ca gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2795: yac ca yasminn asati na bhavati sati bhavati tasya tad iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2800: tānīndriyāṇīmāni svasvaviṣayagrahaṇāc cetanāni indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2802: sandhigdhatvād ahetuḥ --- yo 'yam indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2808: yadi khalv ekam indriyam avyavasthitaviṣayaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhi cetanaṃ syāt kas tato 'nyaṃ cetanam anumātuṃ śaknuyāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2809: yasmāt tu vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi tasmāt tebhyo 'nyaś cetanaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaviṣayagrāhī viṣayavyavasthitam atīto 'numīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2811: rūpadarśī khalv ayaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ vā pūrvagṛītam anuminoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2817: tad evam aniyataparyāyaṃ sarvaviṣayagrahaṇam ekacetanādhikaraṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2819: pratyakṣānumānāgamasaṃśayān pratyayāṃś ca nānāviṣayān svātmakartṛkān pratisandhāya vedayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2821: artham aviṣayabhūtaṃ śrotrasya kramabhāvino varṇān śrutvā padavākyabhāvena pratisandhāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2822: śabdārthavyavasthāṃ ca budhyamāno 'nekaviṣayam arthajātam agrahaṇīyam ekaikenendriyeṇa gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2823: seyaṃ sarvajñasya jñeyāvyavasthānupadaṃ na śakyā parikramitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2825: tatra yad uktam indriyacaitanye sati kim aneya cetanena tad ayuktaṃ bhavati //3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2830: prāṇibhūtaṃ śarīraṃ dahataḥ prāṇihiṃsākṛtapāpaṃ pātakam ity ucyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2834: śarīrendriyabuddhivedanāprabandhe khalv anyaḥ saṅghāta utpadyate anyo nirudhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2838: evaṃ ca sati yo dehādisaṅghātaḥ prāṇibhūto hiṃsāṃ karoti nāsau hiṃsāphalena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2839: yaś ca sambadhyate na tena hiṃsā kṛtā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2840: tad evaṃ sattvabhede kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaḥ prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2841: sati ca sattvotpāde sattvanirodhe cākarmanimittaḥ sattvasarsargaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2843: tad yadi dehādisaṅghātamātraṃ sattvaṃ syāt śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhavet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2847: yasyāpi nityenātmanā sātmakaṃ śarīraṃ dahyate tasyāpi śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhaved dagdhuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2850: na jātu kaścin nityaṃ hiṃsitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2853: seyam ekasmin pakṣe hiṃsā niṣphalā anyasmiṃs tv anupapanneti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2855: na brūmo nityasya sattvasya badho hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2856: api tv anucchittidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś
GSP29nysvbh1u:2857: ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇām upaghātaḥ pīḍā vaikalyalakṣaṇaḥ prabandhocchedo vā pramāpaṇalakṣaṇo vā vadho hiṃseti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2858: kāryaṃ tu sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ tasyāyatanam adhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ śarīram,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2860: kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇāṃ badho hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2862: tatra yad uktam --- ``tadabhāvaḥ sātmakapradāhe 'pi tannityatvād'' ity etad ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2863: yasya sattvocchedo hiṃsā tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ceti doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2864: etāvac caitat syāt --- sattvocchedo vā hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2873: tasyādhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ tadāyatanaṃ tad bhavati na tato 'nyad iti sa eva kartā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2874: tannimittā hi sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanasya nivṛttiḥ na tam antareṇeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2875: tasya vadha upaghātaḥ pīḍā pramāpaṇam vā hiṃsā na nityatvenātmocchedaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2876: tatra yad uktam --- ``tadabhāvaḥ sātmakapradāhe 'pi tannityatvāt'' etan neti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2879: pūrvaparayor vijñānayor ekaviṣaye pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam --- tam evaitarhi
GSP29nysvbh1u:2880: paśyāmi yam ajñāsiṣam sa evāyam artha iti savyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭasyetareṇāpi cakṣuṣā
GSP29nysvbh1u:2881: pratyabhijñānād yam adrākṣaṃ tam evaitarhi paśyāmīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2883: indriyacaitanye tu nānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti pratyabhijñānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2884: asti tv idaṃ pratyabhijñanam tasmād indriyavyatiriktaś cetanaḥ//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2886: ekam idaṃ cakṣur madhye nāsāsthivyavahitaṃ tasyāntau gṛhyamāṇau dvitvābhimānaṃ prayojayato madhyavyavahitasya dīrghasyeva//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2888: ekasminn upahate coddhṛte vā cakṣuṣi dvitīyam avatiṣṭhate cakṣuḥviṣayagrahaṇaliṅgam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2892: kasmāt? vṛkṣasya hi kāsucic chākhāsu chinnāsūpalabhyate eva vṛkṣaḥ//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2894: na kāraṇadravyasya vibhāge kāryadravyam avatiṣṭate nityatvaprasaṅgāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2895: bahuṣv avayaviṣu yasya kāraṇāni vibhaktāni tasya vināśaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2898: mṛtasya hi śiraḥkapāle dvāv avaṭau nāsāsthivyavahitau cakṣuṣaḥ sthāne bhedena gṛhyete na caitad ekasmin nāsāsthivyavahite sambhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2899: atha vā ekavināśasyāniyamād dvāv imāv arthau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2900: tau ca pṛthagāvaraṇopaghātau anumīyete vibhinnav iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2902: avapīḍanāc caikasya cakṣuṣo raśmiviṣayasannikarṣasya bhedād dṛśyabheda iva gṛhyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2908: kasyacid amlaphalasya gṛhītatadrasasāhacarye rūpe gandhe vā kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2909: rasanasyendriyāntarasya vikāraḥ rasānusmṛtau rasagardhivartito dantodakasaṃplavabhūto gṛhyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2917: tasyā ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvād apratiṣedha ātmanaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2919: evaṃ sati smṛtir upapadyate nānyad dṛṣṭam anyaḥ samaratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2922: ekas tu cetano 'nekārthadarśī bhinnanimittaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭam artham smaratīti ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānāt smṛter ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvaḥ viparyaye cānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2926: aparisaṅkhyānāś ca smṛtiviṣayasya --- aparisaṅghyāya ca smṛtiviṣayam idam ucyate ``na smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2927: yeyaṃ smṛtir agṛhyamāṇe 'rthe ajñāsiṣam aham amum artham iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2931: asminn arthe mama jñānam abhūd iti caturvidham etadvākyaṃ smṛtiviṣayajñāpakaṃ samānārtham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2932: sarvatra khalu jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2933: atha pratyakṣe 'rthe yā smṛtis tayā trīṇi jñānāni ekasminn arthe pratisandhīyante samānakartṛkāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2936: adrākṣam amum arthaṃ yam evaitarhi paśyāmi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2938: na khalv asaṃvidite sve darśane syād etad adrakṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2941: evam eko 'rthas tribhir jñānair yujyamāno nākartṛko na nānākartṛkaḥ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2944: so 'yaṃ smṛtiviṣayo 'parisaṅkhyāyamāno vidyamānaḥ prajñāto 'rthaḥ pratiṣidhyate --- nāsty ātmā smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2945: na cedaṃ smṛtimātraṃ smartavyamātraviṣayam vā idaṃ khalu jñānapratisandhānavat smṛtipratisandhānam ekasya sarvaviṣayatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2946: eko 'yaṃ jñātā sarvaviṣayaḥ svāni jñānāni pratisandhatte amum arthaṃ jñāsyāmi amum
GSP29nysvbh1u:2947: artham vijānāmy amum artham ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jijñāsamānaś ciram ajñātvādhyavasyaty ajñāsiṣam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2948: evaṃ smṛtim api trikālaviśiṣṭāṃ suṣmūrṣāviśiṣṭāṃ ca pratisandhatte/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2949: saṃskārasantatimātre tu sattve utpadyotpadya saṃskārās tirobhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2950: sa nāsty eko 'pi saṃskāro yas trikālaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiṃ cānubhavet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2951: na cānubhavam antareṇa jñānasya smṛteś ca pratisandhānam ahaṃ mameti cotpadyate dehāntaravat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2952: ato 'numīyate asty ekaḥ sarvaviṣayaḥ pratidehaṃ svajñānaprabandhaṃ smṛtiprabandhaṃ ca pratisandhatta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2953: yasya dehāntareṣu vṛtter abhāvān na pratisandhānaṃ bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2956: kasmāt? ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi sambhavāt ---``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād'' ity evamādīnām ātmapratipādakānāṃ hetūnāṃ manasi sambhavo yataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2960: jñātuḥ khalu jñānasādhanāny upapadyante --- cakṣuṣā paśyati ghrāṇena jighrati sparśanena spṛśati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2961: evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ vidyate yenāyaṃ manyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2962: evaṃ sati jñātary ātmasaṃjñā na mṛṣyate manaḥsaṃjñābhyanujñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2963: manasi ca manaḥsaṃjñā na mṛṣyate matisādhanaṃ tv abhyanujñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2964: tad idaṃ saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthe vivāda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2966: atha mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ pratyākhyāyate nāstīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2967: evaṃ rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasādhanāny api na santīti sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2973: nātrānumānam asti yena niyamaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2974: rūpādibhyaś ca viṣayāntaraṃ sukhādayas tadupalabdhau karaṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2975: yathā cakṣuṣā gandho na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ ghrāṇam evaṃ cakṣur ghrāṇābhyāṃ raso na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ rasanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2977: tathā cakṣurādibhiḥ sukhādayo na gṛhyanta iti karaṇāntareṇa bhavitavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2980: yac ca sukhādyupalabdhau karaṇaṃ tac ca jñānāyaugaoadyaliṅgaṃ tasyendriyam indriyaṃ prati sannidher asannidheḥ ca na yugapaj jñānāny utpadyanta
GSP29nysvbh1u:2981: tatra yad uktam ``ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi sambhavāt'' iti tad ayuktam//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2982: kiṃ punar ayaṃ dehādisaṅghātād anyo nityaḥ utānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2985: vidyamānam ubhayathā bhavati nityam anityaṃ ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2987: ātmasadbhāvahetubhir evāsya prāg dehabhedād avasthānaṃ siddham ūrddhvam api dehabhedād avatiṣṭhate/ kutaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2989: jātaḥ khalv ayaṃ kumārako 'smin janmany agṛhīteṣu harṣabhayaśokahetuṣu harṣabhayaśokān pratipadyate liṅgānumeyān/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2991: smṛtyanubandhaś ca pūrvābhyāsam antareṇa na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2993: nānyatheti sidhyaty etat avatiṣṭhate 'yam ūrdhvaṃ śarīrabhedād iti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2995: yathā padmādiṣv anityeṣu prabodhaḥ sammīlanaṃ vikāro bhavati evam anityasyātmano harṣabhayaśokasampratipattir vikāraḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2996: hetvabhāvād ayuktam --- anena hetunā padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāravad anityasyātmano
GSP29nysvbh1u:2997: harṣādisampratipattir iti nātrodāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetur na vaidharmyād
GSP29nysvbh1u:2998: asti hetvabhāvāt asambaddhārthakam apārthakam ucyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:2999: dṛṣṭāntāc ca harṣādinimittasyānivṛttiḥ --- yā ceyam āseviteṣu viṣayeṣu harṣādisampratipattiḥ smṛtyanubandhakṛtā pratyātmanaṃ gṛhyate seyaṃ padmādisammīlanadṛṣṭāntena na nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3000: yathā ceyaṃ na nivarttate tathā jātasyāpīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3003: evaṃ ca sati kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena pratiṣidhyate//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3004: atha nirnimittaḥ padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāra iti matam evam ātmano 'pi harṣādisampratipattir iti/ tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3006: uṣṇādiṣu satsu bhāvād asatsv abhāvāt tannimittāḥ pañcabhūtānugraheṇa nivṛttānāṃ padmādīnāṃ prabodhasammīlanavikārā iti na nirnimittāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3007: evaṃ harṣādayo 'pi vikārā nimittad bhavitum arhanti na nimittam antareṇa/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3019: dṛśyate hi śarīriṇāṃ kṣudhā pīḍyamānānām āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇānubandhād āhārābhilāṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3023: sa khalv ayam ātmā pūrvaśarīrāt pretya śarīrāntaram āpannaḥ kṣutpīḍitaḥ pūrvābhyastam āhāram anusmaran stanyam abhilaṣati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3024: tasmān na dehabhedād ātmā bhidyate bhavaty evorddhvaṃ dehabhedād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3027: evam āhārābhyāsam antareṇa bālaḥ stanyam abhilaṣati//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3028: kim idam ayaso 'yaskāntābhisarpaṇaṃ nirnimittam atha nimittād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3040: na ca stanyābhilāṣaliṅgam anyad āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇāubandhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3044: na ca dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭam abhilāṣahetuṃ bādhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3046: ayasaḥ khalv api nānyatra pravṛttir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3051: evaṃ bālasyāpi niyataviṣayo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāraṇaniyamād bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3052: tac ca kāraṇam abhyastasmaraṇam anyad veti dṛṣṭena viśiṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3053: dṛṣṭo hi śarīriṇām abhastasmaraṇād āhārābhilāṣa iti//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3059: pūrvānubhavaś ca viṣayāṇām anyasmin janmani śarīram antareṇa nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3061: so 'yam ātmā pūrvaśarīrānubhūtān viṣayān anusmaran teṣu teṣu rajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3063: evaṃ pūrvaśarīrasya pūrvatareṇa pūrvatarasya pūrvatamenetyādinānādiś cetanasya śarīrayogaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3064: anādiś ca rāgānubandha iti siddhaṃ nityatvam iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3065: kathaṃ punar jñāyate pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanajanito jātasya rāgaḥ, na punaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3067: athotpattidharmakasya dravyasya guṇāḥ kāraṇata utpadyante tathotpattidharmakasyātmano rāgaḥ kutaścid utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3070: na khalu saguṇadravyotpattivad utpattir ātmano rāgasya ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3072: ayaṃ khalu prāṇināṃ viṣayān āsevamānānāṃ saṅkalpajanito rāgo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3075: ātmotpādādhikaraṇāt tu rāgotpattir bhavantī saṅkalpād anyasmin rāgakāraṇe sati vācyā kāryadravyaguṇavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3076: na cātmotpādaḥ siddho nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3077: % nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/] p.751
GSP29nysvbh1u:3078: tasmād ayuktaṃ saguṇadravyotpattivat tayor utpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3079: athāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇaṃ dharmādharmalakṣaṇam adṛṣṭam upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3081: tatra hi tasya nirvṛttiḥ nāsmin janmani/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3083: viṣayābhyāsaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhāvanāhetuḥ tanmayatvam ucyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3085: karma khalv idaṃ jātiviśeṣanirvartakaṃ tādarthyāt tācchabdyaṃ vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3086: tasmād anupapannaṃ saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3089: tat parīkṣyate --- kiṃ ghrāṇādivad ekaprakṛtikam uta nānāprakṛtīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3092: pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni saṅkhyāvikalpena śarīraprakṛtir iti pratijānata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3099: na tv idam abādibhir asampṛktayā pṛthivyārabdhaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayabhāvena kalpate ity ataḥ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyoge sati śarīraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3100: bhūtasaṃyogo hi mithaḥ pañcānāṃ na niṣiddha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3101: āpyataijasavāyavyāni lokāntare śarīrāṇi teṣv api bhūtasaṃyogaḥ puruṣārthatantra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3102: sthālyādidravyaniṣpattāv api niḥsaṃśayo nābādisaṃyogam antarena niṣpattir iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3106: ta ime sandigdhā hetava ity upekṣitavān sūtrakāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3108: sati ca prakṛtibhāve bhūtānāṃ dharmopalabdhir asati ca saṃyogāpratiṣedhāt sannihitānām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3110: tad idam anekabhūtaprakṛti śarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3111: % -m arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,] p.755
GSP29nysvbh1u:3115: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣurgacchatād'' ity atra mantre ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīram'' iti śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3116: tad idaṃ prakrtau vikārasya pralayābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3118: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi'' ity atra mantrāntare ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ spṛṇomīti'' śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3119: seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛtir abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3120: sthālyādiṣu ca tulyajātīyānām ekakāryārambhadarśanād bhinnajātīyānām ekakāryārambhānupapattiḥ//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3121: athedānīm indriyāṇi prameyakrameṇa vicāryante --- kim āvyaktikāny āhosvid bhautikānīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3124: NyS_3,1.32: kṛṣṇasāre saty upalambhād vyatiricya copalambhāt saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3126: tasminn anupahate rūpopalabdhiḥ upahate cānupalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3127: vyatiricya kṛṣṇasāram avasthitasya viṣayasya upalambho na kṛṣṇasāraprāptasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3134: mahad iti mahattaraṃ mahattamaṃ copalabhyate yathā nyagrodhaparvatādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3135: aṇv iti aṇutaram aṇutamaṃ ca gṛhyate yathā nyagrodhadhānādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3137: bhautikaṃ hi yāvat tāvad eva vyāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3139: na mahadaṇugrahaṇamātrād abhautikatvaṃ vibhutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ śakyaṃ pratipattum/ idaṃ khalu ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3141: tayor mahadaṇvor grahaṇaṃ cakṣūraśmer arthasya ca sannikarṣaviśeṣād bhavati yathā pradīparaśmer arthasya ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3144: cākṣuṣo hi raśmiḥ kuḍyādibhir āvṛtam arthaṃ na prakāśayati yathā pradīparaśmir iti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3148: mahattvād anekadravyavattvād rūpavattvāc copalabdhir iti pradīpavat pratyakṣata upalabhyeta cākṣuṣo raśmir yadi syād iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3150: sannikarṣapratiṣedhārthenāvaraṇena liṅgenānumīyamānasya raśmer yā pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir nāsāv abhāvaṃ pratipādayati yathā candramasaḥ parabhāgasya prthivyāś cādhobhāgasya//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3152: bhinnaḥ khalv ayaṃ dravyadharmo guṇadharmaś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3153: mahadanekadravyavac ca viṣaktāvayavam āpyaṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣato nopalabhyate sparśas tu śīto gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3154: tasya dravyasyānubandhād hemantaśiśirau kalpyete tathāvidham eva ca taijasaṃ dravyam anudbhūtarūpaṃ saha rūpeṇa nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3156: sparśas tv asyoṣṇa upalabhyate tasya dravyasyānubandhād grīṣmavasantau kalpyete//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3159: tatra rūpaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca tadāśrayaḥ pratyakṣata upalabhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3160: rūpaviśeṣas tu yadbhāvāt kvacid rūpopalabdhiḥ yadabhāvāc ca dravyasya kvacid anupalabdhiḥ sa rūpadharmo 'yam udbhava samākhyāta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3166: udbhūtarūpam anudbhūtasparśaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yathā pradīparaśmayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3170: yathā cetanasyārtho viṣayopalabdhibhūtaḥ sukhaduḥkhopalabdhibhūtaś ca kalpyate tathendriyāṇi vyūḍhāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3174: sarvadravyāṇāṃ viśvarūpo vyūha indriyavat karmakāritaḥ puruṣārthatantraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3177: yaś cātvaraṇopalambhād indriyasya dravyaviśeṣe pratighātaḥ sa bhautikadharmo na bhūtāni vyabhicarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3179: apratighātas tu vyabhicārī bhautikābhautikayoḥ samānatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3184: kasmāt? yasmād bhautikam api na pratihanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3189: yathā ``anekadravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhir'' iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe madhyandinolkāprakāśo nopakabhyate ādityaprakāśenābhibhūtaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3190: evaṃ mahadanekadravyavattvād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabhir iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe cākṣuṣo raśmir nopalabhyate nimittāntarataḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3191: tac ca vyākhyātam anudbhūtarūpasparśasya dravyasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3193: yo hi bravīti loṣṭaprakāśo madhyandine ādityaprakāśābhibhavān nopalabhyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3198: na tv evaṃ cakṣuṣo raśmir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3202: sati ca prakāśānugrahe śītasparśopalabdhau ca satyāṃ tadāśrayasya dravyasya cakṣuṣā 'grahaṇaṃ rūpasyānudbhūtatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3205: tatra yad uktaṃ ``tadanupalabdher ahetur'' iti etad ayuktam//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3206: kasmāt punar abhibhavo 'nupalabdhikāraṇaṃ cākṣuṣasya raśmer nocyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3209: yad rūpam abhivyaktam udbhūtaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahaṃ ca nāpekṣate tadviṣayo 'bhibhavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3211: anudbhūtarūpatvāc cānupalabhyamānaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahāc copalabhyamānaṃ nābhibhūyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3213: evam upapannam asti cākṣuṣo raśmir iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3215: dṛśyante hi naktaṃ nayanaraśmayo naktañcarāṇāṃ vṛṣadaṃśaprabhṛtīnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3218: dharmabhedamātraṃ cānupapannam āvaraṇasya prātipratiṣedhārthasya darśanād iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3221: tṛṇādi sarpad dravyaṃ kāce abhrapaṭale vā pratihataṃ dṛṣt'm,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3222: avyavahitena sannikṛṣyate vyāhanyate vai prāptir vyavadhāneneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3223: yadi ca raśmyarthasannikarṣo grahaṇahetuḥ syāt na vyavahitasya sannikarṣa ity agrahaṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3224: asti ceyaṃ kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritopalabdhiḥ sā jñāpayati aprāpyakārīṇīndriyāṇi ata evābhautikāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3230: na ca kāco 'bhrapaṭalaṃ vā nayanaraśmiṃ viṣṭabhnāti so 'pratihanyamānaḥ sannikṛṣyata iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3231: yaś ca manyate na bhautikasyāpratighāta iti tan na ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3235: avighātād iti ca padābhisambandhād vākyabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3239: prāptau hi dravyāntaraguṇasya uṣṇasya sparśasya grahaṇaṃ tena ca śītasparśābhibhava iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3242: bharjanakapālādisthaṃ ca dravyam āgneyena tejasā dahyate tatrāvighātāt prāptiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3243: prāptau tu dāho nāprāpyakāri teja iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3244: avighātād iti ca kevalaṃ padam upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3246: avyuhyamānāvayavena vyavadhāyena dravyeṇa sarvato dravyasyāviṣṭhmbhaḥ kriyāhetor apratibandhaḥ prāpter apratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3247: dṛṣṭaṃ hi kalaśaniṣaktānām apāṃ bahiḥ śītasparśasya grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3250: tatra kācābhrapaṭalādibhir nayanaraśmer apratighātād vibhidyārthena saha sannikarṣād upapannaṃ grahaṇam iti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3253: kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhiḥ pratighāta iti prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3256: ādarśodakayoḥ prasādo rūpaviśeṣaḥ svo dharmo niyamadarśanāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3258: yathā ādarśapratihatasya parāvṛttasya nayanaraśmeḥ svena mukhena sannikarṣe sati svamukhopalambhanaṃ pratibimbagrahaṇākhyam ādarśarūpānugrahāt tannimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3261: kuḍyādiṣu ca pratibimbagrahaṇaṃ na bhavati evaṃ kācābhrapaṭalādibhir avighātaś cakṣūraśmeḥ kuḍyādibhiś ca pratighāto dravyasvabhāvaniyamād iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3264: na khalu bhoḥ parīkṣamāṇena dṛṣṭānumitā arthāḥ śakyā niyoktum evaṃ bhavateti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3267: na hīdam upapadyate rūpavad gandho 'pi cākṣuṣo bhavatv iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3268: gandhavad vā rūpaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ mā bhūd iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3270: udakāpratipattivad vā dhūmenāgnipratipattir api mā bhūd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3272: yathā khalv arthā bhavanti ya eṣāṃ svo bhāvaḥ svo dharma iti tathābhūtāḥ pramāṇena pratipadyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3274: imau khalu niyogapratiṣedhau bhavatā deśitau kācābhrapaṭalādivad vā kuḍyādibhir apratighāto bhavatu kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhir apratighāto mā bhūd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3279: athāpi khalv ekam idam indriyaṃ bahūnīndriyāṇi vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3281: NyS_3,1.52: sthānānyatve nānātvād avayavinānāsthānatvāc ca saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3289: na tvacā kiñcid indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ na prāptam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3290: na cāsatyāṃ tvaci kiñcid viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3291: yayā satvendriyasthānāni vyāptāni yasyāṃ ca satyāṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati sā tvag ekam indriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3293: sparśopalabdhilakṣaṇāyāṃ satyāṃ tvaci gṛhyamāṇe tvagindriyeṇa sparśe indriyāntarārthā rūpādayo na gṛhyante andhādibhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3294: na sparśagrāhakāt indriyād indriyāntaram astīti sparśavad andhādibhir gṛhyeran rūpādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295: na ca gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ tvag iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3297: yathā tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣi sannikṛṣṭo dhūmasparśaṃ gṛhṇāti nānyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3298: evaṃ tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣā rūpādigrāhakās teṣām upaghātād andhādibhir na gṛhyante rūpādaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3300: tvagavyatirekād ekam indriyam ity uktvā ``tvag avayavaviśeṣeṇa dhūmopalabdhivad rūpādyupalabdhir'' ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3301: evaṃ ca sati nānābhūtāni viṣayagrāhakāṇi viṣayavyavasthānāt tadbhāve viṣayagrahaṇasya bhāvāt tadupaghāte cābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3302: tathā ca pūrvo vāda uttareṇa vādeṇa vyāhanyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3305: na ca teṣv asatsu viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3306: tasmān na tvag anyad vā sarvaviṣayam ekam indriyam iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3312: na ca yugapad rūpādayo gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3313: asāhacaryāc ca viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayakam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3315: NyS_3,1.55: vipratiṣedhāc ca na tvag ekā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3316: na khalu tvag ekam indriyaṃ vyāghātāt --- tvacā rūpāṇy aprāptāni gṛhyanta ity aprāpyakāritve sparśādiṣv apy evaṃ prasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3317: sparśādīnāṃ ca prāptānāṃ grahaṇād rūpādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ grahaṇam iti prāptam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3320: athāpi manyeta prāptāḥ sparśādayas tvacā gṛhyante rūpāṇi tv aprāptānīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3322: āvaraṇānupapatteś ca rūpamātrasya grahaṇaṃ vyavahitasya cāvyavahitasya ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3324: aprāptaṃ tvacā gṛhyate rūpam iti dūre rūpasyāgrahaṇam antike ca grahaṇam ity etan na syād iti//55//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3325: pratiṣedhāc ca nānātvasiddhau sthāpanāhetur apy upādīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3329: sparśanenendriyeṇa sparśagrahaṇe sati na tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣur anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3330: % tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣur anumīyate/] p.788
GSP29nysvbh1u:3331: sparśarūpagrahaṇe ca tābhyām eva na gandho gṛhyata iti gandhagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ ghrāṇam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3332: trayāṇāṃ grahaṇe na tair eva raso gṛhyata iti rasagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ rasanam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3333: na ca caturṇāṃ grahaṇe tair eva śabdaḥ śrūyata iti śabdagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ śrotram anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3344: tad yasyendriyārthapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇi tasyendriyārthabahutvād bahūni indriyāṇi prasajyanta iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3346: gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ yāni gandhādigrahaṇāni tāny asamānasādhanasādhyatvād grāhakāntarāṇi na prayojayanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3349: arthaikadeśaṃ cāśritya viṣayapañcatvamātraṃ bhavān pratiṣedhati tasmād ayukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3350: kathaṃ punar gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā gandhādaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3351: sparśaḥ khalv ayaṃ trividhaḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśītaś ca sparśatvena svasāmānyena saṃgṛhītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3352: gṛhyamāṇe ca śītasparśe noṣṇasyānuṣṇāśītasya vā sparśasya grahaṇaṃ grāhakāntaraṃ prayojayati sparśabhedānām ekasādhanasādhyatvād yenaiva śītasparśo gṛhyate tenaivetarāv apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3362: viṣayatvena hi sāmānyena gandhādayaḥ saṅgṛhītā iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3364: na khalu viṣayatvena sāmānyena kṛtavyavasthā viṣayā grāhakāntaranirapekṣā ekasādhanagrāhyā anumīyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3365: anumīyante ca pañca gandhādayo gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā indriyāntaragrāhyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3369: tad etat ``indriyārthapañcatvāt'' ity etasmin sūtre kṛtabhāṣyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3379: kṛṣṇasāropanibaddhaṃ cakṣur bahirniḥsṛtya rūpādhikaraṇāni dravyāṇi prāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3380: sparśanādīni tv indriyāṇi viṣayā evāśrayopasarpaṇāt pratyāsīdanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3382: ākṛtiḥ khalu parimāṇam iyattā sā pañcadhā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3386: tac ca vibhu śabdamātrānubhavānumeyaṃ puruṣasaṃskāropagrahaṇāc cādhiṣṭhānaniyamena śabdasya vyañjakam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3396: pārthivaṃ kiñcid dravyaṃ kasyacid dravyasya gandhavyañjakam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3397: asti cāyam indriyāṇāṃ bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdhiniyamaḥ tena bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdher manyāmahe bhūtaprakṛtīnīndriyāṇi nāvyaktaprakṛtīnīti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3398: gandhādayaḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ity uddiṣṭam uddeśaś ca pṛthivyādīnām ekaguṇatve cānekaguṇatve ca samāna ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3407: uddeśasūtre hi sparśaparyantebhyaḥ paraḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3408: tantraṃ vā sparśasya vivakṣitatvāt --- sparśaparyanteṣu niyukteṣu yo 'nyas taduttaraḥ śabda iti//62-63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3411: kasmāt? yasya bhūtasya ye guṇā na te tadātmakenendriyeṇa sarve upalabhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3412: pārthivena hi ghrāṇena sparśaparyantā na gṛhyante gandha eva eko gṛhyate evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3415: gandhādīnām ekaiko yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādīnām ekaikasya guṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3418: ghrāṇena rasarūpasparśānāṃ rasanena rūpasparśayoḥ cakṣuṣā sparśasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3419: kathaṃ tarhy anekaguṇāni bhūtāni gṛhyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3421: abādisaṃsargāc ca pṛthivyāṃ rasādayo gṛhyante evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3422: niyamas tarhi na prāpnoti saṃsargasyāniyamāt caturguṇā pṛthivī triguṇā āpo dviguṇaṃ teja ekaguṇo vāyur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3425: pṛthivyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvam uttareṇottareṇa viṣṭam ataḥ saṃsarganiyama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3429: kasmāt? pārthivasya dravyasyāpy asya ca pratyakṣaṭvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3430: mahatvānekadravyatvād rūpāc copalabdhir iti taijasam eva dravyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt na pārthivam āpyaṃ vā rūpābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3431: taijasavat tu pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt na saṃsargād anekaguṇagrahaṇaṃ bhūtānām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3432: bhūtāntararūpakṛtaṃ ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣo vāyuḥ prasajyate niyame vā kāraṇam ucyatām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3433: rasayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt --- pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3437: saṃsarge hi vyañjakam eva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3441: na caitad ekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge saty upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3447: na caitad ekaguṇānām anuṣṇāśītasparśena vāyunā saṃsargeṇopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3448: atha vā pārthivāpyayor dravyayor vyvasthitaguṇayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3449: caturguṇaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ triguṇam āpyaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3451: tasya kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ kāraṇabhāvād dhi kāryabhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3452: evaṃ taijasavāyavyayor dravyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād guṇavyavasthāyāḥ tatkāraṇe dravye vyavasthānumānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3454: pārthivaṃ dravyam abādibhir viyuktaṃ pratyakṣato gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3459: niranumānaṃ tu ``viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇa'' ity etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3460: nātra liṅgam anumāpakaṃ gṛhyata iti yenaitad evaṃ pratipadyemahi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3461: yac coktaṃ viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāmpratam iti niyamakāraṇābhāvād ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3462: dṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmpratam aparaṃ pareṇa viṣṭam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3466: vāyunā ca viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejo na tu tejasā viṣṭatvād rūpavān vāyur iti niyamakāraṇaṃ nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3467: dṛṣṭaṃ ca taijasena sparśena vāyavyasya sparśasyābhibhavād agrahaṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3469: tad evaṃ nyāyaviruddhaṃ pravādaṃ pratiṣidhya ``na sarvaguṇānupalabdher'' iti coditaṃ samādhīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3472: ghrāṇādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gandhāder guṇasyotkarṣāt tat tat pradhānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3477: yathā bāhyānāṃ pārthivāpyataijasānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇavyañjakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpavyañjakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3479: evaṃ ghrāṇa rasanacakṣuṣā.ṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇagrāhakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3481: tasmād ghrāṇādibhir na sarveṣāṃ guṇānām upalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3482: yas tu pratijānīte gandhaguṇatvād ghrāṇaṃ gandhasya grāhakam evaṃ rasanādiṣv apīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3483: tasya yathāguṇayogaṃ ghrāṇādibhir guṇagrahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3484: kiṃkṛtaṃ punar vyavasthānam --- kiñcit pārthivam indriyaṃ na sarvāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3487: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3489: yathā prakṛṣṭo viṣayo bhūyān ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3490: yathā pṛthagarthakriyāsamarthāni puruṣasaṃskāravaśād viṣauṣadhimaṇiprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi nirvartyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3492: evaṃ pṛthagviṣayagrahaṇasamarthāni ghrāṇādīni nirvartyante na sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānīti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3499: ghrāṇaṃ svena gandhena samānārthakāriṇā saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyān na bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3501: yadi punar gandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya grāhyaś cety ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3504: yo brūte --- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣā (corr.; cakṣaṣā, ed.)
GSP29nysvbh1u:3505: gṛhyate tathā tenaiva cakṣuṣā tad eva cakṣur gṛhyatām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3506: tādṛṅ idam; tulyo hy ubhayatra pratipattihetvabhāva iti//71//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3508: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇīti etan na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3511: na śabdena guṇena saguṇam ākāśam indriyaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3524: asti cedaṃ śrotram ākāśaṃ ca śiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3533: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3535: viparyayaś ca yathāsvam anityanityayos tasyāṃ buddau nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3538: sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyā anityā buddhiḥ sukhādivat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3540: bhavati ca saṃvittiḥ --- jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3542: tataś ca traikālyavyakter anityā buddhir ity etat śiddham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3547: evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti sāṅkhyāḥ --- puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇabhūtā nityā buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3551: yaṃ pūrvam ajñāsiṣam arthaṃ tam imaṃ jānāmīti jñānyoḥ samāne 'rthe pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3553: nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu pratyabhijñānānupapattiḥ nānyajñātam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3555: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānam apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3558: puruṣadharmaḥ khalv ayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanam upalabdhir bodhaḥ pratyayaḥ adhyavasāya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3562: karaṇacaitanyābhyupagame tu cetanasvarūpaṃ vacanīyaṃ nānirdiṣṭasvarūpam ātmāntaraṃ śakyam astīti pratipattum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3563: jñānaṃ ced buddher antaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3564: jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ karotīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3566: jñānād arthāntaravacanam --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānātīti nedaṃ jñānād arthāntaram ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3567: cetayate jānīte buddhyate paśyati upalabhate ity eko 'yam artha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3568: buddhir jñpayatīti cet addhā --- jānīte puruṣo buddhir jñāpayatīti satyam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3569: evaṃ cābhyupagame jñānaṃ puruṣasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddher antaḥkaraṇasyeti/ %813
GSP29nysvbh1u:3571: yaś ca pratijānīte --- kaścit puruṣaś cetayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3575: puruṣāntarāṇi khalv imāni cetano boddhopalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyaite dharmā iti atra kaḥ pratiṣedhahetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3577: abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattir ity evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3578: samānaṃ bhavati --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānīte ity atrāpy artho na bhidyate tatrobhayoś cetanatvād anyataralopa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3579: yadi punar budhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhiḥ mana evocyate tac ca nityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3583: dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñātur ekatvāt pratyabhijñānaṃ `savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānād' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3586: tasmāj jñātur ayaṃ nityatve hetur iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587: yac ca manyate buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayo jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiś ca vṛttimato nānyeti, tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3589: vṛttivṛttimator ananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnām avasthānam iti yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tāny avatiṣṭanta iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3591: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimān apy atīta ity antaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3593: avibhu caikaṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyata iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3599: anupalabdhiś ca kasyācid arthasya viṣayāntaravyāsakte manasy upapadyate vṛttivṛttimator nānātvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3605: gatyabhāvāc ca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3606: yathā cakṣuṣo gatiḥ pratiṣiddhā sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭayos tulyakālagrahaṇāt pāṇicandramasor vyavadhānena pratīghāte so'numīyata iti so 'yaṃ nāntaḥ karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3607: % karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve] p.819
GSP29nysvbh1u:3612: ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmakā vṛttayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3618: kenacid indriyeṇa sannidhiḥ kenacid asannidhir ity ayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3623: yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike anyatvābhimāno nīlo lohita iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3626: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇo na punar gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad iti hetur nāsti hetvabhāvād anupapanna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3627: samāno hetvabhāva iti cet na jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanāt --- krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu jñānāny upajāyante cāpayanti ceti dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3629: tasmād gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāna iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3630: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ity etad amṛṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇikavādy āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3631: NyS_3,2.10: sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām ahetuḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3634: sphaṭike 'pi anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3637: kathaṃ punar gamyate kṣaṇikā vyaktaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3639: paktinirvṛttasyāhārarasasya śarīre rudhirādibhāvenopacayo 'pacayaś ca prabandhena pravarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3642: evaṃ ca saty avayavapariṇāmabhedena vṛddhiḥ śarīrasya kālāntare gṛhyate iti so 'yaṃ vyaktiviśeṣadharmo vyaktimātre veditavya iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3644: sarvāsu vyaktiṣu upacayāpacayaprabandhaḥ śarīravad iti nāyaṃ niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3646: nātra pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā pratipādakam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3652: yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra tatra pratyākhyāyate yathā grāvaprabhṛtiṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3655: yathā cārkasya kaṭukimnā sarvadravyāṇāṃ kaṭukimānām āpādayet tādṛg etad iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3656: yaś cāśeṣanirodhenāpūrvotpādaṃ niranvayaṃ dravyasantāne kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate tasyaitat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3661: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe niranvaye vāpūrvotpāde na kāraṇam ubhayatrāpy upalabhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3662: NyS_3,2.13: kṣīravināśe kāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ca tadupapattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3663: yathānupalabhyamānaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñāyate tathā sphaṭike parāparāsu vyaktiṣu vināśakāraṇam utpādakāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñeyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3665: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate 'to nānupalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3666: viparyayas tu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattau vyaktīnāṃ na liṅgam astīty anutpattir eveti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3669: payasaḥ pariṇāmo na vināśa ity eka āha/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3670: pariṇāmaś cāvasthitasya dravyasya pūrvadharmanivṛttau dharmāntarotpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3672: satā dravyasya pūrvaguṇanivṛttau guṇāntaram utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3676: saṃmūrchanalakṣaṇād avayavavyūhād dravyāntare dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo nivṛttam ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3677: yathā mṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhāntarād dravyāntare sthālyām utpannāyāṃ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍadravyaṃ mṛdavayavavibhāgebhyo nivarttate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3678: mṛdvac cāvayavānvayaḥ payodadhnor nāśeṣanirodhe niranvayo dravyāntarotpādo ghaṭata iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3679: abhyanujñāya ca niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3680: NyS_3,2.17: kvacid vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacic copalabdher anekāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3681: kṣīradadhivan niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikavyaktīnām iti nāyam ekānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3683: nātra hetur asti akāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ kṣīradadhivat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3684: na punar yathā vināśakāraṇabhāvāt kumbhasya vināśa utpattikāraṇabhāvāc cotpattiḥ evaṃ sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ vināśotpattikāraṇabhāvād vināśotpattibhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:3686: gṛhyamāṇayor vināśotpādayoḥ sphaṭikādiṣu syād ayam āśrayavān dṛṣṭāntaḥ kṣīravināśakāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3689: abhyanujñāya ca sphaṭikasyotpādavināśau yo 'tra sādhakas tasyābhyanujñānād apratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3690: kumbhavan na niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādīnām ity anujñeyo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratiṣeddham aśakyatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3691: kṣīradadhivat tu niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādāv iti śakyo 'yaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāraṇato vināśotpattidarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3692: kṣīradadhnor vināśotpattī paśyatā tatkāraṇam anumeyaṃ kāryaliṅgaṃ hi kāraṇam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3694: idaṃ tu cintyate kasyeyaṃ buddhir ātmeindriyamano 'rthānāṃ guṇa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3695: prasiddho 'pi khalv ayam arthaḥ parīkaṣāśeṣaṃ pravarttayāmīti prakriyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3696: so 'yaṃ buddhau sannikarṣotpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ viśeṣasyāgrahaṇād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3699: nendriyāṇām vā guṇo jñānaṃ teṣāṃ vināśo 'pi jñānasya bhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3700: bhavati khalv idam indriye 'rthe ca vinaṣṭe jñānam adrākṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3701: na ca jñātari vinaṣthe jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3702: anyat khalu vai tad indriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ jñānaṃ yad indriyārthavināśe na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3706: smṛtiḥ khalv iyam adrākṣam iti pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3707: na ca vijñātari naṣṭe pūrvopalabdheḥ smaraṇaṃ yuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3709: na ca manasi jñātary abhyupagamyamāne śakyam indriyārthayor jñātṛtvaṃ pratipādayitum//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3711: NyS_3,2.19: yugapaj jñeyānupalabdheś ca na manasaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3713: tatra yugapaj jṇeyānupalabdhyā yad anumīyate antaḥkaraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3719: ghrāṇādisādhanasya ca jñātur gandhādijñānabhāvād anumīyate antaḥkaraṇasādhanasya sukhādijñānaṃ smṛtiś ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3720: tatra yaj jñānaguṇaṃ manaḥ sa ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3721: yat tu sukhādyupalabdhisādhanam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manas tad iti saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3722: yugapaj jñeyopalabdheś ca yogina iti vā cārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3723: yogī khalu ṛddhau prādurbhūtāyāṃ vikaraṇadharmā nirmāya sendriyāṇi śarīrāntarāṇi teṣu yugapaj jñeyāny upalabhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3724: tac caitad vibhau jñātary upapadyate nāṇau manasīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3726: vibhu ca manastadantaḥkaraṇabhūtam iti tasya sarvendriyair yugapat saṃyogād yugapaj jñānāny utpadyerann iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3728: vibhur ātmā sarvendriyaiḥ saṃyukta iti yugapaj jñānotpattiprasaṅga iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3742: virodhī ca buddher guṇo na gṛhyate --- tasmād ātmaguṇatve sati buddher nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3743: NyS_3,2.24: anityatvagrahād buddher buddhyantarād vināśaḥ śabdavat //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3744: anityā buddhir iti sarvaśarīriṇāṃ pratyātmavedanīyam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3745: gṛhyate ca buddhisantānaḥ tatra buddher buddhyantaraṃ virodhī guṇa ity anumīyate yathā śabdasantāne śabdaḥ śabdāntaravirodhīti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3746: asaṅkhyeyeṣu jñānakāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛtihetuṣv ātmasamaveteṣv ātmamanasoś ca sannikarṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3747: samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyam astīti yugapat smṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3750: NyS_3,2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣān manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapadutpattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3751: jñānasādhanaḥ saṃskāro jñānam ity ucyate jñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ sannikṛṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3754: sadehasyātmano manasā saṃyogo vipacyamānakarmāśayasahito jīvanam iṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3755: tatrāsya prāk prāyaṇād antaḥśarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrād bahirjñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ saṃyogo nopapadyata iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3758: evaṃ ca sati sādhyam antaḥśarīravṛttitvaṃ manasa iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3760: susmūrṣayā khalv ayaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kaṃcid arthaṃ smarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3762: ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajaś ca prayatno dvividhaḥ --- dhārakaḥ prerakaś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3763: niḥsṛte ca śarīrād bahir manāsi dhārakasya prayatnasyābhāvād gurutvāt patanaṃ syāt śarīrasya smarata iti//28//0
GSP29nysvbh1u:3765: āśugati manaḥ tasya bahiḥśarīrātmapradeśena jñānasaṃskṛtena sannikarṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3766: pratyāgatasya ca prayatnotpādanam ubhayaṃ yujyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3767: utpādya vā dhārakaṃ prayatnaṃ śarīrān niḥsaraṇaṃ manasaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3772: tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe cintāprabandhe sati kasyacid arthasya liṅgabhūtasya cintanam ārādhitaṃ smṛtihetur bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3774: śarīrasaṃyogānapekṣaś cātmamanaḥsaṃyogo na smṛtihetuḥ śarīrasya bhogāyatanatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3775: upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ na tato niścaritasya manasa ātmasaṃyogamātraṃ jñānasukhādīnām utpattau kalpate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3778: ātmapreraṇena vā manaso bahiḥ śarīrāt saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3784: yadi tāvad ātmā amuṣyārthasya smṛtihetuḥ saṃskāraḥ amuṣminn ātmadeśe samavetas tena manaḥ saṃyujyatām iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛta evāsāv artho bhavati na smartavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3787: susmūrṣayā cāyaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kañcid arthaṃ smarati nākasmāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3788: jñatvaṃ ca manaso nāsti jñānapratiṣedhād iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3791: yadā khalv ayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pādavyathanam āpnoti tadā ātmamanaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣa eṣitavyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3794: yadṛcchayā tu na viśeṣo nākasmikī kriyā nākasmikaḥ saṃyoga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3795: karmādṛṣṭam upabhogārthaṃ kriyāhetur iti cet samānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3796: karmādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣasthaṃ puruṣopabhogārthaṃ manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ ca sidhyatīty evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3797: samānam --- smṛtihetāv api saṃyogaviśeṣo bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3798: tatra yad uktam ``ātmapreraṇayadṛcchājñatābhiś ca na saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ'' ity ayam apratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3800: kaḥ khalv idānīṃ kāraṇayaugapadyasadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3802: yathā khalv ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraś ca smṛtihetur evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni tāni ca na yugapadbhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapad anutpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3804: yat khalv idaṃ prātibham iva jñānaṃ praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārttam utpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgo hetvabhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3806: bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3807: % cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,] p.864
GSP29nysvbh1u:3809: na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate evaṃ me smṛtir utpanneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3810: asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idaṃ smārtam iti abhimanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3811: na tv asti praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3812: prātibhe katham iti cet puruṣakarmaviśeṣād upabhogavan niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3813: prātibham idānīṃ jñānaṃ yugapat kasmān notpadyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3814: yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ na karoti evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāhetur na yugapad anekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānam utpādayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3817: ``upabhogavan niyama'' ity asti dṛṣṭānto hetur nāstīti cen manyase?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3819: naikasmin jñeye yugapad anekaṃ jñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3821: tad idaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3822: % pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/] p.865
GSP29nysvbh1u:3824: avasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapad anekārthasmaraṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3825: kvacid deśe 'vasthitaśarīrasya jñātur indriyārthaprabandhena jñānam anekam ekasminn ātmapradeśe samavaiti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3826: tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ prasajyate pradeśasaṃyogaparyāyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3828: śabdasantāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapad utpattiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3829: pūrva eva tu pratiṣedho nānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapat smṛtiprasaṅga iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3830: puruṣadharmo jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā iti kasyacid darśanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3833: ayaṃ khalu jānāti tāvad idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukhasādhanam āptum icchati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3840: ārambhanivṛttyoś ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyam iti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3843: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3844: iti prāptaṃ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair
GSP29nysvbh1u:3848: ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti prāptaṃ paraśvādeḥ karaṇasyārambhanivṛttidarśanāc caitanyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3851: na tarhy ayaṃ hetuḥ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3852: ayaṃ tarhy anyo 'rthaḥ --- talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3853: pṛthivyādīnāṃ bhūtānām ārambhas tāvat trasasthāvaraśarīreṣu tadavayavavyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ loṣṭādiṣu ca liṅgābhāvāt pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3854: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti pārthivādyeṣv aṇuṣu taddarśanād icchādveṣayogas tadyogāj jñānayoga iti siddhaṃ bhūtacaitanyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3858: na ca mṛtsikatānām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣaprayatnajñānair yogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3859: tasmāt talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayor ity ahetur iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3865: tatra prayujyamāneṣu bhūteṣu pravṛttinivṛttī staḥ na sarveṣv ity aniyamopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3866: yasya tu jñatvād bhūtānām icchādveṣanimitte ārambhanivṛttī svāśraye tasya niyamaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3867: yathā bhūtānāṃ guṇāntaranimittā pravṛttir guṇapratibandhāc ca nivṛttir bhūtamātre bhavati niyamena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3868: evaṃ bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye syātām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3869: na tu bhavataḥ tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3872: bhūtacaitanikasyaikaśarīre bahūni bhūtāni jñānecchādveṣaprayatnaguṇānīti jñātṛbahutvaṃ prāptam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3876: dṛṣṭaś ca anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhūtānāṃ so 'numānam anyatrāpi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3877: dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇalakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu paraśvādiṣu upādānalakṣaṇeṣu ca mṛtprabhṛtiṣv anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3880: sa ca guṇaḥ prayatnasamānāśrayaḥ saṃskāro dharmādharmasamākhyātaḥ sarvārthaḥ puruṣārthārādhanāya prayojako bhūtānāṃ prayatnavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3881: ātmāstitvahetubhir ātmanityatvahetubhiś ca bhūtacaitanyapratiṣedhaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3882: ``nendriyārthayos tadvināśe 'pi jjānāvasthānād''iti ca samānaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3883: kriyāmātraṃ kriyoparamamātraṃ cārambhanivṛttī ity abhipretyoktam ``talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedhaḥ''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3889: NyS_3,2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryād akṛtābhyāgamāc ca na manasaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3890: ``icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam''ity ataḥ prabhṛti yathoktaṃ saṅgṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3892: pāratantryāt --- paratantrāṇi bhūtendriyamanāṃsi dhāraṇapreraṇavyūhanakriyāsu prayatnavaśāt pravarttante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3894: akṛtābhyāgamāc ca --- ``pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambha''iti caitanye bhūtendriyamanasāṃ parakṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇopabhujyata iti syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3895: acaitanye tu tatsādhanasya svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogaḥ puruṣasyety upapadyata iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3900: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ pratiṣedhe dravyāntaraṃ na prasajyate śiṣyate cātmā tasya guṇo jñānam iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3901: yathoktahetūpapatteś ceti ``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād''ityevamādīnām ātmapratipattihetūnām apratiṣedhād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3903: atha vā upapatteś ceti hetvantaram evedam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3905: yasmād ekasmin śarīre dharmaṃ caritvā kāyasya bhedāt svarge deveṣūpapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3909: buddhiprabandhamātre tu nirātmake nirāśrayā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3912: buddhisantatimātre tv ekasattvānupapatter na kaścid dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvati na kaścic charīraprabandhād vimucyata iti saṃsārāpavargānupapattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:3913: buddhisantatimātre ca sattvabhedāt sarvam idaṃ prāṇivyavahārajātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3914: % -jātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,] p.876
GSP29nysvbh1u:3916: smaraṇaṃ ca khalu pūrvajñātasya samānena jñātrā grahaṇam ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3917: so .yam eko jñātā pūrvajñātam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tac cāsya grahaṇaṃ smaraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3924: jña iti asya svabhāvaḥ svo dharmaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3925: ayaṃ khalu jñāsyati jānāti ajñāsīd iti trikālaviṣayeṇānekena jñānena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3927: tac cāsya trikālaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti varttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3928: tad yasyāyaṃ svo dharmas tasya smaraṇaṃ na buddhiprabandhamātrasya nirātmakasyeti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3929: smṛtihetūnām ayaugapadyād yugapad asmaraṇam ity uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3933: susmūrṣayā manaso dhāraṇaṃ praṇidhānaṃ susmūrṣitaliṅgacintanaṃ cārthasmṛtikāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3935: ekagranthopayatāḥ khalv arthā anyonyasmṛtihetava ānupūrvyeṇetarathā vā bhavantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3937: dhāraṇaśāstrakṛto vā prajñāteṣu vastuṣu smartavyānām upanikṣepo nibandha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3938: abhyāsas tu samāne viṣaye jñānānām abhyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3941: liṅgaṃ punaḥ saṃyogi samavāyy ekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3949: parigrahāt svena vā svāmī svāminā vā svaṃ smaryate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3956: viyogād yena viyujyate tadviyogapratisaṃvedī bhṛśaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3960: prāpteḥ yato 'nena kiṃcit prāptam āptavyaṃ vā bhavati tam abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3964: icchādveṣābhyāṃ yam icchati yaṃ ca dveṣṭi taṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3968: rāgād yasyāṃ striyāṃ rakto bhavati tām abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3971: na caiteṣu nimitteṣu yugapat saṃvedanāni bhavantīti yugapad asmaraṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3972: nidarśanaṃ cedaṃ smṛtihetūnāṃ na parisaṅkhyānam iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3973: anityāyāṃ ca buddhāv utpannāpavargitvāt kālāntarāvāsthānāc ca anityānāṃ saṃśayaḥ kim utpatpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ śabdavat āhosvit kālāntarāvasthāyinī kumbhavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3978: pratyarthaniyamāc ca buddhīnāṃ kriyāsantānavad buddhisantānoupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3980: avasthite ca kumbhe gṛhyamāṇe santānenaiva buddhir vartate prāg vyavadhānāt tena vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3983: kālāntarāvasthāne tu buddher dṛśyavyavadhāne 'pi pratyakṣam avatiṣṭheteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3984: smṛtiś cāliṅgaṃ buddhyavasthāne saṃskārasya buddhijasya smṛtihetutvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3985: yaś ca manyeta avatiṣṭhate buddhiḥ dṛṣṭā hi buddhiviṣaye smṛtiḥ sā ca buddhāv anityāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvān na syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3987: kasmāt? buddhijo hi saṃskāro guṇāntaraṃ smṛtihetur na buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3990: yāvad avatiṣṭhate buddhis tāvad asau boddhavyārthiḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyskṣe ca smṛtir anupapanna iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3992: yady utpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ prāptam avyaktaṃ boddhavyasya grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3993: yathā vidyutsampāte vaidyutasya prakāśasyānavasthānād avyaktaṃ rūpagrahaṇam iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3994: vyaktaṃ tu dravyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tasmād ayuktam etad iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3996: utapannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti pratiṣeddhavyaṃ tad eva abhyanujñāyate vidyutsampāte rūpāvyaktagrahaṇavad iti/
