GSP29nysvbh1u:3999: yad idaṃ kvacid avyaktaṃ kvacid vyaktaṃ grahaṇam ayaṃ vikalpo grahaṇahetuvikalpāt yatrānavasthito grahaṇahetuḥ tatrāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam yatra avasthitas tatra vyaktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4001: kasmāt? arthagrhaṇaṃ hi buddhiḥ yat tadarthagrahaṇam avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ vā buddhiḥ sā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4002: viśeṣāgrahaṇe ca sāmānyagrahaṇamātram avyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatra viṣayāntare buddhyanatarānutpattir nimittābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4003: yatra samānadharmayuktaś ca dharmī gṛhyate viśeṣadharmayuktaś ca tad vyaktam grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4004: yatra tu viśeṣe 'gṛhyamāṇe sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tad avyaktaṃ grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4006: tatra yad grahaṇaṃ na bhavati tad grahaṇanimittābhāvād na buddher anavasthānād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4007: yathāviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ vyaktam eva pratyarthaniyatatvāc ca buddhīnām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4008: sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ pratyarthaniyatā hi buddhayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4009: tad idam avyaktagrahaṇaṃ deśitaṃ kva viṣaye buddhyanavasthānakāritaṃ syyad iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4010: dharmiṇas tu dharmabhede buddhinānātvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tadupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4011: dharmiṇaḥ khalv arthasya samānāś ca dharmā viśiṣṭāś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4013: tā ubhayo yadi dharmiṇi vartante tadā vyakataṃ grahaṇaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4014: yadā tu sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tadāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4015: evaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya vyaktāvyakatayor grahaṇayor upapattir iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4016: na cedam avyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ budder boddhavyasya vānavasthāyitvād upapadyate iti/ idaṃ hi ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4018: anavasthāyitve 'pi buddhes teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipattavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4020: pradīpārciṣāṃ santatyā vartamānānāṃ grahaṇānavasthānaṃ grāhyānavasthānaṃ ca pratyarthaniyatatvād buddhīnāṃ yāvanti pradīpārcīṃṣi tāvatyo buddaya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4021: dṛśyate cātra vyaktaṃ pradīpārciṣām grahaṇam iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4022: cetanā śarīraguṇaḥ sati śarīre bhāvād asati ca abhāvād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:4027: tenāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śarīraguṇaś cetanā śarīre gṛhyata atha dravyāntaraguṇa iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4030: na rūpādihīnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhyate cetanāhīnan tu gṛhyate yathoṣṇatāhīnā āpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4033: yathāvidhe dravye saṃskāraḥ tathāvidha evoparamo na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4035: yathāvidhe śarīre cetanā gṛhyate tathāvidhe evātyantoparamaś cetanāyā gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4041: śarīrasthena kadācic cetanotpadyate kadācin neti niyame hetur nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4042: dravyāntarasthena ca śarīra eva cetanotpadyate na loṣṭādiṣv ity atra na niyame hetur astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4043: ubhayasthasya nimittatve śarīrasamānajātīyadravye cetanā notpadyate śarīra eva cotpadyate iti niyame hetur nāstīti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4044: yac ca manyeta sati śyāmādiguṇe dravye śyāmādyuparamo dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ cetanoparamaḥ syād iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4047: śyāme rūpe nivṛtte pākajaṃ guṇāntaraṃ raktaṃ rūpam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4051: yāvatsu dravyeṣu pūrvaguṇapratidvandvisiddhis tāvatsu pākajotpattir dṛśyate pūrvaguṇaiḥ saha pākajānām avasthānasyāgrahaṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4052: na ca śarīre cetanāpratidvandvisiddhau sahānavasthāyi guṇāntaraṃ gṛhyate yenānumīyeta tena cetanāyā virodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4053: tasmād apratiṣiddhā cetanā yāvac charīraṃ varteta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4058: śarīraṃ śarīrāvayavāś ca sarve cetanotpattyā vyāptā iti na kvacid anutpattiś cetanāyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4059: śarīravac charīrāvayavāś cetanā iti prāptaṃ cetanabahutvam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4060: tatra yathā pratiśarīraṃ cetanabahutve sukhaduḥkhajñānānāṃ vyavasthā liṅgam evam ekaśarīre 'pi syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4063: yad uktaṃ na kvacic charīrāvayave cetanāyā anutpattir iti sā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4065: keśeṣu nakhādiṣu cānutpattiś cetanāyā iti anupapannaṃ śarīravyāpitvam iti//51//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4080: yathā itaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na śarīraguṇatvaṃ jahaty evaṃ rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā śarīraguṇatvaṃ na hāsyatīti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4083: yathetaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na dvaividhyam ativartante tathā rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā na dvaividhyam ativarteta yadi śarīraguṇaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4086: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ jñānapratiṣedhāt siddhe saty ārambho viśeṣajñāpanārthaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4090: tat kiṃ pratiśarīram ekam anekam iti vicāre ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4092: asti khalu vai jñānāyaugapadyam ekaikasyendriyasya yathāviṣayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4095: yat tu khalv idam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu jñānāyaugapadyam iti tal liṅgam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4096: kasmāt? sambhavati khalu vai bahuṣu manaḥsv indriyamanaḥsaṃyogayaugapadyam iti jñānayaugapadyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4100: ayaṃ khalv adhyāpako 'dhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇoty āraṇyajān śabdān bibhyad vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsate smarati ca gantavyaṃ sthānīyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4101: kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapad etāḥ kriyā iti prāptaṃ manaso bahutvam iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4103: āśusañcārād alātasya bhramato vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4106: tathā buddhīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ cāśuvṛttitvād vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyā bhavanntīty abhimāno bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4108: atha yugapadbhāvād eva yugapadanekakriyopalabdhir iti nātra viśeṣapratipatteḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4109: uktam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu paryāyeṇa buddhayo bhavantīti tac cāpratyākhyeyam ātmapratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4110: athāpi dṛṣṭaśrutān arthān cintayataḥ krameṇa buddhayo vartante na yugapad anenānumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4112: katham? vākyastheṣu khalu varṇeṣūccaratsu prativarṇaṃ tāvac chravaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4113: śrutaṃ varṇam ekam anekaṃ vā padabhāvena sa pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4117: sambaddhāṃś ca padārthān gṛhītvā vākyārthaṃ pratipadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4118: na cāsāṃ krameṇa vartamānānāṃ buddhīnām āśuvṛttitvāt kramo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4120: na cāsti muktasaṃśayā yugapad utpattir buddhīnāṃ yayā manasāṃ bahutvam ekaśarīre 'numīyeta iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4122: aṇu mana ekaṃ ceti dharmasamuccayo jñānāyaugapadyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4123: mahattve manasaḥ sarvendriyasaṃyogād yugapad viṣayagrahaṇaṃ syād iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4124: manasaḥ khalu bhoḥ sendriyasya śarīre vṛttilābho nānyatra śarīrāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4125: jñātuś ca puruṣasya śarīrāyatanā buddhyādayo viṣayopabhogo jihāsitahānam īpsitāvāptiś ca sarve ca śarīrāśrayā vyavahārāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4126: tatra khalu vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ --- kim ayaṃ puruṣakarmanimittaḥ śarīrasarga āhosvid bhūtamātrād akarmanimitta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4130: pūrvaśarīre yā pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhalakṣaṇā tat pūrvakṛtaṃ karmoktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4136: yad adhiṣṭhāno 'yam ātmā 'yam aham iti manyamāno yatrābhiyukto yatropabhogatṛṣṇayā viṣayānupalabhamāno dharmādharmau saṃskaroti tad asya śarīram,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4137: tena saṃskāreṇa dharmādharmalakṣaṇena bhūtasahite patite 'smin śarīra uttaraṃ niṣpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4139: puruṣasya ca pūrvaśarīravat pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrasarge saty etad upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4140: % pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo ... upapadyata iti/] p.901
GSP29nysvbh1u:4141: dṛṣṭā ca puruṣaguṇena prayatnena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣārthkriyāsamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ rathaprabhṛtīnām utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4142: tathānumātavyaṃ śarīram api puruṣārthakriyāsamartham utpadyamānaṃ puruṣasya guṇāntarāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhya utpadyata iti//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4146: puruṣārthakāritvād upādīyante tathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīram utpannaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4150: apy akarmanimittaḥ sargaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyasamatvād asādhanam iti ``bhūtebhyo mūrtyupādānavad''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4154: kasmāt? nirbījā imā mūrtaya utpadyante bījapūrvikā tu śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4156: tatra sattvasya garbhavāsānubhavanīyaṃ karma pitroś ca putraphalānubhavanīye karmaṇī mātur garbhāśraye śarīrotpattiṃ bhūtebhyaḥ prayojayantīty upapannaṃ bījānuvidhānam iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4159: bhuktaṃ pītam āhāraḥ tasya paktinirvṛttaṃ rasadravyaṃ mātṛśarīre copacīyate bīje garbhāśayasthe bījasamānapākam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4160: mātrayā copacayo bīje yāvad vyūhasamarthaḥ sañcaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4161: sañcitaṃ ca kalalārbudamāṃsapeśīkaṇḍarāśiraḥpāṇyādinā ca vyūhenendriyādhiṣṭhānabhedena vyuhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4162: vyūhe ca garbhanāḍyāvatāritaṃ rasadravyam upacīyate yāvat prasavasamartham iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4163: na cāyam annapānasya sthālyādigatasya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4164: etasmāt kāraṇāt karmanimittatvaṃ śarīrasya vijñāyata iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4166: na sarvo dampatyoḥ saṃyogo garbhādhānahetur dṛśyate tatrāsati karmaṇi na bhavati sati ca bhavatīty anupapanno niyamābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4167: karmanirapekṣeṣu bhūteṣu śarīrotpattihetuṣu niyamaḥ syāt na hy atra kāraṇābhāva iti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4170: yathā khalv idaṃ śarīraṃ dhātuprāṇasaṃvāhinīnāṃ nāḍīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca snāyutvagasthiśirāpeśīkalalakaṇḍarāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4171: ca śirobāhūdarāṇāṃ sakthnāṃ ca koṣṭhagānāṃ vātapittakaphānāṃ ca mukhahṛdayāmāśayapakvāśayādhaḥsrotasāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4172: ca paramaduḥkhasampādanīyena sanniveśena vyūhanam aśakyaṃ pṛthivyādibhiḥ karmanirapekṣair
GSP29nysvbh1u:4173: utpādayitum iti karmanimittā śarīrotpattir iti vijñāyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4174: evaṃ ca pratyātmaniyatasya nimittasyābhāvān niratiśayair ātmabhiḥ sambandhāt sarvātmanāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4175: ca samānaiḥ pṛthivyādibhir utpāditaṃ śarīraṃ pṛthivyādigatasya ca niyamahetor abhāvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:4177: yat tu pratyātmaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate tatra śarīrotpattinimittaṃ karma vyavashtāhetur iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4178: paripacyamāno hi pratyātmaniyataḥ karmāśayo yasminn ātmani vartate tasyaivopabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram utpādya vyavasthāpayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4179: tad evaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyoganimittaṃ karma'' iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4180: pratyātmavyavasthānaṃ tu śarīrasyātmanā saṃyogaṃ pracakṣmaha iti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4182: yo .yam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge saty aniyama ity ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4183: ayaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyogotpattinimittaṃ karma'' iti anena pratyuktaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4186: yathaikasyātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tathā sarveṣām iti niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4187: anyasyānyathānyasyānyathety aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4188: % -ty aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/] p.909
GSP29nysvbh1u:4189: dṛṣṭā ca janmavyāvṛttir uccābhijano nikṛṣṭābhijana iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4199: asati karmabhede pratyātmaniyate niratiśayatvād ātmanāṃ samānatvāc ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ pṛthivyādigatasya niyamahetor ahbāvāt sarvaṃ sarvātmanāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4203: karmanimitte śarīrasarge tena śarīreṇātmano viyoga upapannaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4205: upapadyate khalu karmakṣayaḥ samyagdarśanāt prakṣīṇe mohe vītarāgaḥ punarbhavahetukarma
GSP29nysvbh1u:4206: kāyavāṅmanobhir na karotīty uttarasyānupacayaḥ pūrvopacitasya vipākapratisaṃvedanāt prakṣayaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4207: evaṃ prasavahetor abhāvāt patire 'smin śarīre punaḥ śarīrāntarānupapatter apratisandhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4208: akarmanimitte tu śarīrasarge bhūtakṣayānupapattes tadviyogānupapattir iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4209: NyS_3,2.68: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4210: adarśanaṃ khalv adṛṣṭam ity ucyata adṛṣṭakāritā bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4211: na jātv anutpanne śarīre draṣṭā nirāyatano dṛśyaṃ paśyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4212: tac cāsya dṛśyaṃ dvividhaṃ viṣayaś ca nānātvaṃ cāvyaktātmanaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4214: tasminn avasite caritārthāni bhūtāni na śarīram utpādayantīty upapannaḥ śarīraviyoga ity evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4215: ``punas tat prasaṅgo 'pavarge'' --- punaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4216: yā cānutpanne śarīre darśanānutpattir adarśanābhimatā yā cāpavarge śarīranivṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:4217: darśanānutpattir adarśanabhūtā naitayor adarśanayoḥ kvacid viśeṣa ity adarśanasyānivṛtter
GSP29nysvbh1u:4219: caritārthatā viśeṣa iti cet na karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4220: caritārthāni bhūtāni darśanāvasānān na śarīrāntaram ārabhanta ity ayaṃ viśeṣa evaṃ ced ucyate; na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4222: punaḥ punaḥ śarīrārambho dṛśyate prakṛtipuruṣayor nānātvadarśanasyākaraṇān nirarthakaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4224: tasmād akarmanimittāyāṃ bhūtasṛṣṭau na darśanārthā śarīrotpattir yuktā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4225: yuktā tu karmanimitte sarge darśanārthā śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4228: kasyacid darśanam adṛṣṭaṃ nāma paramāṇūnāṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ kriyāhetus tena preritāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4229: sammūrcchitāḥ śarīram utpādayantīti tan manaḥ samāviśati svaguṇenādṛṣṭena preritaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4231: etasmin vai darśane guṇānucchedāt punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4234: manoguṇenādṛṣṭena samāveśite manasi saṃyogavyucchedo na syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4235: tac ca kiṃkṛtaṃ śarīrād apasarpaṇaṃ manasa iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4236: karmāśayakṣaye tu karmāśayāntarād vipacyamānād apasarpaṇopapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4237: adṛṣṭād evāpasarpaṇam iti cet --- yo 'dṛṣṭaḥ śarīropasarpaṇahetuḥ sa evāpasarpaṇahetur apīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4238: na, ekasya jīvanaprāyaṇahetutvānupapatteḥ --- evaṃ ca saty ekam adṛṣṭaṃ jīvanaprāyaṇayor hetur iti prāptam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4243: bhūtamātrāt tu karmanirapekṣāc charīrotpattau kasya kṣayāc charīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4246: punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarga ity etat samādhitsur āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4248: yathāṇoḥ śyāmatā nityā agnisaṃyogena pratiṣiddhā na punar utpadyata evam adṛṣṭakāritaṃ śarīram apavarge punar notpadyata iti// 71 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4255: tasmān nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na pratyakṣaṃ na cānumānaṃ kiṃcid ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4256: tad idaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasamatvam abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4259: akṛte sukhaduḥkhahetau karmaṇi puruṣasya sukhaṃ duḥkham abhyāgacchatīti prasajyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4261: pratyakṣavirodhas tāvat --- bhinnam idaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4262: ko bhedaḥ? tīvraṃ mandaṃ ciram āśu nānāprakāram ekaprakāram ity evam ādir viśeṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4265: karmanimitte tu sukhaduḥkhayoge karmaṇāṃ tīvramandatopapatteḥ karmasañcayānāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣabhāvāt nānāvidhaikavidhabhāvāc ca karmaṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhabhedopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4266: so 'yaṃ hetubhedābhāvād dṛṣṭaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhedo na syād iti pratyakṣavirodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4268: yaḥ khalu cetanāvān sādhananirvartanīyaṃ sukhaṃ buddhvā tad īpsan sādhanāvāptaye prayatate sa sukhena yujyate na viparītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4269: yaś ca sādhananirvartanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ buddhvā taj jihāsuḥ sādhanaparivarjanāya yatate sa ca duḥkhena tyajyate na viparītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4270: asti cedaṃ yatnam antareṇa cetanānāṃ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānaṃ tenāpi cetanaguṇāntaravyavasthākṛtena bhavitavyam ity anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4272: tad etad akarmanimitte sukhaduḥkhayoge virudhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4273: tac ca guṇāntaram asaṃvedyatvād adṛṣṭaṃ vipākakālāniyamāc cāvyavasthitam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4275: athāgamavirodhaḥ --- bahu khalv idam ārṣam ṛṣīṇām upadeśajātam anuṣṭhānaparivarjanāśrayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4278: tac cobhayam etasyāṃ dṛṣṭau ``nāsti karma sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4280: seyaṃ pāpiṣṭhānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ --- akarmanimittā śarīrasṛṣṭir akarmanimittaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoga iti//72//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4281: iti śrīvātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam// 2 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4289: pravṛttyanantarās tarhi doṣāḥ parīkṣyantām ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4299: te kasmān nopasaṅkhyāyante ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4301: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trayo rāśayas trayaḥ pakṣāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4302: rāgapakṣaḥ --- kāmo matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4303: dveṣapakṣaḥ --- krodha īrṣyā asūyā droho 'marṣa iti/ mohapakṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:4312: etat pratyātmavedanīyaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām --- vijānāty ayaṃ śarīrī rāgam utpannam ``asti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4313: virāgaṃ ca vijānāti ---``nāsti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4315: mānerṣyāsūyāprabhṛtayas tu trairāśyam anupatitā iti nopasaṅkhyāyante//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4318: kasmāt? ekapratyanīkabhāvāt --- tattvajñānaṃ samyaṅmatir āryaprajñā sambodha ity ekam idaṃ pratyanīkaṃ trayāṇām iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4328: amūḍhasya rāgadveṣā notpadyante mūḍhasya tu yathāsaṅkalpam utpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4331: ubhaye ca saṅkalpā na mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇatvān mohād anye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4333: tattvajñānāc ca mohanivṛttau rāgadveṣānutpattir ity ekapratyanīkabhāvopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4334: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tattvajñānād ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti vyākhyātam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4337: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca naimittikam iti doṣanimittatvād adoṣo moha iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4339: pravarttanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity anena doṣalakṣaṇenāvarudhyate doṣeṣu moha iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4341: dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ vānekavidhavikalpo nimittanaimittikabhāve tulyajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4343: tasyāsiddhir ātmano nityatvāt --- na khalu nityaṃ kiṃcij jāyate mriyate vā iti janmamaraṇayor nityatvād ātmano 'nupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4344: ubhayaṃ ca pretyabhāva iti tatrāyaṃ siddhānuvādaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4346: nityo 'yam ātmā praiti pūrvaśarīraṃ jahāti mriyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4349: tac caitad ubhayaṃ ``punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ'' ity atroktaṃ pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā śarīrāntaropādānaṃ pretyabhāvaḥ iti tac caitannityatve sambhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4350: yasya tu sattvotpādaḥ sattvanirodhaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ca doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4354: kena prakāreṇa kiṃdharmakāt kāraṇād vyaktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4355: vyaktād bhūtasamākhyātāt pṛthivyāditaḥ paramasūkṣmān nityād vyaktaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ prajñātaṃ dravyam utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4356: vyaktaṃ ca khalv indriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇam api vyaktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4358: rūpādiguṇayogaḥ rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4360: pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt --- dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyas tathābhūtasya dravyasyotpādaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4365: idam api pratyakṣam --- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4366: vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanān na vyaktaṃ kāraṇam iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4368: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4369: kin tu yad utpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtād evotpadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4370: vyaktaṃ ca tanmṛddravyaṃ kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4371: na caitannihnuvānaḥ kvacid abhyanujñāṃ labdhum arhatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4375: asataḥ sad utpadyate ity ayaṃ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4378: na ced vījopamardo 'ṅkurakāraṇam anupamarde 'pi bījasyāṅkurotpattiḥ syād iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4381: upamṛdya prādurbhāvād ity ayuktaḥ prayogo vyāghātāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4382: yad upamṛdnāti na tad upamṛdya prādurbhavitum arhati vidyamānatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4383: yac ca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtenāvidyamānenopamarda iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4392: ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayantīti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4396: prādurbhaviṣyann aṅkura upamṛdnātīti bhāktaṃ kartṛtvam iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4398: na vinaṣṭād bījād aṅkura utpadyate iti tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4401: sa khalv abhāvād bhāvotpatter hetur nirdiśyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4403: vyāhatavyūhānām avayavānāṃ pūrvavyūhanivṛttau vyūhāntarād dravyaniṣpattir nābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4404: bījāvayavāḥ kutaścin nimittāt prādurbhūtakriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante vyūhāntarād aṅkura utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4406: na cānivṛtte pūrvavyūhe bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa bhavitum ity upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4409: na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo 'ṅkurotpattikāraṇam ity upapadyte bījopādānaniyama iti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4412: puruṣo 'yaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4416: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhām antareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4420: yadā na sampādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4421: tasmād īśvarakāritatvāt ahetuḥ puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatter iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4424: adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisampadā ca viśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4426: saṅkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasañcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4427: evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena nirmāṇaprākāmyam īśvarasya svakṛtakarmaphalaṃ veditavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4428: āptakalpaś cāyam --- yathā pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro bhūtānām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4430: na tāvad asya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya upapādayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4431: āgamāc ca draṣṭā boddhā sarvajñātā īśvara iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4432: buddhyādibhiś cātmaliṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4433: % liṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum/] p.945
GSP29nysvbh1u:4434: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tat sarvaṃ prasajyate iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4442: nirnimittaṃ ca upādānavac ca dṛṣṭaṃ tathā śarīrādisargo .pīti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4444: animittato bhāvotpattir ity ucyate yataś cotpadyate tannimittam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4447: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca nimittapratyākhyānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4449: yathānudakaḥ kamaṇḍalur iti nodakapratiṣedha udakaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4450: sa khalv ayaṃ vādo 'karmanimittaḥ śarīrādisarga ity etasmān na bhidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4456: utpattidharmakam anutpannaṃ nāsti vināśadharmakaṃ ca vinaṣṭaṃ nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4465: athānityā tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ sarvaṃ nityam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4468: katham? yathā agnir dāhyaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyati evaṃ sarvasyānityatā sarvaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyatīti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4475: na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata
GSP29nysvbh1u:4479: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ tāni ca nityāni bhūtocchedānupapatter iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4486: bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātram idam ity ukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4492: upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryam utpadyate ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4499: pañcabhūtanityatvāt tallakṣaṇāvarodhāc cety anena śabdakarmabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca na vyāptāḥ tasmād anekāntaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4500: svapnaviṣayābhimānavan mithyopalabdhir iti cet bhūtopalabdhau tulyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4501: yathā svapne viṣayābhimāna evam utpattikāraṇābhimāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4502: evaṃ caitad bhūtopalabdhau tulyaṃ pṛthivyādyupalabdhir api svapnaviṣayābhimānavat prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4503: pṛthivyādyabhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti cet tad itaratra samānam --- utpattivināśakāraṇopalabdhiviṣayasyāpy abhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4504: so 'yaṃ nityānām atīndriyatvād aviṣayatvāc cotpattivināśayoḥ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad ity ahetur iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4505: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātram upajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayor viṣayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4507: yac copajāyate tat prāg apy upajananād asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4508: yac ca nivartate tan nivṛttam apy astīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4511: ayam upajanaḥ iyaṃ nivṛttir iti vyavasthā nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4513: ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣād avyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4514: idānīm upajananivṛttī nedānīm iti kālavyavasthā nopapadyate sarvadā vidyamānatvāt asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4519: avidyamānasyātmalābha upajano vidyamānasyātmahānaṃ nivṛttir ity etasmin sati naite doṣāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4520: tasmād yad uktaṃ prāg apy upajanād asti nivṛttaṃ cāsti tad ayuktam iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4523: sarvaṃ nānā na kaścid eko bhāvo vidyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4528: kumbha iti saṃjñāśabdo gandharasarūpasparśasamūhe budhnapārśvagrīvādisamūhe ca varttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4532: gandhādibhiś ca guṇair budhnādibhiś cāvayavaiḥ sambaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4537: na kaścid eko bhāva ity ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4539: yad iha lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvasya saṃjñāśabdabhūtaṃ tad ekasmin vyavasthitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4540: yaṃ kumbham adrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi yam evāsprākṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmīti nāṇusamūho gṛhyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4541: aṇusamūhe cāgṛhyamāṇe yad gṛhyate tad ekam eveti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4542: athāpy etad anūktam nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samudāyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4543: ekānupapatter nāsty eva samūhaḥ --- nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4545: samūho nopapadyate ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4546: vyāhatatvād anupapannaṃ --- nāsty eko bhāva iti yasya pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4547: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti hetuṃ bruvatā sa evābhyanujñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4549: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti ca samūham āśritya pratyekaṃ samūhipratiṣedho nāsty eko bhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4555: ``asan gaur aśvātmanā'' anaśvo gauḥ ``asann aśvo gavātmanā agaur aśvaḥ'' ity asatpratyayasya pratiṣedhasya ca bhāvaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt sarvam abhāva iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4556: pratijñāvākye padayoḥ pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātād ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4560: samupākhyāyamānaṃ kathaṃ nirupākhyam abhāvaḥ syād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4561: na jātv abhāvo nirupākhyo 'nekatayāśeṣatayā śakyaḥ pratijñātum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4562: sarvam etad abhāva iti cet --- yad idaṃ sarvam iti manyase tadabhāva iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4564: anekam aśeṣaṃ ceti nābhāve pratyayena śakyaṃ bhavitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4567: pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātaḥ --- sarvam abhāva iti bhāvapratiṣedhaḥ pratijñā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4569: bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvam anujñāyāśritya ca itaretarābhāvasiddhyā sarvam abhāva ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4570: yadi sarvam abhāvo bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher iti nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4584: so 'yam abhāvasya nirupākhyatvāt sampratyāyako 'rthabhedo na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4587: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher bhāvānām iti svarūpasiddher iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4588: gaur iti prayujyamāne śabde jātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4590: yadi ca sarvam abhāvaḥ gaur ity abhāvaḥ pratīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4592: yasmāt tu gośabdaprayoge dravyaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate nābhāvas tasmād ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4594: asan gaur aśvātmaneti gavātmanā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4596: anaśvo 'śva iti vā gaur agaur iti vā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4597: avacanāt svena rūpeṇa vidyamānatā dravyasyeti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4598: avyatirekapratiṣedhe ca bhāvena asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāve saṃyogādisambandho vyatirekaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4599: atra avyatirekaḥ abhedākhyasambandhaḥ tatpratiṣedhe sadā ca asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4601: asan gaur aśvātmanā anaśvo gaur iti ca gavāśvayor avyatirekaḥ pratiṣidhyate gavāśvayor ekatvaṃ nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4602: tasmin pratiṣidhyamāne bhāvena gavā sāmānādhikaraṇyam asatpratyayasya asan gaur aśvātmaneti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4603: yathā na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti kuṇḍe badarasaṃyoge pratiṣidhyamāne sadbhir asatpratyayasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4612: kim idānīm apekṣya hrasvam iti gṛhyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4615: evam itaretarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4616: % retarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/] p.984
GSP29nysvbh1u:4617: svabhāvasiddhāv asatyāṃ samayoḥ parimaṇḍalayor vā dravyayor āpekṣike dīrghatvahrasvatve kasmān na bhavataḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4619: yāvatī dravye apekṣamāṇe tāvatī evānapekṣamāṇe nānyataratra bhedaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4620: āpekṣikatve tu saty anyataratra viśeṣopajanaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4623: dve dravye paśyann ekatra vidyamānam atiśayaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dīrgham iti vyavasyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4624: yac ca hīnaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dhrasvam iti vyavasyatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4629: sarvaṃ tredhā jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4630: sarvaṃ caturddhā pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4637: evam apy ekānto na sidhyati sādhanābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4638: na hi hetum antareṇa kasyacit siddhir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4646: kasmāt? sarvam ekam ity anapavargeṇa pratijñāya kasyacid ekatvam ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4649: te khalv ime saṅkhyaikāntā yadi viśeṣakāritasyārthabhedavistārasya pratyākhyānena varttante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4652: samānadharmakārito 'rthasaṃgraho viśeṣakāritaś cārthabheda iti evam ekāntatvaṃ jahatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4653: te khalv ete tattvajñānapravivekārtham ekāntāḥ parīkṣitā iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4655: NyS_4,1.44: sadyaḥ kālāntare ca phalaniṣpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4659: asti ceyaṃ kriyā agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti etasyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4663: tac ca bhinne 'smin dehabhedād utpadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4666: dhvastāyāṃ pravṛttau pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ na kāraṇam antareṇotpattum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4667: na khalu vai vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kiñcid utpadyate iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4668: NyS_4,1.46: prāṅ niṣpatter vṛkṣaphalavat tat syāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4669: yathā phalārthinā vṛkṣamūle sekādi parikarma kriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4670: tasmiṃś ca pradhvaste pṛthivīdhātur abdhātunā saṃgṛhīta āntareṇa tejasā pacyamāno rasadravyaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4671: sa dravyabhūto raso vṛkṣānugataḥ pākaviśiṣṭo vyūhaviśeṣeṇa sanniviśamānaḥ parṇādi phalaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4675: sa jāto nimittāntarānugṛhītaḥ kālāntare phalaṃ niṣpādayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4678: NyS_4,1.47: nāsan na san na sadasat sadasator vaidharmyāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4681: kasyacid utpattaye kiñcid upādeyaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvasyety asadbhāve niyamo nopapadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4682: na sat, prāṅ utpatter vidyamānasyotpattir anupapanneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4686: etayor vyāghāto vaidharmyaṃ vyāghātād avyatirekānupapattir iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4687: prāg utpatter utpattidharmakam asad ity addhā/ kasmāat?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4689: yat punaruktaṃ prāg utpatteḥ kāryaṃ nāsad upādānaniyamād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4691: idam asyotpattaye samarthaṃ na sarvam iti prāg utpatter niyatakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ buddhyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:4693: tasmād upādānaniyamasyopapattiḥ sati tu kārye prāg utpatter utpattir eva nāstīti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4697: phalaṃ cāmutra ity āśrayavyatirekād ahetur iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4704: ``grāmakāmo yajeta'' ``putrakāmo yajete''ti tatra yad uktaṃ prītiḥ phalam ity etad ayuktam iti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4706: putrādisambandhāt phalaṃ prītilakṣaṇam utpadyate iti putrādiṣu phalavadupacāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4710: tat kim idaṃ pratyātmavedanīyasya sarvajantupratyakṣasya sukhasya pratyākhyānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4713: katham? na vai sarvalokasākṣikaṃ sukhaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4714: ayaṃ tu janmamaraṇaprabandhānubhavanimittād duḥkhān nirviṇṇasya duḥkhaṃ jihāsato duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanopadeśo duḥkhahānārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4717: sarve khalu sattvanikāyāḥ sarvāṇy utpattisthānāni sarvaḥ punarbhavo bādhanānuṣakto duḥkhasāhacaryād bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham ity uktam ṛṣibhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4718: duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate atra ca hetur upādīyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4720: janma jāyate iti śarīrendriyabuddhayaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaviśiṣṭānāṃ prādurbhāva utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4727: evaṃ sarvam utpattisthānaṃ vividhabādhanānuṣaktaṃ paśyataḥ sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca śarīrendriyabuddhiṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā vyavatiṣṭhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4732: yathā viṣayogāt payo viṣam iti budhyamāno nopādatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4734: duḥkhoddeśas tu na sukhasya pratyākhyānam, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4736: na khalv ayaṃ duḥkhoddeśaḥ sukhasya pratyākhyānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4738: niṣpadyate khalu bādhanāntarāleṣu sukhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ śarīriṇām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4742: sukhasya, duḥkhoddeśeneti prakaraṇāt paryeṣaṇaṃ prārthanā viṣayārjanatṛṣṇā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4743: paryeṣaṇasya doṣo yad ayaṃ vedayamānaḥ prārthayate tac cāsya prārthitaṃ na sampadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4746: bahupratyanīkaṃ vā sampadyate iti etasmāt paryeṣaṇadoṣān nānāvidho mānasaḥ santāpo bhavati evaṃ vedayataḥ paryeṣaṇadoṣād bādhanāyā anivṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4748: anena kāraṇena duḥkhaṃ janma na tu sukhasyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4751: athainam aparaḥ kāmaḥ kṣipram eva prabādhate//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4752: ``api ced udanemi samantād bhūmim imāṃ labhate sagavāśvām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4753: na sa tena dhanena dhanaiṣī tṛpyati kin nu sukhaṃ dhanakāme//'' iti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4756: ayaṃ khalu sukhasaṃvedane vyavasthitaḥ sukhaṃ paramapuruṣārthaṃ manyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4757: na sukhād anyan niḥśreyasam asti sukhe prāpte caritārthaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4758: mithyāsaṅkalpāt sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca viṣayeṣu saṃrajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4763: na duḥkham anāsādya śakyaṃ sukham avāptum,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4764: tādarthyāt sukham evedam iti sukhasaṃjñopahataprajño jāyasva ceti saṃdhāvatīti saṃsāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4766: tad asyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ pratipakṣo duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4771: yady evaṃ kasmād duḥkhaṃ janmeti nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4772: so 'yam evaṃ vācye yad evam āha duḥkham eva janmeti tena sukhābhāvaṃ jñāpayatīti janma vinigrahārthīyo vai khalv ayam evaśabdaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4775: evaṃ sukham apīti etad anenaiva nirvarttyate na tu duḥkham eva janmeti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4779: ṛṇānubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ---``jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇas tribhir ṛṇair ṛṇavān jāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4780: brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya'' iti ṛṇāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4782: karmasambandhavacanāt ``jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇam āsau ca'' iti ``jarayā ha vā eṣa tasmāt satrād vimucyate mṛtyunā ha vā'' iti *ṛṇānubandhād (corr.;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4785: kleśānubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ kleśānubaddha evāyaṃ mriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4786: kleśānubaddhaś ca jāyate nāsya kleśānubandhavicchedo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4787: pravṛttyanubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ---janmaprabhṛty ayaṃ yāvat prāyaṇaṃ vāgbuddhiśarīrārambheṇāvimukto gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4788: tatra yad uktaṃ ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4791: yat tāvad ṛṇānubandhād iti ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4795: dvitīyaś ca pratideyaṃ gṛhṇāti tatrāsya dṛṣṭatvāt pradhānam ṛṇaśabdaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4798: guṇaśabdenāyam anuvāda ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4799: % nupapatteḥ guṇaśabdenāyam anuvāda ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti/] p.1015
GSP29nysvbh1u:4800: prayuktopamaṃ caitad yathāgnir māṇavaka iti---anyatra dṛṣṭaś cāyam ṛṇaśabda iha prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4805: karmānuṣṭhāne ca ṛṇīva ṛṇadānāt praśasyate sa evopamārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4807: jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇa iti ca guṇaśabdo gṛhasthaḥ sampadyamāno jāyamāna iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4808: yadāyaṃ gṛhastho jāyate tadā karmabhir adhikriyate mātṛto jāyamānasyānadhikārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4809: yadā tu mātṛto jāyate kumāro na tadā karmabhir adhikriyate arthinaḥ śaktasya cādhikārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4810: arthinaḥ karmabhir adhikāraḥ karmavidhau kāmasaṃyogas mṛteḥ ``agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma'' ity evamādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4813: (4*) śaktaḥ khalu vihite karmaṇi pravarttate netara iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4815: mātṛto jāyamāne kumāre ubhayam arthitā śaktiś ca na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4816: na bhidyate ca laukikād vākyād vaidikaṃ vākyaṃ prekṣāpūrvakāripuruṣapraṇītatvena/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4819: kumārakam evaṃ brūyād adhīṣva yajasva brahmacaryaṃ careti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4820: kuta evam ṛṣir upapannānavadyavādī upadeśārthena prayukta upadiśati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4821: na khalu vai narttako 'ndheṣu pravarttate na gāyako badhireṣv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4823: yaś copadiṣṭam arthaṃ vijānāti taṃ praty upadeśaḥ kriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4826: yac ca mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ karma abhivadati tat patnīsambandhādinā gārhasthyaliṅgenopapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4829: yāvac cāsya phalenārthitvaṃ na vipariṇamate na nivartate tāvad anena karmānuṣṭheyam ity upapadyate jarāmaryavādas taṃ pratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4830: jarayā ha vety āyuṣasü@turīyasya caturthasya pravrajyāyuktasya vacanaṃ ``jarayā ha vā eṣa etasmād vimucyate'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4831: āyuṣas turīyaṃ caturthaṃ pravrajyāyuktaṃ jarety ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4835: svayam aśaktasya bāhyāṃ śaktim āha---``antevāsī vā juhuyād brahmaṇā sa parikrītaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4836: kṣīrahotā vā jahuyād dhanena sa parikrīta'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4837: athāpi vihitaṃ vānūdyeta kāmād vārthaḥ parikalpyeta?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4839: ṛṇavān ivāsvatantro gṛhasthaḥ karmasu pravarttate ity upapannaṃ vākyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4841: phalasya hi sādhanāni prayatnaviṣayo na phalam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4845: tena yaḥ sambaddhyate so 'yaṃ jāyamāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4851: yadi cāśramāntaram abhaviṣyat tad api vyadhāsyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:4855: na pratiṣedho 'pi vai brāhmaṇena pratyakṣato vidhīyate --- na santy āśramāntarāṇi eka eva gṛhasthāśrama iti pratiṣedhasya pratyakṣato 'śravaṇād ayuktam etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4857: yathā śāstrāntarāṇi sve sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakāni nārthāntarābhāvād evam idaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gṛhasthaśāstraṃ sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakaṃ nāśramāntarāṇām abhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4861: ``karmabhir mṛtyum ṛṣayo niṣeduḥ prajāvanto draviṇam icchamānāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4862: athāpare ṛṣayo manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvam ānaśuḥ//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4863: ``na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4864: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yad yatayo viśanti//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4865: ``vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4866: tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4868: ``trayo dharmaskandhāḥ ---yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānam iti prathamas tapa eva dvitīyo brahmacāry
GSP29nysvbh1u:4869: ācāryakulavāsīti tṛtīyo 'tyantam ātmānam ācāryakule 'vasādayan sarve evaite puṇyalokā
GSP29nysvbh1u:4872: atho khalv āhuḥ kāmamaya evāyaṃ puruṣa iti sa yathākāmo bhavati tatkratur bhavati yatkratur bhavati tat karma kurute yat karma kurute tad abhisaṃpadyate/''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4873: iti karmabhiḥ saṃsaraṇam uktvā prakṛtam anyad upadiśanti ``iti nu kāmayamāno 'thākāmayamāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:4874: yo 'kāmo niṣkāma ātmakāma āptakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti ihaiva samavalīyante
GSP29nysvbh1u:4876: tatra yad uktam ṛṇānubandhād apavargābhāva ity etad ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4877: ``ye catvāraḥ pathayo devayānā'' iti ca cāturāśramyaśruter aikāśramyān upapattiḥ//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4878: phalārthinaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ``jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotram. darśapūrṇam āsau ceti'' katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4880: ``prājāpatyām iṣṭaṃ nirūpya tasyāṃ sarvavedasaṃ hutvā ātmany agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed'' iti *śrūyate (corr.; śrūyate, ed.)/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4881: tena vijānīmaḥ prajāvittalokaiṣaṇābhyo vyutthitasya nivṛtte phalārthitve samāropaṇaṃ vidhīyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4882: evaṃ ca brāhmaṇāni ``so 'nyad vratam upākariṣyamāṇo yājñavalkyo maitreyīm iti hovāca pravrajiṣyan vā are aham asmāt sthānād asmi hanta te 'nayā kātyāyanyā sahāntaṃ karavāṇīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4883: athāpy uktānuśāsanāsi maitreyi etāvad are khalv amṛtatvam iti hoktvā yājñavalkyaḥ pravavrājeti''
GSP29nysvbh1u:4885: jarāmarye ca karmaṇy aviśeṣeṇa kalpyamāne sarvasya pātracayāntāni karmāṇīti prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4887: ``etad dha sma vai tat pūrve brāhmaṇā anūcānā vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ na kāmayante kiṃ prajayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:4888: kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yam ātmāyaṃ loka iti te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś
GSP29nysvbh1u:4889: ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantīti'' /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4890: eṣaṇābhyaś ca vyutthitasya pātracayāntāni karmāṇi nopapadyante iti nāviśeṣeṇa karttuḥ prayojakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4893: pramāṇena prāmāṇyābhyanujñānāt --- pramāṇena khalu brāhmaṇenetihāsapurāṇasya prāmāṇyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:4894: abhyanujñāyate ``te vā khalv ete atharvāṅgirasa etad itihāsapurāṇam abhyavadann itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4897: aprāmāṇye ca dharmaśāstrasya prāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahāralopāl lokocchedaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4899: ye eva mantrabrāhmaṇasya draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4906: tatraikena na sarvaṃ vyavasthāpyate iti yathāviṣayam etāni pramāṇānīndriyādivad iti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4909: yathā suṣuptasya khalu svapnādarśane rāgānubandhaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubandhaś ca vicchidyate tathāpavarge 'pīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4910: etac ca brahmavido muktasyātmano rūpam udāharantīti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4921: sarvāṇi pūrvakarmāṇi hy ante janmani pipacyanta iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4928: NyS_4,1.65: prāg utpatter abhāvānityatvavat svābhāvike 'py anityatvam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4929: yathānādiḥ prāg utpatter abhāva utpannena bhāvena nivartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4935: sataḥ khalu dharmo nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4938: anutpattidharmakam anityam iti nātra hetur astīti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4943: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ naiyamikān rāgadveṣamohān nirvarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4945: dṛśyate hi kaścit sattvanikāyo rāgabahulaḥ kaścid dveṣabahulaḥ kaścin mohabahula iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4947: mūḍho rajyati mūḍhaḥ kupyati rakto muhyati kupito muhyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4948: sarvamithyāsaṅkalpānāṃ tattvajñānād anutpattiḥ kāraṇānutpātau ca kāryānutpatter iti rāgādīnām atyantam anutpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4950: sarve ime khalv ādhyātmikā bhāvā anādinā prabandhena pravarttante śarīrādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4951: na jātv atra kaścid anutpannapūrvaḥ prathamata utpadyate 'nyatra tattvajñānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4952: na caivaṃ saty anutpattidharmakaṃ kiñcid avyayadharmakaṃ pratijñāyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4953: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ tattvajñānakṛtān mithyāsaṅkalpavighātān na rāgādyutpattinimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4956: kiṃ nu khalu bhoḥ yāvanto viṣayās tāvatsu pratyekaṃ tattvajñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4959: na tāvad ekaikatra yāvad viṣayam utpadyate jñeyānām ānantyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4961: yatra notpadyate tatrānivṛtto moha iti mohaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4962: na cānyaviṣayeṇa tattvajñānenānyaviṣayo mohaḥ śakyaḥ pratiṣeddhum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4963: mithyājñānaṃ vai khalu moho na tattvajñānasyānutpattimātram/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4964: tac ca mithyājñānaṃ yatra viṣaye pravartamānaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ bhavati sa viṣayas tattvato jñeya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4968: anātmānaṃ khalv aham asmīti paśyato dṛṣṭir ahaṅkāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4973: ayaṃ khalu śarīrādyarthajātam aham asmīti vyavasitaḥ taducchedenātmocchedaṃ manyamāno 'nucchedatṛṣṇāpariplutaḥ punaḥ punas tad upādatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4976: yas tu duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ ca sarvam idaṃ duḥkham iti paśyati sa duḥkhaṃ parijānati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4977: parijñātaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavaty anupādānāt saviṣānnavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4978: evaṃ doṣān karma ca duḥkhahetur iti paśyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4979: na cāprahīṇeṣu doṣeṣu duḥkhaprabandhocchedena śakyaṃ bhavitum iti doṣān jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4980: prahīṇeṣu ca doṣeṣu na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāyety uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4981: pretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati karma ca doṣāṃś ca praheyān/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4983: evaṃ catasṛbhir vidhābhiḥ prameyaṃ vibhaktam āsevamānasyābhyasyato bhāvayataḥ samyagdarśanaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhas tattvajñānam utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4987: tad idaṃ tattvajñānaṃ tadviṣayam utpannam ahaṅkāraṃ nivartayati samānaviṣaye tayor virodhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4988: evaṃ tattvajñānād ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4989: sa cāyaṃ śāstrārthasaṃgraho 'nūdyate nāpūrvo vidhīyate iti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4995: tāṃś ca prasañcakṣāṇasya rūpādiviṣayo mithyāsaṅkalpo nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4999: so 'yam adhyātmaṃ bahiś ca viviktacitto viharan mukta ity ucyate//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5000: ataḥ paraṃ kācit saṃjñā heyā kācid bhāvayitavyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5004: sā ca khalu strīsaṃjñā sapariṣkārā puruṣasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5005: puruṣasaṃjñā ca striyāḥ sapariṣkārā nimittasaṃjñā anuvyañjanasaṃjñā ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5010: anuvyañjanasaṃjñā --- itthaṃ daṇḍā ittham oṣṭhāv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5011: seyaṃ saṃjñā kāmaṃ vardhayati tadanuṣaktāṃś ca doṣān vivarjanīyān,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5017: saty eva ca dvividhe viṣaye kācit saṃjñā bhāvanīyā kācit parivarjanīyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5027: athāpi nopalabhyate na kathañcana saṃśayān mucyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5030: kasmāt? pūrvoktahetūnām apratiṣedhād asti dravyāntarārambha iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5032: vṛttyanupapatter api tarhi saṃśayānupapattir nāsty avayavīti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5038: na hy asyānye avayavā ekadeśabhūtāḥ santīti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5044: tad evaṃ na yuktaḥ saṃśayo nāsty avayavīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5047: na cāyaṃ pṛthag avayavebhyo vartate agrahaṇāt nityatvaprasaṅgāc ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5051: kasmāt? dharmamātrasya dharmibhir avayavaiḥ pūrvavat sambandhānupapatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5052: pṛthak cāvayavebhyo dharmibhyo dharmasyāgrahaṇād iti samānam//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5054: kiṃ pratyavayavaṃ kṛtsno 'vayavī vartate athaikadeśeneti nopapadyate praśnaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5058: tāv imau kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau bhedaviṣayau naikasminn avayaviny uapapadyete bhedābhāvād iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5062: yady api ekadeśo 'vayavāntarabhūtaḥ syāt tathāpy avayave 'vayavāntaraṃ vartate nāvayavīti anyo 'vayavīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5064: anyāvayavabhāve 'py avṛtter avayavino naikadeśena vṛttir anyāvayavābhāvād ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5069: na kāraṇadravyebhyo 'nyatra kāryadravyam ātmānaṃ labhate viparyayas tu kāraṇadravyeṣv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5072: nityeṣu dravyeṣu katham āśrayāśrayibhāva iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5073: anityeṣu dravyaguṇeṣu darśanād āśrayāśritabhāvasya nityeṣu siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5076: yathā rūpādiṣu mithyāsaṅkalpo na rūpādaya iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5077: sarvāgrahaṇam avayavyasiddher iti pratyavasthito 'py etad āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5079: yathaikaikaḥ keśas taimirikeṇa nopalabhyate keśasamūhas tūpalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5082: NyS_4,2.14: svaviṣayān atikrameṇendiryasya paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāavo nāviṣaye pravṛttiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5083: yathāviṣayam indriyāṇāṃ paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ paṭumandabhāvo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5084: cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5086: so 'yaṃ taimirikaḥ kaścic cakṣur viṣayaṃkeśaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5089: paramāṇavas tv atīndriyā indriyāviṣayabhūtā na kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5092: na jātv arthāntaram aṇubhyo gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5093: te khalv ime paramāṇavaḥ sannihitā gṛhyamāṇā atīndriyatvaṃ jahati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5094: viyuktāś cāgṛhyamāṇā indriyaviṣayatvaṃ na labhanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5095: so 'yaṃ dravyāntarānutpattāv atimahān vyāghāta ity upapadyate dravyāantaram yad grahaṇasya viṣaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5106: yaḥ khalv avayavino 'vayaveṣu vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ so 'yam avayavasyāvayaveṣu prasajyamānaḥ sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5111: sa āśrayaṃ vyāghnan ātmaghātāya kalpata iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5114: avayavavibhāgam āśritya vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ prasajyamāno niravayavāt paramāṇor nivartate na sarvapralayāya kalpate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5115: niravayavatvaṃ tu paramāṇor vibhāgair alpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5116: loṣṭasya khalu pravibhajyamānāvayavasyālpataram alpatamam uttaram uttaraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5117: sa cāyam alpataraprasaṅgaḥ yasmān nālpataram asti yaḥ paramo 'lpas tatra nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5118: yataś ca nālpīyo 'sti taṃ parama'nuṃ pracakṣmahe iti//16\\
GSP29nysvbh1u:5121: athedānīm ānupalambhikaḥ sarvaṃ nāstīti manyamāna āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5125: antar bahiś cāṇur ākāśena samāviṣṭo vyatibhinnaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5129: athaitan neṣyate --- paramāṇor antar nāsty ākāśam ity asarvagatatvaṃ prasajyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5130: NyS_4,2.20: antar bahiś ca kāryadravyasya kāraṇāntaravacanād akārye tadabhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5132: ``bahir'' iti ca vyavadhāyakam avyavahitaṃ kāraṇam evocyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5135: akārye hi paramāṇāv antar bahir ity asyābhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5139: yato hi nālpataram asti sa paramāṇur iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5141: yatra kvacid utpannāḥ śabdā vibhavanty ākāśe --- tadāśrayā bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5142: manobhiḥ paramāṇubhis tatkāryaiś ca saṃyogā vibhavanty ākāśe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5149: sarpac ca pratighāti na viṣṭambhāti --- nāsya kriyāhetuṃ guṇaṃ pratibadhnāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5151: viparyaye hi viṣṭambho dṛṣṭa iti sa bhavān sāvayave sparśavati dravye dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ viparīte nāśāṅkitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5163: paricchinnānāṃ hi sparśavatāṃ saṃsthānaṃ trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ samaṃ parimaṇḍalam ity upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5167: madhye sann aṇuḥ pūrvāparābhyām aṇubhyām saṃyuktas tayor vyavadhānaṃ kurute/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5170: yau tau pūrvāparau bhāgau tāv asyāvayavau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5171: evaṃ sarvataḥ saṃyujyamānasya sarvato bhāgā avayavā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5172: yat tāvan ``mūrtimatāṃ saṃsthānopapatter avayavasadbhāva'' iti? atroktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5173: kim uktam? vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatra nivṛtter aṇavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5176: uktaṃ cātra sparśavān aṇuḥ sparśavator aṇvoḥ pratighātād vyavadhāyako na sāvayavatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5177: sparśavattvāc ca vyavadhāne saty aṇusaṃyogo nāśrayaṃ vyāpnotīti bhāgabhaktir bhavati bhāgavānn ivāyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5178: uktaṃ cātra vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt tadavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5179: mūrtimatāṃ ca saṃsthānopapatteḥ saṃyogopapatteś ca paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavatvam iti hetvoḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5181: yāvan mūrtimad yāvac ca saṃyujyate tat sarvaṃ sāvayavam ity anavasthākāriṇāv imau hetū,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5185: vibhāgasya ca vibhajyamānahānir nopapadyate tasmāt pralayāntatā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5186: anavasthāyāṃ ca pratyadhikaraṇaṃ dravyāvayavānām ānantyāt parimāṇabhedānāṃ gurutvasya cāgraḥaṇam samānaparimāṇatvaṃ cāvayavāvayavinoḥ paramaṇvavayavibhāgād ūrdhvam iti//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5187: yad idaṃ bhavān buddhīr āśritya buddhiviṣayāḥ santīti manyate mithyābuddhaya etāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5188: yadi hi tattvabuddhayaḥ syur buddhyā vivecane yāthātmyaṃ buddhiviṣayāṇām upalabhyeta ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5189: NyS_4,2.26: buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhis tantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5190: yathāyaṃ tantur ayaṃ tantur iti pratyekaṃ tantuṣu vivicyamāneṣu nārthāntaraṃ kiñcid upalabhyate --- yat paṭabuddher viṣayaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5191: yāthātmyānupalabdher asati viṣaye paṭabuddhir bhavantī mithyābuddhir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5194: yadi buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānāṃ na sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5195: atha sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhir na buddhyā vivecanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5196: bhāvānāṃ buddhyā vivecanaṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiś ceti vyāhanyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5198: tad uktam --- ``avayavāvayaviprasaṅgaś caivam ā pralayād'' iti// 27 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5200: kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇadravyāśritaṃ tat kāraṇebhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5203: buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇam atīndriyeṣv aṇuṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5204: yad indriyeṇa gṛhyate tad etayā buddhyā vivicyamānam anyad iti// 28 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5207: yad asti yathā ca yan nāsti yathā ca tat sarvaṃ pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5208: yā ca pramāṇata upaloabdhis tad buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5209: tena sarvaśāstrāṇi sarvakarmāṇi sarve ca śarīriṇāṃ vyavahārā vyāptāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5210: parīkṣamāṇo hi buddhyādhyavasyatīdam astīdaṃ nāstīti tatra na sarvabhāvānupapattiḥ// 29 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5212: evaṃ ca sati sarvaṃ nāstīti nopapadyate, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5219: sarvam astīty asya kathaṃ na siddhiḥ?// 30 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5221: yathā svapne na viṣayāḥ santy atha cābhimāno bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5222: evaṃ na pramāṇāni prameyāṇi ca santy atha ca pramāṇaprameyābhimāno bhavati// 31 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5225: svapnānte viṣayābhimānavat pramāṇaprameyābhimāno na punar jāgaritānte viṣayopalabdhivad ity atra hetur nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5227: svapnānte cāsanto viṣayā upalabhyanta ity atrāpi hetvabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5230: yadi pratibodhe ṇupalambhāt svapne viṣayā na santīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5231: tarhi ya ime pratibuddhena viṣayā upalabhyanta upalambhāt santīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5233: upalambhāt sadbhāve saty anupalambhād abhāvaḥ siddhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5234: ubhayathā tv abhāve nānupalambhasya sāmarthyam asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5238: svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti bruvatā svapnāntavikalpe hetur vācyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5246: yathā smṛtiś ca saṅkalpaś ca pūrvopalabdhaviṣayau na tasya pratyākhyānāya kalpete tathā svapne viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaṃ na tasya pratyākhyānāya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5249: yaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati sa eva jāgrat svapnadarśanāni pratisandhatta idam adrākṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5251: sati ca pratisandhāne yā jāgrato buddhivṛttis tadvaśād ayaṃ vyavasāyaḥ svapnaviṣayābhimāno mithyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5253: yasya svapnāntajāgaritāntayor aviśeṣas tasya svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti sādhanam anarthakaṃ tadāśrayapratyākhyānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5254: atasmiṃs tad iti ca vyavasāyaḥ pradhānāśrayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5257: na khalu puruṣe 'nupalabdhe puruṣa ity apuruṣe vyavasāyo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5258: evaṃ svapnaviṣayasya vyavasāyo hastinam adrākṣaṃ parvatam adrākṣam iti pradhānāśrayo bhavitum arhati// 34 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5261: sthāṇau pruṣo 'yam iti vyavasāyo mithyopalabdhiḥ atasmiṃs tad iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5265: yathā pratibodhe yā jñānavṛttis tayā svapnaviṣayābhimāno nivartyate nārtho viṣayasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5266: tathā māyāgandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāṇām api yā buddhayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti vyavasāyās tatrāpy anenaiva kalpena mithyopalabdhivināśas tattvajñānān nārthapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5268: prajñāpanīyasarūpaṃ ca dravyam upādāya sādhanavān aparasya mithyādhyavasāyaṃ karoti sā māyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5269: nīhāraprabhṛtīnāṃ nagarasarūpasanniveśe dūrān nagarabuddhir utpadyate viparyaye tadabhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5270: sūryamarīciṣu bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭeṣu spandamāneṣūdakabuddhir bhavati sāmānyagrahaṇāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5272: kvacit kadācit kasyacic ca bhāvān nānimittaṃ mithyājñānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5273: dṛṣṭaṃ ca buddhidvaitaṃ māyāprayoktuḥ parasya ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5276: tad etat sarvasyābhāve nirupākhyatāyāṃ nirātmakatve nopapadyata iti// 35 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5281: upalabhyate hi mithyābuddhinimittaṃ mithyābuddhiś ca pratyātmam utpannā gṛhyate saṃvedyatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5286: tattvapradhānayor alopād bhedāt sthāṇau puruṣa iti mithyābuddhir utpadyate sāmānyagrahaṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5288: loṣṭe kapota iti na tu samāne viṣaye mithyābuddhīnāṃ samāveśaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇavyavasthānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5289: yasya tu nirātmakaṃ nirupākhyaṃ sarvaṃ tasya samāveśaḥ prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5290: gandhādau ca prameye gandhādibuddayo mithyābhimatās tattvapradhānayoḥ sāmānyagrahaṇasya cābhāvāt tattvabuddhaya eva bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5295: sa tu pratyāhṛtasyendriyebhyo manaso dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasyātmanā saṃyogas tattvabubhutsāviśiṣṭaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5297: sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5299: yad uktaṃ ``sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyanta'' ity etat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5306: kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ śītoṣṇābhyāṃ vyādhibhiś cānicchato 'pi buddhayaḥ pravartante tasmād aikāgryānupapattir iti// 40 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5307: astv etat samādhiṃ vihāya vyutthānaṃ vyutthānanimittaṃ samādhipratyanīkaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5317: pracayakāṣṭhāgate tattvajñānahetau dharme prakṛṣṭāyāṃ samādhibhāvanāyāṃ tattvajñānam utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5318: dṛṣṭaś ca samādhinārthaviśeṣaprābalyābhibhavaḥ ``nāham etad aśrauṣaṃ nāham etad ajñāsiṣam anyatra me mano 'bhūd'' ity āha laukika iti// 42 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5323: karmavaśān niṣpanne śarīre ceṣṭendriyārthāśraye nimittabhāvād avaśyambhāvī buddhīnām utpādaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5324: na ca prabalo 'pi san bāhyo ṛtha ātmano buddhyutpāde samartho bhavati tasyendriyeṇa saṃyogād buddhyutpāde sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti// 44 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5327: tatra yad uktam ``apavarge 'py evaṃ prasaṅga'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5330: yasmāt sarvaduḥkhabījaṃ sarvaduḥkhāyatanaṃ cāpavarge vicchidyate tasmāt sarveṇa duḥkhena vimuktir apavargaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5331: na nirbījaṃ nirāyatanaṃ ca duḥkham utpadyata iti// 45 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5332: NyS_4,2.46: tadarthaṃ yamaniyamābhyām ātmasaṃskāro yogāc cādhyātmavidhyupāyaiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5338: sa punas tapaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhyānaṃ dhāraṇeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5341: NyS_4,2.47: jñānagrahaṇābhyāsas tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5343: jñāyate 'neneti jñānam ātmavidyāśāstraṃ tasya grahaṇam adhyayanadhāraṇe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5345: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda iti prajñāparipākārtham,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5348: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda ity avibhaktārthaṃ vacanaṃ vibhajyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5351: yadi ca manyeta pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ pratikūlaḥ parasyeti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5352: NyS_4,2.49: pratipakṣahīnam api vā prayojanārhtam arthitve //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5354: parataḥ prajñām upāditsamānas tattvabubhutsāprakāśanena svapakṣam anavasthāpayan svadarśanaṃ pariśodhayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5358: anutpannatattvajñānānām aprahīṇadoṣāṇāṃ tadarthaṃ ghaṭamānānām etad iti// 50 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5363: tad etad vidyāpālārthaṃ na lābhapūjākhyātyartham iti// 51 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5369: tad vistareṇa vibhajyate --- tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5376: sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5382: evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5387: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5390: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5392: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5395: kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5398: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam --- niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5401: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5402: atha sādharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5405: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5408: sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5415: pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5430: tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5431: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5434: evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit kriyāvat syāt yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5440: prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5441: sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5447: siddhaṃ ca kiñcitsādharmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5449: tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5450: evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5453: evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5454: NyS_5,1.7: prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5455: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5456: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5457: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5464: ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5465: abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5466: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5467: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5468: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5469: na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5471: kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate --- kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5477: idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5481: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5489: sa khalu ``laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5494: --- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5495: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5496: sa ca katham ahetur na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5499: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha --- prāgutpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5504: NyS_5,1.13: tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5506: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5508: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5510: NyS_5,1.14: sāmānyadṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5511: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate --- sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5515: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5518: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5521: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5522: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur bhavati//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5524: ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5525: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5526: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5527: evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5535: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5537: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5546: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5552: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5558: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5560: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5561: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5563: pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5566: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5567: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5569: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5571: NyS_5,1.22: anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5572: anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5573: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5576: yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpannam anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5578: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5579: NyS_5,1.23: ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvaupapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5580: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5586: NyS_5,1.24: kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5587: yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5590: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5591: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5598: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5599: sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam iti bruvatā 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5602: yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5603: ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5606: ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5612: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5621: prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5623: yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5625: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5628: gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5630: NyS_5,1.29: tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5633: abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5634: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ ``na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir ity'' etan na sidhyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5635: so 'yaṃ hetur ``āvaraṇādyanupalabdher'' ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samayānupalabdhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5646: so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5651: tad upalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5657: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5659: seyam āvaraṇāadyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ --- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny
GSP29nysvbh1u:5660: tatra yad uktaṃ tad anupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5663: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5672: NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5673: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5682: sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha --- ``sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasam'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5684: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5685: NyS_5,1.35: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5687: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5689: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5694: NyS_5,1.36: pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5695: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5696: anityatvopapatteś ca ``nānityaḥ śabda'' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5698: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5701: yo 'yaṃ paripraśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5703: kasmāt? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5704: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5706: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5709: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5713: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5715: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5716: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5719: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5724: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5730: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5734: kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5735: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5736: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5737: so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5739: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5741: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5743: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5744: ``prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama'' iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5746: tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5747: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5748: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5749: pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:5750: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
GSP29nysvbh1u:5752: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5753: sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5755: so 'yaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5756: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5757: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5760: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5761: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5763: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5764: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5768: teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭhayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5769: caturthapakṣe samānadoṣatvaṃ parasyocyate --``pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe pratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣa'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5770: ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ``parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣa'' iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5773: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5778: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5780: yadā ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' ity evaṃ pravarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5782: yadā tu ``kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter'' ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5785: nābhivyaktir'' iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5791: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5794: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:5795: arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:5796: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
GSP29nysvbh1u:5800: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidraṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratjñāhāniḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5801: nidarśanam --- ``aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad'' ity kṛte apara āha -- dṛṣṭam aindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5802: kasmān na tathā śabda iti pratyavasthite idam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5804: yady aindriyakaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ kāmaṃ ghaṭo nityo 'stv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5805: sa khalv ayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan nigamanāntam eva pakṣaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5809: pratijñātārtho ``anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavad'' ity ukte yo 'sya pratiṣedhaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ --- sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5811: ``dharmavikalpād'' iti dṛṣṭāntapratidṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādharmyayoge dharmabhedāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ sarvagatam aindriyakas tv asarvagato ghaṭa iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:5813: katham? yathā ghaṭo 'sarvagata evaṃ śabdo 'py asarvagato ghaṭavad evānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5830: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyaṃ rūpādibhyaś cārthāntarasyānupalabdhir iti virudhyate --- vyāhanyate na sambhavatīti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5832: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ity ukte paro brūyāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ na cānityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5833: evaṃ śabdo 'py aindriyako na cānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5834: evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt --- ``ka punar āhānityaḥ śabda'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5836: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetvantaram //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5841: yāvān prakṛter vyūho bhavati tāvān vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5843: asti cedaṃ parimāṇam prativyaktaṃ tadekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt paśyāmo vyaktam idam ekaprakṛtīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5844: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānaṃ --- nānāprakṛtīnām ekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5845: evaṃ pratyavasthite āha --- ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ parimāṇadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5848: tad idam aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5849: sati ca hetvantarabhāve pūrvasya hetor asādhakatvān nigrahasthānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5850: hetvantaravacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5855: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatter ānarthakyād dhetor anivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5859: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt --- nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvād iti hetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5860: hetur nāma hinoter dhātos tuni pratyaye kṛdantaṃ padam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5874: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagater abhāvād varṇā eva krameṇa nirdiśyanta iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5875: NyS_5,2.9: pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ trir abhihitam apy avijñātam avijñātārtham //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5876: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trir abhihitam api na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccaritam ity evamādinā kāraṇena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5878: tadavijñātam avijñātārtham asāmarthyasaṃvaraṇāya prayuktam iti nigrahasthānam iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5880: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇānvayayogo nāstīty asambaddhārthatvagṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5889: tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāaptakālam asambaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5891: pratijñādīnām avayavānām anyatamenāpy avayavena hīnaṃ nyūnaṃ nigrahasthānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5896: NyS_5,2.14: śabdārthayoḥ punar vacanaṃ punaruktam anyatrānuvādāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5898: nityaḥ śabdo nityaḥ śabda iti śabdapunaruktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5899: arthapunaruktam --- anityaḥ śabdo nirodhadharmako dhvanir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5901: yathā hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punar vacanaṃ nigamanam iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5904: nidarśanam --- utpattidharmakatvād anityam ity uktvā arthād āpannasya yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ śabdas tena svaśabdena brūyād anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam
GSP29nysvbh1u:5911: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad apratyauccāraṇaṃ tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5915: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad avijñātaṃ tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5916: ayaṃ khalv avijñāya kasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5919: tad yadā na pratipadyate tadā nigṛhīto bhavati//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5921: yatra kartavyaṃ vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinatti --- idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5924: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayam eva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5925: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5926: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamyānuddhṛtya vadati --- bhavatpakṣe 'pi samāno doṣa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5928: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñāṃ nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5932: etac ca kasya parājaya ity anuyuktayā pariṣadā vacanīyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5933: na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ vivṛṇuyād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5935: nigrahasthālakṣaṇasya mithyādhyavasāyād anigrahasthāne nigṛhīto 'sīti paraṃ bruvan niranuyojyānuyojgān nigṛhīto veditavya iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5937: kasyacid arthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayato 'pasiddhānto veditavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5941: nāsad utpadyata iti siddhāntam abhyupetya svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ vikārāṇām anvayadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5944: tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt sukhādibhir ekaprakṛtīdaṃ viśvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5945: evam uktavān anuyujyate --- atha pratṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣitavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5948: yad dharmāntaraṃ pravartate nivartate vā sa vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5952: sadasatoś ca tirobhāvāvirbhāvam antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛttiḥ pravṛttyuparamaś ca bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5953: mṛdi khalv avasthitāyāṃ bhaviṣyati śarāvādilakṣaṇaṃ dharmāntaram iti pravṛttir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5955: tad etad mṛddharmāṇām api na syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5956: evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataś cātmahānam asataś cātmalābham abhyupaiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5962: kiṃ punar lakṣaṇāntarayogād hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvam āpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvam ity ata āha --- yathoktā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5964: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāś ceti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5965: yo 'kṣapādam ṛṣiṃ nyāyaḥ pratyabhād vadatāṃ varam/
